1b1(phal chen): @#bam po brgyad tsu lnga pa// / kye rgyal ba'i
1b2(phal chen): s ras bcu po 'di dag ni byangachub sems dpa' rnams kyi
1b3(phal chen): snying po byang chub la 'dug paste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar
2a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu spyod cing / byang chub sems dpa
2a2(phal chen): rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing
2a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ / ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar
2a4(phal chen): byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi khams
2b1(phal chen): thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// de bzhin
2b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// yid nam
2b3(phal chen): mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ji ltar mthun pa'i/
2b4(phal chen): lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge
2b5(phal chen): 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa
3a1(phal chen): @thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la
3a2(phal chen): 'khod do/ / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// kye
3a3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
3a4(phal chen): rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la snying po
3a5(phal chen): b yang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
3a6(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal
3b1(phal chen): par gyur cig ces gsung rjod de/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de
3b2(phal chen): dag thams cad dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub
3b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa
3b4(phal chen): sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig
3b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtswa dang / gel ba dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod ko lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag
3b6(phal chen): 'tshal te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes
3b7(phal chen): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ / ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni nge mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o// kye rgyal
4a1(phal chen): b a'i rdzas rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sar snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rgya sa
4a2(phal chen): kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus
4a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba shin tu chen po'i rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/
4a4(phal chen): 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam
4a5(phal chen): pab dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pas byang chub sems dpa'
4a6(phal chen): rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha' dbyings tshad med pa dang / dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas
4a7(phal chen): gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams
4b1(phal chen): cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing / ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'don ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
4b2(phal chen): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go/
4b3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/
4b4(phal chen): 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa na/ 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan
4b5(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to// yid gnyis dang the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// bdud
4b6(phal chen): rgya sde yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba smon to/ / 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / kun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir
4b7(phal chen): bdud 'dul ba ston to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston
5a1(phal chen): to/ / phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la stong brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// snying po byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
5a2(phal chen): bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ / nyon mongs pa'o stobs kyis nyam smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang
5a3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu chos nyid
5a4(phal chen): rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba
5a5(phal chen): ston to/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
5a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/
5a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtsa ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad
5b1(phal chen): yang dag par bsags pa yin/ chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems can
5b2(phal chen): thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
5b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ shin tu rnam par
5b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/ zag pa
5b5(phal chen): zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
5b6(phal chen): ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar mngon par sangs
5b7(phal chen): rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcur bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mo 'jigs pas
6a1(phal chen): shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang
6a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med cing sdug bsngal
6a3(phal chen): gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang / sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
6a4(phal chen): / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o//
6a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
6a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu
6a7(phal chen): gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
6b1(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta bzhin du smon pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul pa dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil/
6b2(phal chen): gyis mi non pa dang / tshig gi dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis
6b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung
6b4(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i
6b5(phal chen): dbang gzigs nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus
6b6(phal chen): byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /
6b7(phal chen): gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir ma
7a1(phal chen): gapa la/ 'du sa sa shA sa smra m
7a2(phal chen): a'i rnam pa 'a gyur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pan blang ba dam pas/ 'jigs pa'i chos kyang du yang dag par bstan pa dang / dran 'byung zhing 'jig par 'ja
7a3(phal chen): la na lu #nas sa pa rdzag la d
7a4(phal chen): gongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/
7a5(phal chen): mnyam pa med pa' ge 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ji yongs su byang na las 'da'a'o// kyi rgyal bar zas dan bcu ba de dag yang dag par gzigs nasadebazhin bshes
7a6(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'o go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras
7a7(phal chen): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o//
7b1(phal chen): don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o// sems can
7b2(phal chen): gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams
7b4(phal chen): kyis ma yin no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i
7b5(phal chen): spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams
7b6(phal chen): cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro
7b7(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi 'dzag rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di rim gror byas te mkhyen par bya'o/ / zang bar bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
8a1(phal chen): yongs su bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i zhes yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o// kye rgyam dar sras de skar ba
8a2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/ / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad
8a3(phal chen): sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'o tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jog rten gyi khams cad
8a4(phal chen): med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i
8a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i bu legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis
8a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon
8a7(phal chen): mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang
8b1(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
8b2(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byung ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs
8b3(phal chen): dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de/ nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so//
8b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir/ nged kyis byin gyis brlabs
8b5(phal chen): pa mdzadad/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
8b6(phal chen): la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'od dag smras so// gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa/
8b7(phal chen): gang rnams de dag sangs rgyal bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi zas// gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig slong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa// dpe ma med pa de dag rnams
9a1(phal chen): kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos/ / gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrog mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa// / gang dag nyon mongs
9a2(phal chen): bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / / gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa// de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i
9a3(phal chen): spyo mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya/ / gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang // gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod
9a4(phal chen): pa ston pa po/ / gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba// 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya// gang rnams de dag
9a5(phal chen): bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa/ / 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston// sems bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig
9a6(phal chen): papa'o bya ba thams cad ston byed pa/ / de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya// srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba
9a7(phal chen): dang / / 'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas// de dag thar par bya phyir snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa// de dag yon tan
9b1(phal chen): shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos/ / sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen// shes rab thabs kyi pha rol byon cing
9b2(phal chen): byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / / dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa// de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan
9b3(phal chen): gyis de dag nyon/ / gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skems pa// gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang // gang rnams de
9b4(phal chen): dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba/ / byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams
9b5(phal chen): cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/ / de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang // dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go//
9b6(phal chen): sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos// gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang // mtho bar mi sems dma'
9b7(phal chen): bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/ / 'gro ba kun gnas don gnyer cu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste// ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar
10a1(phal chen): 'grob thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ / byams pa rnan yon snying rje rdza ba dga' ba ldang ba brtan pa sdom pa ste// che ba ye shes rdzun tshul khrims bzang ba la ma ma N+Dag san
10a2(phal chen): tan can/ / sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa// de dang de dag pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang // sa bon mos pas
10a3(phal chen): gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste/ / sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lkug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga// bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen
10a4(phal chen): ye shes 'bras bu ste/ / chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs// rim gyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang
10a5(phal chen): pa ste/ / dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/ stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te// de dag seng
10a6(phal chen): ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byon bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/ / 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi bzad 'khyams gyur te// bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun
10a7(phal chen): por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur pa/ / lam ni rab stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag no// lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i
10b1(phal chen): grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god/ / 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing // yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab
10b2(phal chen): 'bar ba/ / sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing // nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston// rgyal po lta bu de
10b3(phal chen): dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa/ / sdig pa spongs la dge la bstan cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces// rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun
10b4(phal chen): mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba/ / rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor// tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa ye shes
10b5(phal chen): 'od dang shes rab mtshon/ / ye shes rno ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa// chos kyi sgron mche 'byon mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor
10b6(phal chen): ba yin/ / 'khor lo'i mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms// ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi re dang ldan// byang chub yan
10b7(phal chen): lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgyam
11a1(phal chen): mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mo 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa// bsam gtan mngon shes rab
11a2(phal chen): 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mo bskul pa/ / gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab pashes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur// de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan
11a3(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyis bltos/ / lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod las
11a4(phal chen): bsam pa mi phyed de/ / bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa// de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed//
11a5(phal chen): byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldog/ thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'jug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog/ tha dang yang dag
11a6(phal chen): shes dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi char 'bebs pa/ / de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags// shes rab rab dga' dang khrel yod
11a7(phal chen): dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / / ye shes shing thabs yin te thar pa'i sgo bye dran nga de dag sgo ba yin// bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan
11b1(phal chen): pa/ / srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi rdul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston// thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan// gshog pa
11b2(phal chen): thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin/ / ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra// srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don
11b3(phal chen): cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god/ / tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer 'phreng ba mdzes// 'od snang kun char nyon mongs
11b4(phal chen): 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skam par byed/ / stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad+mo yongs su rgyas byed pa// de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog
11b5(phal chen): 'gro ba kun tu 'byung / / chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na mdzes pa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis non//
11b6(phal chen): sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston// de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang
11b7(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/ / ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mog ste chos la dbang chen sbyar gnas pa// lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna
12a1(phal chen): tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste/ / chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang ba yin// srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'das dang nyon mongs las
12a2(phal chen): las rab 'das kun dbang po/ / byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos// srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa/
12a3(phal chen): de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel// 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang // phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang
12a4(phal chen): gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/ / chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba// thams cad mkhyen gyi yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de
12a5(phal chen): dag 'jig rten dbang / / nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba// 'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa med
12a6(phal chen): pa ste/ / 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa// de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra// de dang de dag shin
12a7(phal chen): tu rgya chen thabs ldan pa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ / chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel// de dang de dag ye shes mas ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags
12b1(phal chen): bcas pa bsal/ / ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu// de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel// de dang de dag rngo
12b2(phal chen): rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms/ / de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed// ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa
12b3(phal chen): kun gyi gtsug tu phyin/ / de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse// 'phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgo la gnas//
12b4(phal chen): de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim// de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi
12b5(phal chen): bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed/ / ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan stsol// de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye
12b6(phal chen): shes kun tu 'phags/ / gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed// theg pa dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jog rten gsum las 'byin//
12b7(phal chen): de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas// de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'// klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de
13a1(phal chen): dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs/ / de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum war mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon// dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud
13a2(phal chen): kyi sde rnams 'khrug/ mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud// de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang ston// de dang de dag tu
13a3(phal chen): klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyan rjes su 'gro/ / de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol// gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gang chen mtsho thob
13a4(phal chen): byed/ / de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god// de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba rtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston// de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon
13a5(phal chen): shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa/ / mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel// sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung
13a6(phal chen): gnas so/ / de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel// yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yod kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed// de dang
13a7(phal chen): de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas/ / de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs// zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab
13b1(phal chen): bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston/ / de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes// de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// de dang ye shes mi
13b2(phal chen): 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes/ / gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa// kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song
13b3(phal chen): zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin/ / gzugs rnams kun las 'das shong ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston// de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par mi nus
13b4(phal chen): so/ gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing // yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can// thams cad shes
13b5(phal chen): kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/ / de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya// chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa
13b6(phal chen): lta bur rab rtogs nas/ / mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed// sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston
13b7(phal chen): pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa legs par grag/ lus gcog la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston// sems med
14a1(phal chen): yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston/ / khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par rjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag
14a2(phal chen): gis sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod/ / nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang sgyur te// brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs
14a3(phal chen): shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ / de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes// 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna
14a4(phal chen): tshogs ston/ / de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthu gnas pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kun du skye
14a5(phal chen): ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med/ / rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste// mkhas pa kun la dbang sgyur de dag lus ni
14a6(phal chen): mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing / / me tog dri dang byug pa bye ma sil snyan gdugs dang bdan rgyal mtshan rnams// thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog
14a7(phal chen): la mchod byed cing / / mkhas pa bsam pa zag pas lus kyi 'dud byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu ston// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi//
14b1(phal chen): 'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed// chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing // blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa
14b2(phal chen): byed kyang zad pa med/ / 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs smos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston// sna tshogs
14b3(phal chen): gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston/ / 'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes dri ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med// 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i
14b4(phal chen): sems su 'gro ba ston/ / la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston// la lar sbyin dang tshul mkhas bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang ni shes rab rnams//
14b5(phal chen): la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston// mkhas pa rtog med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston// la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par
14b6(phal chen): nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ / la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las
14b7(phal chen): ldog pa med/ / de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur// de dag la lar lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu ston pa spyod// la lar dge slong
15a1(phal chen): rab tu ni zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ / la lar chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston// la lar bud med spu rtsal pa
15a2(phal chen): rol rab byin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur/ / la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed// la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe yi sa dang la lar rgan dang byis par
15a3(phal chen): ston/ / de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur// la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston// la lar mngal
15a4(phal chen): zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ / la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang dag rab tu slob// la lar bud med tshogs kyi dpung gnas la
15a5(phal chen): lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung / / la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs// la lar 'khor lo rab tu skor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos
15a6(phal chen): rnams yongs su tshol/ / la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhong rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang // byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no//
15a7(phal chen): bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag/ khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams
15b1(phal chen): cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston/ / sogs pa med cing phyogs la gnas mang spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston// gang phyir rgyal ba nyes rgyal de dag kyi mo phyog
15b2(phal chen): med kun na bzhugs pas na/ / 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong // sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams
15b3(phal chen): kyang mthong / / de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes/
15b4(phal chen): sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa'i rnams// de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed// bslab pa 'di
15b5(phal chen): yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed/ / dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas// 'gro bar skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor
15b6(phal chen): lo skor ba byed/ / dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab tu shes// de ltar khams
15b7(phal chen): dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes/ / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' lo sems spyod nga ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod par
16a1(phal chen): pha rol byon kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ / ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed// de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun
16a2(phal chen): nas nyon mongs med pa dag/ sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgya// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnam phya rang gi shes pas rtogs
16a3(phal chen): gyur nas/ / sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god// rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags//
16a4(phal chen): sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang sgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang // sgra rgyu shin tu phra ba gcig
16a5(phal chen): la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med/ / 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang // sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod
16a6(phal chen): ma yin par yang dmigs pa med/ / de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams// sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas
16a7(phal chen): shing rab tu ston/ / nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams// ma rlogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni rgyu dang 'dres ma yin// de ltar chos nyid dag
16b1(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams/ / 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin// la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sku
16b2(phal chen): tshogs tha dad byed/ / lo no bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad// de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te// skad cig gcig la
16b3(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur/ / ri yi dbang po ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra// kun nas sgra yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar rjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med//
16b4(phal chen): de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dang // rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston// dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g.yos la
16b5(phal chen): ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas/ / de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom rnam 'phel ba// de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i
16b6(phal chen): rnams/ / shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel// gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra// 'du shes thams
16b7(phal chen): cad sdig rgya lta bur rag las 'dus byas rgya skyes shing dang 'dra/ / sems ni sgyu 'dra sgrub bya sbeng byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston// de ltar phung po dged pa sngon kyang dbang sgyur dag ni de la
17a1(phal chen): gnas pa med/ / skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang // khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro
17a2(phal chen): ba rnams la ston/ / dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston// de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med// 'ong ba med cing
17a3(phal chen): phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi/ / nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'o las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du// rkyen las rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med
17a4(phal chen): las rab tu 'das pa yi/ / yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston// skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston//
17a5(phal chen): 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed// sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
17a6(phal chen): gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston/ / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin// khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun
17a7(phal chen): tu 'gro ba thob gyur pa/ / mig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag/ sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs
17b1(phal chen): pa med/ / sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog spong 'gro ba kun tu mngon sum chos bzhed de// nyon mongs drag pa ldan cig skyes pa mi mngar byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med// 'byung
17b2(phal chen): bzugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad/ / 'di yi gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med// 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo
17b3(phal chen): ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ / mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams med pa// thams cad mkhyen mdzad
17b4(phal chen): sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/ / 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med brnyes pa// chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa
17b5(phal chen): 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog/ de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya// de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par
17b6(phal chen): mi nus te/ / 'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya// sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa'i rnams//
17b7(phal chen): spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing // tshul khrims mo g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed// lung
18a1(phal chen): bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/ / sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed//
18a2(phal chen): bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med// gzugs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal// bstan pa man+ta
18a3(phal chen): med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya/ / sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed// snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten
18a4(phal chen): byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan/ / brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas// khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa
18a5(phal chen): mngon 'tshang rgya/ / mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa// yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur//
18a6(phal chen): dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog/ ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul pa sgrub cing byang chub zhi bar nye bar 'gro// mkhas pa de dag
18a7(phal chen): bskal pa 'byam klas byon rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu thob/ / zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa'i rnams// ye shes bsam
18b1(phal chen): gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin/ / snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// ye shes rnam thar
18b2(phal chen): kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse/ / rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra// gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes
18b3(phal chen): sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po/ / 'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba med// bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas//
18b4(phal chen): mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis// 'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra// ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon
18b5(phal chen): tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/ / de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// byang
18b6(phal chen): rgyachub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas/ / sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o// rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas
18b7(phal chen): dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pas na/ / zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas// lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes
19a1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te/ / 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtsa ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang ba ston// mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges//
19a2(phal chen): par rnam par rtse// khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa med// mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan// sangs rgyas
19a3(phal chen): sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan/ / de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge/ de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis
19a4(phal chen): brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed/ / dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcog la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston// rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po ting 'dzin dbang la
19a5(phal chen): rab tu gnas/ / bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur// mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston// bag chags
19a6(phal chen): thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin/ / nan tan bya ba 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon
19a7(phal chen): med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob/ / mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags// mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams
19b1(phal chen): yang du sgom pa byed/ / ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston// spyod pa lag pa lnga bu dag dang ldan pa lto yon snying po ye shes mchog/ snying ni rdo rje lta bu
19b2(phal chen): snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/ / shes rab mgo ste chos rtog mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin// tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun pa
19b3(phal chen): zhi byed sna yin te/ / spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin// spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug sa yin// tshangs pa'i lam
19b4(phal chen): rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo/ / gang gis de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul// sems can spyod la rnam par
19b5(phal chen): lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings/ / sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang // bzod pa mi 'khrug brtson 'grus
19b6(phal chen): mi ldog dbang sgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin/ / rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren// skyo med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mong
19b7(phal chen): gnas las btang yang snyoms/ / don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos// ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste// 'gro
20a1(phal chen): ba rnams la thos pa ldan pas mi rims bskal bar 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med/ / nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyil ma yang rab tu bcar/
20a2(phal chen): rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin// nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spang ste rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed// bdud rnams byin gyi rlabs bcom
20a3(phal chen): mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags/ / chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong // lha rnams byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog
20a4(phal chen): gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/ / skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor ba byed// mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor yang
20a5(phal chen): ston/ / chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed// stong pa'i stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bkye zhing yang dag skul ba byed// bdud rnams
20a6(phal chen): btul te byang chub ga 'phang sangs rgyas rnaMs kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ / sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud// gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa
20a7(phal chen): bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung 'gyur nas/ / sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang // rnam pa kun tu sems can mi gnas chos la ma
20b1(phal chen): len spyod pa ma yin pa'o/ / de dag gan spyad pa 'di 'ja mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to// de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/
20b2(phal chen): zhing rnams bye ba spong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te// lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang med// mkhas pas khyer nas
20b3(phal chen): lha'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med/ / 'jog rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gau rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog
20b4(phal chen): de dag yang dag rab tu ston/ / mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang // 'phel zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de
20b5(phal chen): yang ston/ / khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog ma byed// /
20b6(phal chen): zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de// de 'dra'i rjes su dang bzad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad de// 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma rdza ba skar
20b7(phal chen): ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang / / gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang rnams lha dbang 'od// mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrog spu gcig khung nas
21a1(phal chen): 'gyed/ / 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston// 'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/
21a2(phal chen): khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod// srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rgyal bas
21a3(phal chen): bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/ / gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston// gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang
21a4(phal chen): da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston/ / khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed// 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig
21a5(phal chen): la rab tu 'god/ / 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang sgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston//
21a6(phal chen): sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems// de skad lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med// lam rgyud drug
21a7(phal chen): po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing / / brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi yi rnams// gang yang nyan thos rang
21b1(phal chen): rgyas rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la/ / sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston// 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang
21b2(phal chen): 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams/ / thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston// 'du shes dra ba rnam bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes
21b3(phal chen): rnams la dbang sbyar ba/ / bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang chub spyod pa ston// de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston// de dag gang
21b4(phal chen): la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston/ / ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed// de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin
21b5(phal chen): spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug/ lus ni nam mkha' lta bu ngag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso// tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs
21b6(phal chen): rgyan/ / chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste// bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'o thabs la gnas/
21b7(phal chen): pha rol byon pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bcu
22a1(phal chen): ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/ / thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur// stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong
22a2(phal chen): khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o/ / shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin// 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te
22a3(phal chen): ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng / / de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms// gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing // me tog
22a4(phal chen): byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan rgyan/ / stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin// thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung
22a5(phal chen): ba theg pa gsum gyi rtse/ / de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang // gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su mi skye bas// ston pa mchod
22a6(phal chen): cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god/ / kha na ma ze kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed// zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur rags re re nas
22a7(phal chen): kyang bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la/ / bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang sgra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de// skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes
22b1(phal chen): par nus srid kyi/ / sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so// gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang // ga
22b2(phal chen): zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas bde la dgod par 'dod pa dang / / gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'o sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ des ni rdo rje lta
22b3(phal chen): brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos/ / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// /
22b4(phal chen): bam po brgyad cu drug pa// bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal/ skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang / pho zung brtsam
22b5(phal chen): pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'ang lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang
22b6(phal chen): bstan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang
22b7(phal chen): rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal
23a1(phal chen): mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dza med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan/
23a2(phal chen): dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes
23a3(phal chen): rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi
23a4(phal chen): brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i
23a5(phal chen): snying po dang / pad+mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po
23a6(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang
23a7(phal chen): kun nas lta ba'i mog dang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i mig dang / ut+pa la'i mig dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang / byang chub sema?
23b1(phal chen): dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par
23b2(phal chen): byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan dang / de bzhin
23b3(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang
23b4(phal chen): po'i gtsug pud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug pud dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug pud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog
23b5(phal chen): ba'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug pud dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
23b6(phal chen): tha mi dad par rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas
23b7(phal chen): log pa'i gtsug bud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug
24a1(phal chen): dud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen par 'di dang / gza brjod rnam med par 'od dang / na patsha'i 'ad dang / rdul dang thal ba' 'ad dang / skang pa' 'ad dang
24a2(phal chen): chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal
24a3(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems
24a4(phal chen): dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po
24a5(phal chen): 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang
24a6(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sem
24a7(phal chen): dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang /
24b1(phal chen): grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun tu snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ya shas rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/
24b2(phal chen): pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang /
24b3(phal chen): kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems
24b4(phal chen): dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i
24b5(phal chen): dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
24b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa med pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i sgra dang /
24b7(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su skul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
25a1(phal chen): gcom med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med
25a2(phal chen): pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de
25a3(phal chen): dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par
25a4(phal chen): 'gengs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par
25a5(phal chen): 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/
25a6(phal chen): nyebar 'dong ba rgyun mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par
25a7(phal chen): shes pa rnam par dag pas bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa mi zad pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis
25b1(phal chen): klas par ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab rib med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams
25b2(phal chen): cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/
25b3(phal chen): thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags
25b4(phal chen): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa/
25b5(phal chen): nam mkha' lhar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tsom dang / nam nur dang / yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag
25b6(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems
25b7(phal chen): can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang
26a1(phal chen): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyad yul las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rags
26a2(phal chen): yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag
26a3(phal chen): dang yang thabs cig go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang
26a4(phal chen): bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin
26a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
26a6(phal chen): ba'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang //
26a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spyad pa'o dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen
26b1(phal chen): po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa zag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / yang dag par zhugs pa
26b2(phal chen): ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa 'am/ khong du chud pa 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ yongs su shes pa 'am/ rnam par rtogs pa 'am/ gzung ba 'am/ rnam par
26b3(phal chen): dpyad pa 'am/ rnam par bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par dbye ba 'am/ rnam par dgrol ba 'am/ rab tu brjod pa 'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das
26b4(phal chen): nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi chog dang
26b5(phal chen): brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul
26b6(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par
26b7(phal chen): bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan zang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lnga'ang yang
27a1(phal chen): dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa'i dkyil
27a2(phal chen): 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lha'ang yang dag par bstan
27a3(phal chen): grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i dbyung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang
27a4(phal chen): dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon
27a5(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lha'ang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
27a6(phal chen): bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhong yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag
27a7(phal chen): par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer
27b1(phal chen): la mnga' mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
27b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lha'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang
27b3(phal chen): yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / yon ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lha'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems
27b4(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul
27b5(phal chen): pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lha'ang yang dag par
27b6(phal chen): bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang /
27b7(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam
28a1(phal chen): mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs
28a2(phal chen): rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par gzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho brang brtsegs pa rgyun chen po
28a3(phal chen): can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing / rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i
28a4(phal chen): me tog sil mas chal par gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa bkram pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /
28a5(phal chen): rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / pu shu dang / skar khung
28a6(phal chen): byas shing / khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che
28a7(phal chen): rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang / sgo dang rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par
28b1(phal chen): 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them gas kyi 'phreng
28b2(phal chen): ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing / shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing
28b3(phal chen): rgyache bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang / chu zheng kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang /
28b4(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba dang /
28b5(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i 'phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa glong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i
28b6(phal chen): spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu
28b7(phal chen): brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur te/ rin po che'i me tog pud+d+ha ri ka'i 'phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gas lo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing shin tu 'phags pas mdzes
29a1(phal chen): par bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'phreng ba bsam gyis po khyab pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu ran
29a2(phal chen): po che grangs med pa'i dra ba kun tu snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos thams cad kyi ngad kun
29a3(phal chen): nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
29a4(phal chen): rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs
29a5(phal chen): kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu
29a6(phal chen): sgeg pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal
29a7(phal chen): mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun
29b1(phal chen): nas gnas par gyur te/ 'dzena'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'dze ta'i tshal tshad kyang ma
29b2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo rdung ba dang
29b3(phal chen): dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun
29b4(phal chen): nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing // de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i
29b5(phal chen): sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa
29b6(phal chen): dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i/
29b7(phal chen): mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam
30a1(phal chen): gyis mo khyab pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ches dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang byin rgya
30a2(phal chen): rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
30a3(phal chen): phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa
30a4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston pa mdzad pa
30a5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston pa mdzad pa
30a6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'brum klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro//
30a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i smon 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam
30b1(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su son pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'jo/
30b2(phal chen): ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
30b3(phal chen): gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par
30b4(phal chen): gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char
30b5(phal chen): mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi bkod
30b6(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis
