30b7(phal chen): kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi dang / so mongang
31a1(phal chen): rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang / na dun rgya
31a2(phal chen): char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab
31a3(phal chen): tu 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+ma
31a4(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can du chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'o ze ba la rol mo bkod pa/ kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs
31a5(phal chen): kyi dra ba dang / rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i 'phreng ba dang / se mo dos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
31a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
31a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/
31b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu
31b2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab
31b3(phal chen): pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas
31b4(phal chen): kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna
31b5(phal chen): tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis brlab pa
31b6(phal chen): dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gangs par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba dang lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
31b7(phal chen): der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brtan te/ khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri
32a1(phal chen): nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i bad+mar snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems
32a2(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed
32a3(phal chen): kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
32a4(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu
32a5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lnga ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs
32a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang dra ba chen pos kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad kyi me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang
32a7(phal chen): 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang
32b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'brang bas yangs su gzung bar byin gyis brdab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nar bu ngan pa can/
32b2(phal chen): tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lnga ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
32b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi
32b4(phal chen): 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab
32b5(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing // mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
32b6(phal chen): khams gang na ba dar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogasasu brtan te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam
32b7(phal chen): par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun
33a1(phal chen): nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs
33a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings
33a3(phal chen): kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med
33a4(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang
33a5(phal chen): dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan
33a6(phal chen): pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ro rab
33a7(phal chen): kyi spron/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas
33b1(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu zab snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung ba sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'ja
33b2(phal chen): ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil
33b3(phal chen): 'khor sna tshogs kyi dkod pa dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po
33b4(phal chen): che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/ bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyis rgyas
33b5(phal chen): par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
33b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / rnam mkha'i dbyings tham cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin
33b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po
34a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /
34a2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha'i rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin
34a3(phal chen): papa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
34a4(phal chen): po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten khams gang na ba der
34a5(phal chen): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brtan te/ khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi
34a6(phal chen): lhun po dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gse
34a7(phal chen): gyi dra ba kun nas brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo lung bcas te 'khod do// byang
34b1(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
34b2(phal chen): gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
34b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i
34b4(phal chen): dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par
34b5(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brtan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam ma ba dpying
34b6(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis
34b7(phal chen): rgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po
35a1(phal chen): che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab papa/ nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu rin
35a2(phal chen): po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yong su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang
35a3(phal chen): ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang
35a4(phal chen): ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed
35a5(phal chen): cing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bder lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang skyes
35a6(phal chen): su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa btsogs pa dang / seng ge'i khri bai DUR+Ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can rag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po se
35a7(phal chen): ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te
35b1(phal chen): 'khod do/ / byung dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen pa
35b2(phal chen): thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi na pa rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' co
35b3(phal chen): dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam tha ba zhes byab/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'arjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za bsnyed dang ldan cig tu/ bcom ldan
35b4(phal chen): des gnang nas rje'i ri gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor nas 'phagasate/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i ga pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis
35b5(phal chen): brnab pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams rang 'brum thams cad thos kyi 'ang ba brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
35b6(phal chen): thams cad 'dug spos kyi yang ba brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'brum thams cad tsan dran gyi 'ang pa brjems
35b7(phal chen): dr-in gyis kun nas thebs par byer gyis brnang pa dang / 'jog rten gyi khams rab 'bum thams cad me tog gi 'ang pa brtsegs pa tshe smin gyis kun nas lems par byin gyis ba
36a1(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab
36a2(phal chen): 'byam thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun
36a3(phal chen): nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten
36a4(phal chen): gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
36a5(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi
36a6(phal chen): dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dra
36a7(phal chen): yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te
36b1(phal chen): 'khod do/ / shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi
36b2(phal chen): sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
36b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas
36b4(phal chen): 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog
36b5(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
36b6(phal chen): gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam
36b7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i shing gi yal
37a1(phal chen): ka'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis ba tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta
37a2(phal chen): bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun
37a3(phal chen): tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang // nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba
37a4(phal chen): dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamam gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan
37a5(phal chen): 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun
37a6(phal chen): sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar
37a7(phal chen): ba'i dra bas yongasu brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
37b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ring po che'i nyi ma'i rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
37b2(phal chen): gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan
37b3(phal chen): zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi
37b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ba thams cad
37b5(phal chen): nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprir nam mkha' dbyings ltar yang sa
37b6(phal chen): ba rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdugs pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar
37b7(phal chen): yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ka thams cad nas klu sa rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga
38a1(phal chen): thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba sku'i bu ka thams cad nas nor bu rin mo
38a2(phal chen): chetsheche gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam
38a3(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings ltar yat+pa pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam
38a4(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba byed cing / / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham gang na ba der lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
38a5(phal chen): nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ / nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
38a6(phal chen): seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang // rin po che'i rgyal po
38a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems rapa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub dang / nga gi phyogs
38b1(phal chen): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
38b2(phal chen): gyi ri bo kun rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam yis shes dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
38b3(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams
38b4(phal chen): cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo
38b5(phal chen): thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i
38b6(phal chen): sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe
38b7(phal chen): byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin
39a1(phal chen): kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / sus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
39a2(phal chen): cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i nyan thos
39a3(phal chen): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs
39a4(phal chen): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams
39a5(phal chen): cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
39a6(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dbye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang
39a7(phal chen): baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprir kun tu dgye ba skad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams ca
39b1(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs shing / / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byang gi rtsos
39b2(phal chen): mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyog kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tika 'od thug pa med pa'i dra bas
39b3(phal chen): yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs
39b4(phal chen): k yi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes
39b5(phal chen): bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i
39b6(phal chen): ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi
39b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang / sgra dang / dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi
40a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho
40a2(phal chen): dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
40a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i
40a4(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dkrug ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub pa'i snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya
40a5(phal chen): ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgrag
40a6(phal chen): pa dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang /
40a7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang / thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kang
40b1(phal chen): na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'og gi phyogs su brtan te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan du rab tu sna
40b2(phal chen): ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can yongs su gzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i snying
40b3(phal chen): popo byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//
40b4(phal chen): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba/
40b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtog pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
40b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad
40b7(phal chen): dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang // yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
41a1(phal chen): 'khor thams cad dang / bdag dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mu
41a2(phal chen): thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin
41a3(phal chen): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i sgo dang / lus thams
41a4(phal chen): cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang / smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang
41a5(phal chen): ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor
41a6(phal chen): brgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang
41a7(phal chen): bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su
41b1(phal chen): bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / shin tu
41b2(phal chen): zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba
41b3(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems
41b4(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mnan pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan
41b5(phal chen): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bka' ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor brgya
41b6(phal chen): mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan
41b7(phal chen): 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brtan te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying
42a1(phal chen): po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtsha
42a2(phal chen): dbyings su sgrog pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//
42a3(phal chen): / bam po brgyad cu bdun pa// / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
42a4(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba/ ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
42a5(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang mdo sde'i tshul gyi gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/
42a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ste/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul bas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rnam par dgang ba'i
42a7(phal chen): yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams
42b1(phal chen): gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
42b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug smra ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab
42b3(phal chen): tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes pas byung ba/ las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs
42b4(phal chen): brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa
42b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/ mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor
42b6(phal chen): zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/
42b7(phal chen): chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ bdud kyi dkyil
43a1(phal chen): 'khor thams cad rnam par dgug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ / dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu tho
43a2(phal chen): pa gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye
43a3(phal chen): shes kyi spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tham
43a4(phal chen): cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams gyad kyi dbyibs
43a5(phal chen): phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa// shin tu phra bar rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/ dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang
43a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du
43a7(phal chen): mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs padz+ra
43b1(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal
43b2(phal chen): gyibu dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / nam gru dang / rab 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos po dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la sogs pas 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khor bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs
43b3(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang /
43b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par sprul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'ang ma
43b5(phal chen): mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang /
43b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub
43b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khor pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub
44a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bgyis/
44a2(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems rapa'i yongs su smin
44a3(phal chen): par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub
44a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshegs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems
44a5(phal chen): dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'or zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
44a6(phal chen): phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa'ang ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs pa'i phyir te/
44a7(phal chen): de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so// de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
44b1(phal chen): gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do/ / de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sang
44b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzad do/ / de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe// sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskal
44b3(phal chen): ba ma byas so/ / de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyan mi 'chad pa'i phyir
44b4(phal chen): zhugs pa ma yin no/ / de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bsku
44b5(phal chen): ba ma byas so/ / de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
44b6(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byas so/ / de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so// de dag gis ni sangs
44b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud ro/ / de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten
45a1(phal chen): ya su ya ma ma tha ma mas pa sa 'a pa byang chub sems pa'i sa byu smra na / / sna sa m+b+ha g
45a2(phal chen): yis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos
45a3(phal chen): gyis chubapa/ byang chub sems dpa mi 'du shes ma tshogs yangs su badzin pa rgyan gyis rnams pa// byang chub sems dpa'i dag pa'i shug sbyin pa rnam par 'phel par byed pa 'ang ma
45a4(phal chen): do/ / de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong ngo // mi thos so// mi shes so//
45a5(phal chen): khong du mi chud do// mi rtogs so// mi rig go// yid mi ches so// mi sems so// rnam par mi lta'o// rtogs par mi lta'o// nges par mi lta'o// nye bar mi sems so// de ci/
45a6(phal chen): phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
45a7(phal chen): de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag la de dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dag gi/
45b1(phal chen): dmigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do// de dag shes pa dang lta ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba 'am/ rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang bar/
45b2(phal chen): bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par blta ba 'am/ nyams su myong bar bya ba 'am/ gnan pa 'am/ rnam par gnon pa 'am/ gzhan gyis thos par bya ba 'am/ bstan par bya ba'am
45b3(phal chen): smos par bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'am/ bstabs par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba 'am/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am
45b4(phal chen): rab tu dgod par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do// de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do// de lta bu'i
45b5(phal chen): mchog gi mthu med do/ / de lta bu'i stobs med do// de lta bu'i dbang med do// de lta bu'i gnas med do// de lta bu'i 'du shes med do// de lta bu'i mig gi mthu med do// de lta bu'i ye shes med do//
45b6(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa
45b7(phal chen): 'den pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug po/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi sdod pa
46a1(phal chen): rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / g.yas g.yon dang snam na/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du
46a2(phal chen): lta bar gnas kyang / 'dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma bsgrubs
46a3(phal chen): pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par
46a4(phal chen): ma btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de
46a5(phal chen): dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems
46a6(phal chen): dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / de bzhin gshegs
46a7(phal chen): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'ang mthong bar ma gyur to//
46b1(phal chen): yang 'di lta ste/ dper na gang+gA'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshu rol tu yi dgas bkres pa dang skom pas rab tu mnar ba/ gcer ba/ gos med pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing 'chums pa
46b2(phal chen): dang rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang pos gtse ba/ spyang khyi dang wa sa mtho btsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang / pad+ma'i chu klung chen po mi mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs
46b3(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ la las ni bskams te chu med par mthong ngo // la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /
46b4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gis mig kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/
46b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su mi la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log par gyur
46b6(phal chen): nas de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyid na lha'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/
46b7(phal chen): lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang / mu
47a1(phal chen): smyig gi 'phreng ba dang / rin po che'i can dang / saM mo das tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyis la ldan rnam bya ma tshags rlung gis yongs su bskyod rnyig sku dbyangs yid du
47a2(phal chen): 'ong la snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sku yid
47a3(phal chen): du'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la/ lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis
47a4(phal chen): gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong mi shes khong du mi chud do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni skyes bu gnyis kyis log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi// gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po
47a5(phal chen): dag gis blta ba ma yin no/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po dang / rang gi dpe
47a6(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang
47a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems
47b1(phal chen): sam snang ba byang pa dang / sa la byags pa dang / d+hA nungs pa sa mas thalas pa sum na
47b2(phal chen): sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spong pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mi shes kyi spyod sras thams cad sa chags pa med par rnam par spyod pas/ bsam gyi
47b3(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing yong du chung la nyams su spong bar gyur kya / thos chen po mchog gi 'jung
47b4(phal chen): dang bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong bar mgyur shes par mgyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na ro'i rgyal po khab can ldan gyi 'byung gnas kyis
47b5(phal chen): gang ba la/ sngags dang / rig sngags dang / sman gyi tshul dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing / rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa/ sman blang ba'i las byed kyang
47b6(phal chen): ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang / ba glang dang / ra lug 'tsho ba dang / rngon pa dang / de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyi tshul mi shes pa gzhan dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman
47b7(phal chen): gyi ro dang / mthu dang / yon tan dang / byin dang / thabs dang / 'phrong ba mi shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems
48a1(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul gyis byung ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang / nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung
48a2(phal chen): dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bdes
48a3(phal chen): spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las/ phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po rin po che thams cad
48a4(phal chen): kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shig
48a5(phal chen): byang ba'i mi/ rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gi blo shin tu byang ba/ gter gyi gtsug lag dang / rgyus dang / ngan rtags gya nom par lobs pa/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis
48a6(phal chen): brtan pa dag/ de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing bdag kyang yongs su tshim par byed/ pha dang ma la'ang legs par rim gro byed/ bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing / de ma
48a7(phal chen): yin pa'i sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / gos kyis mi 'byor pa rnams la btud cing khyab par bgo bsha' byed pa/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs
48b1(phal chen): nyams su myong bar byed kyang / sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus mi shes pa/ bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin po che la shes pa'i mig yongs su ma dag pa/ de dag de nyid
48b2(phal chen): na 'khod kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang / rin po che'i gter de dag khong du mi chud mi shes pas/ rin po che'ang blang du med do// rin po che'i don kyang byar med do// de bzhin du byang chub
48b3(phal chen): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de
48b4(phal chen): dag 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa
48b5(phal chen): dang rim gro la brtson zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
48b6(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu'ang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis po gos kyis bkab
48b7(phal chen): ste rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de mi mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing dang /
49a1(phal chen): gos kyi rin po che dang / spos kyi rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la/ rin po che de dag gaspyod yub lam/ rin thang ngam/ yongs su spyad pa'i rgyas
49a2(phal chen): kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong bar mi byed do// gang gi mig la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing
49a3(phal chen): shes so/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis/ bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa mngon
49a4(phal chen): du gyur to/ / 'dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pa mthong yang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
49a5(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i tshegs mang po de lta bu'i rin
49a6(phal chen): po che'i 'byung gnas chen po'ang mthong bar ma gyur to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltar thams
49a7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do// de dag gis chos kyi
49b1(phal chen): dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud do/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na mig yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rab dang / mun pa thams
49b2(phal chen): cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag
49b3(phal chen): par gyur pa'i nang na/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / mun pa'i rab rib gyis mig yongs su 'khrigs par gyur pa'i mi'i
49b4(phal chen): khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang / mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod pa de mi mthong mi shes so// skyes
49b5(phal chen): bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs tha dad du mngon par bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa/ dmigs
49b6(phal chen): pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams cad kyang mi mthong ba med do/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang
49b7(phal chen): ldan pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin
50a1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i tshe 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar smram+WAr to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po la bul
50a2(phal chen): mthong bar ma gyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su skus khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/ chus khyab pa 'am/ mes khyab pa'am/
50a3(phal chen): rlung gis khyab la'am/ sngon pos khyab pa 'am/ ser pos khyab pa 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa pas/
50a4(phal chen): sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo // me'i snang ba de'ang mi
50a5(phal chen): mthong ngo / / sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du'ang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma
50a6(phal chen): gtogs so/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan pa mdzad na/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong
50a7(phal chen): zhing shes par ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo // khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/
50b1(phal chen): dper na sru ba rngub pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bsdus ma thag tu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo // des ni 'gro 'am/ 'dug gas/ baphreng yang rung ste/ skye bo mang po thams cad mthong /
50b2(phal chen): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongs su 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
50b3(phal chen): ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper
50b4(phal chen): mi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni des mi de mthong yang / mis lnga de mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la bzhugs pa/ byang chub
50b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
50b6(phal chen): pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong sems can thams
50b7(phal chen): cad la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su
51a1(phal chen): mi myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin la/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas de na yod kyang / snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthu des
51a2(phal chen): mi shes mi mthong ngo / / de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshul de na'ang rnam par spyod la/ de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul
51a3(phal chen): pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur/ shes par ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub
51a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chung ma mthong ma shes so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la tshad med de/ blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/
51a5(phal chen): khong du chud par dka' la/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o// de
51a6(phal chen): bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de
51a7(phal chen): dag kyang ma mthong ngo / / 'dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang / bkod pa yongs su 'dus pa de'ang ma mthong ma shes te/ de ni
51b1(phal chen): snong du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tsham
51b2(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / ltos shig sems can dam pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab// rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// 'dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'dir bstan to// rang byung
51b3(phal chen): rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs/ / bgrang du med par 'byung ba la// sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i// 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so// chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag/ tshad med bsam
51b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab cing / / shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni// de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog/ mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs// yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed
51b5(phal chen): pa yi/ / chos rab de dag mtshan nyid med// rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'i// rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag/ rgyal bas 'dze ba'i tshal du bstan/
51b6(phal chen): rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams// zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas// rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste// kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos// smon lam yongs su phun sum tshogs//
51b7(phal chen): spyod la ma spyod pa chags med pa// de dag bsam pa shes par ni// 'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so// de dag sems dang spyod yul dang // spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang // rang rgyal thams cad
52a1(phal chen): yongs kyis kyang / / rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams// gzhan gyis thub dka' bam med la// dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing /
52a2(phal chen): ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa// ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la// zags chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams// chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston//
52a3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs
52a4(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / bsod nams snying po shes rab che// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing // 'jig rten gun la bde byed pa'i// bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos//
52a5(phal chen): yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing // shin tu mnyam gzhag sems ldan pa// mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi// ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can// rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i//
52a6(phal chen): 'dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba// byang chub sems dpa' kun rgyas shing // bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur par// gnas med mi gnas gyur pa'i rnams// phyogs rnams bcu kun 'dus
52a7(phal chen): te/ / pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag/ rgya mtsho mngal lta bgyis// gnas med len pa med pa'i rnams// spros pa med cing mi rten la// rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa// chos kyi dbyings la
52b1(phal chen): gzhol ba dang / / ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba// rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing // grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la// mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa// phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba'i rnams/
52b2(phal chen): grangs kyis mi chod kun nas 'dus// yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags// gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs// rang byung shAkya seng ge yi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong // de yi byin
52b3(phal chen): rlabs dam pa yis/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags// sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med// chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te// spyod pa tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i// pha rol
52b4(phal chen): phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/ / chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i// mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas// tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas// chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu byed//
52b5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
52b6(phal chen): ltos shig sems can dam pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs// dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing // sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// mu stegs ldan pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i//
52b7(phal chen): rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston// phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams// sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzhud//
53a1(phal chen): tshad med pa dang tshad yod las// thub pa chen po 'das pa min// nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni// nyin par bgrangs pa smos pa byed// de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa/
53a2(phal chen): dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod// zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang // de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i// mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin//
53a3(phal chen): bar snang nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni// gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no// ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams kyi//
53a4(phal chen): zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya// ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na// lus can kun gyi gnas yin pas// 'jig rten sgron
53a5(phal chen): ma'i 'jig rten na/ / chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas// ji ltar rlung ni chags med par// mkha' la mgyogs par rab rgyu ba// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang // 'jig rten khams su rab tu
53a6(phal chen): rgyu/ ji ltar chu yi phung po la// zhing rnams bgrangs pa kun gnas pa// de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang // ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems
53a7(phal chen): dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad 'di dag smras so// ji ltar rdo rje'i ri rab brag
53b1(phal chen): zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa/ / de ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i// sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag/ tshad med rnyog pa med pa ltar// sangs rgyas
53b2(phal chen): mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ / 'jig rten kun gyi sgom pa gcod// rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi// ri bo ri rab ci 'dra bar// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yang // chos kyi mtsho las mngon par
53b3(phal chen): 'phags/ / rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis// rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du// rang byung ye shes de bzhin te// mi zad skad cig rab tu mkhyen// mgon po'i ye shes shin tu zab// tshad med de/
53b4(phal chen): bzhin bgrang du med// de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston// sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi// sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen
53b5(phal chen): dbang yang / / rnam par 'phral pa rab tu ston// yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa// bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba// de bzhi bsam pa dag pa la// rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad// 'od snang
53b6(phal chen): gsal ba byed pa yi/ / rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba// de ltar thams cad mkhyen dag pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad// ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i// rin chen zur brgyad rab gnas
53b7(phal chen): ba/ / de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang // chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad// chu 'dang rin chen 'od gsal ba// ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang // 'gre
54a1(phal chen): ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul pa'i zla ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
54a2(phal chen): rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// phyogs 'di in+d+ra nI la yis// kha dog mdog gcig byas pa ltar// sangs rgyas mthong bas skye dgu
54a3(phal chen): rnams/ / de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad//
54a4(phal chen): de ni rmad byung shin tu zab// mtha' yas bsgrub pa dka' ba ste// blo ldan ye shes yul de la// 'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus// byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du// bkod pa phun
54a5(phal chen): sum tshogs pa dang / / sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam spangs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam yas pa// blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis// kun
54a6(phal chen): nas gang bar gyur pa yang / / rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad// chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste// shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur// de yi tshe 'phrul tshad med pa// 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin//
54a7(phal chen): brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa// tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad// 'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams// chos kyi
54b1(phal chen): / / dbyings la slob pa mdzad// chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang // chags med ye shes spong yul 'gyur// skyes bu'i dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis// cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing // 'jig
54b2(phal chen): rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang // ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs spungs shing // shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams// 'jig
54b3(phal chen): rten thams cad 'grel par 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
54b4(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi// dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba// de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi// gshegs thabs
54b5(phal chen): 'jog 'degs mi shes so/ / dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba// de dag gis kyang mgon po yi// gshegs thabs 'jog 'degs mi rig go/ ma rig mun
54b6(phal chen): pas bsgribs pa rnams/ / khyi ltar ltong la brgyus pa yi// sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni// mgon po mi shes smos mi dgos// rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba min// de ni shes par mi nus te// sangs
54b7(phal chen): rgyas chags med ye shes can/ / tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das// zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba// brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris// de ni bskal pa dpag yas par// rnam 'phrul thogs
55a1(phal chen): med spyod pa mdzad/ / tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsams byas kyang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa// brjod du med pa zad 'gyur gyi/
55a2(phal chen): rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las// phyogs gcig cha yi mthar mi phyin// sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang // sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig de la smon byed cing // gang zhig
55a3(phal chen): yid kyis dga' mos pa/ / de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing // tshogs chen yangs pas rnam gnon la// dri med
55a4(phal chen): blo ldan sems gnas pa/ / de dag 'di yi tshul la 'jug/ de dag smon lam rgya che bas// sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing // byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur/
55a5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te
55a6(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcud pa 'di dag smras so/ / chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas// bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas// de dag bsam par mi nus so// 'phrin las dkar po bsam
55a7(phal chen): yas pas/ / sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrubs pa'i phyir// de la 'jig rten gsum mi 'go/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam spangs pas// 'jig
55b1(phal chen): rten kun tu snang ba mdzad/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te// ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no// chags pa thams cad rnam sbyangs pas// rdul med spros pa mi mnga' 'o// ye shes 'od zer rab
55b2(phal chen): 'gyed pas/ / 'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra// khams gsum thams cad rnam spong bas// srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad// byang chub
55b3(phal chen): 'byung gnas de bzhin no/ / kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang // kha dog kun la gnas pa med// sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i// kha dog tshad med yongs su ston// skad cig
55b4(phal chen): gcig la sangs rgyas kyis/ / byang chub bsam yas spangs pas na// de yi ye shes mthar phyin par// brtag par sus kyang mi nus so// ye shes brtan pa zad mi shes// rang bzhin
55b5(phal chen): rnam par 'gyur ba med/ / de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun// skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod// rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste// shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas// sems
55b6(phal chen): la sems shes bya bar yang / / de la sems skye med par bsam// gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin//
55b7(phal chen): shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs
56a1(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dran pa rmongs med dag pa'i rnams// chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing // blo gros bsam
56a2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab la/ / byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad pa// de dag yid ni 'di la nges// de dag spod pa'i spyod yul yin// de dag shes pa 'dir mi g.yo// de dag 'di la the tsom 'chad// de dag skyo bar
56a3(phal chen): mi 'gyur te/ / de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar// de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung // de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing // yang dag 'phags pa rab tu/
56a4(phal chen): skye// dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi// ye shes 'di la de dag dga'// bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi// yongs su rdzogs pa dge ba'i chos// ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs med pa// de dag
56a5(phal chen): thams cad yongs su bsngo/ / 'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang // 'khor ba dag la gnas pa min// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas// sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse// sems can khams
56a6(phal chen): na ji snyed du/ / 'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba// de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs// sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas// sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang // 'jig rten don med
56a7(phal chen): rab tu gnas/ / chags med spyod pa de dag ni// rtag tu sems can don la gnas// de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de// lus can kun gyis bsam mi khya'o// 'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas/
56b1(phal chen): dedag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog/ 'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing // byang chub ye shes rnam dag pas// de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel/
56b2(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
56b3(phal chen): dag smras so/ / bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sangs rgyas sgra ni rab dkon na// the tsom thams cad gcod pa yi// dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos// chos kun thugs su chud rtog pa// 'jig rten
56b4(phal chen): gsum po'i bsod nams stegs/ / sems can thams cad rnam spong ba'i// 'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'// sems can gtso bo ma smad pa'i// gzugs kyi skra ni mthong gyur na//
56b5(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// ngoms shing tshim pa skyer mi btub// mi yi dbang po'i sku gzugs la// rgyal ba'i sras rnams lta lta zhing // rang gi dge ba chags med pa// gzhan don brtson
56b6(phal chen): pa byang chub bsngo/ / thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku// de las tha dad yang dag shes// chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas// de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo// sems can bsam yas tshad med pa//
56b7(phal chen): snang bar mdzad de theg chen la// btsud nas thub pa chen po'i mchog/ byang chub dam par lung yang ston// bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing // ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing byang // 'jig rten tshad med kun
57a1(phal chen): tu snang / / bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad// sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcod// ye shes phung po rnam par spong // gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba// de dag ngan
57a2(phal chen): song 'jigs pa med/ / rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na// shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste// 'od snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu// grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu'i
57a3(phal chen): mchog mthong zhing / / byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes// de nag kun kyang nges par sems/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
57a4(phal chen): kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa// shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas//
57a5(phal chen): yongs su sngo ba byed pa'i sems// theg pa che la rnam par dag/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// thugs rje che mnga' brtan pa'i rnams// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa// de bzhin gshags
57a6(phal chen): pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ / bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang // sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams// kun gyis lan bla na cis kyang nus// ngan song
57a7(phal chen): gsum po mi bzad par/ / bskal pa bye bar bcos bla yi// chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i// ston pa mi mthong ma yin no// sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na// sdug bsngal phung po
57b1(phal chen): yod pa/ / ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi// sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na// tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa// de dag yun ring gnas bla yi// sangs
57b2(phal chen): rgyas mi thos ma yin no/ / sems can dmyal ba re re yang // bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi// mtha' yas rgyal bas brnyes pa yi// byang chub mchog las ring gnas min// ci zhig phyir ni /
57b3(phal chen): ngan song du// yun ring gnas pas 'dod ce na// rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni// ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir// rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na// sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par
57b4(phal chen): 'gyur/ / rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi// ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung // sangs rgyas mi yi mchog mthong zhing // sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur// byang chub gang gis 'thob pa
57b5(phal chen): yi/ / bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams// the tsom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi// bsam pa'ang
57b6(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te// de
57b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang / rgya cher brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang / rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par
58a1(phal chen): bstan pa dang / shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang / man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum
58a2(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi
58a3(phal chen): bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi
58a4(phal chen): dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te
58a5(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang /
58a6(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskul par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang
