58a7(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bstan
58b1(phal chen): pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub mngon du
58b2(phal chen): gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
58b3(phal chen): dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mchi gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing / lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di
58b4(phal chen): lta ste/ dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/
58b5(phal chen): zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang
58b6(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad pa spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par
58b7(phal chen): 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub pa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang
59a1(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di
59a2(phal chen): la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod
59a3(phal chen): yul lo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir/
59a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab
59a5(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phral pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par gzhol ba la
59a6(phal chen): rnam par bltas nas/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas
59a7(phal chen): nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ba spu gcig la
59b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing / / zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam// de na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/
59b2(phal chen): spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho rnams// snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas// chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing // shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang // zhing
59b3(phal chen): rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang snyed/ / rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad//
59b4(phal chen): zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa// de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas// rab 'byam zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong //
59b5(phal chen): zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od// phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas par kun bkang zhing // ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang /
59b6(phal chen): zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab tu ston// chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho// de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong // rab
59b7(phal chen): 'byam zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing / / byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te// chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni// zhing gcig tu'ang bskal pa bye bar spyod// bya nus
60a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa byed/ / chos kyi gang chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang // smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug/ de dag sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas/
60a2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i// de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes// sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang // rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yang sa la 'jug/ bder
60a3(phal chen): gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing / / zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i// sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing // chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la 'god//
60a4(phal chen): / bam po brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings
60a5(phal chen): pa 'di nyid la de bas kyang brnan te dgod par mdzad pa'i don du smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas/ chos kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od
60a6(phal chen): zer chen po/ 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
60a7(phal chen): 'byam klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
60b1(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas
60b2(phal chen): kyi zhing gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po
60b3(phal chen): byang chub tu phyin te seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
60b4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i
60b5(phal chen): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngo / / la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni gnod sprin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la na
60b6(phal chen): ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi 'am ci'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i
60b7(phal chen): dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs
61a1(phal chen): dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang
61a2(phal chen): rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang /
61a3(phal chen): gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur te/
61a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pas
61a5(phal chen): 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi ming du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba/
61a6(phal chen): phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
61a7(phal chen): dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang
61b1(phal chen): steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcud ltar byung
61b2(phal chen): ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i khongs thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs
61b3(phal chen): la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang / las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i
61b4(phal chen): dbyings kyi ming du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khong du chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems
61b5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su
61b6(phal chen): gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phral pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la
61b7(phal chen): mngon par lta ba dmigs par bya bas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas/ sems ca
62a1(phal chen): gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
62a2(phal chen): cad yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa skal ba
62a3(phal chen): mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po gzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go// sngon bla na med pa yang
62a4(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa
62a5(phal chen): dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting
62a6(phal chen): nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/ la la ni chos kyi sku la
62a7(phal chen): 'jug go/ la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go/ la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go// la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go// la le ni spyod
62b1(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go/ la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ la la ni
62b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i rnam par 'phral pa la 'jug go/ / la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go/ la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa
62b3(phal chen): yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go/ / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phral pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
62b4(phal chen): la 'jug ste/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / lam sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / rjes su 'brang
62b5(phal chen): ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang /
62b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go// ting nge 'dzin sna
62b7(phal chen): tshegs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs
63a1(phal chen): pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
63a2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
63a3(phal chen): 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon
63a4(phal chen): cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi glong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings
63a5(phal chen): thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrog pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyan pa'i 'od kyis/ byang chub sems
63a6(phal chen): dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs
63a7(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten
63b1(phal chen): gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
63b2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub
63b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhi le rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang rlab sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas kun tu 'phral pa'i gzug
63b4(phal chen): brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa
63b5(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po'i kha dog gis rnam par spod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad
63b6(phal chen): du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs
63b7(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la non tan gyis 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul
64a1(phal chen): pa mngon par bsgrubs pas phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la
64a2(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i
64a3(phal chen): zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs
64a4(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing
64a5(phal chen): gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par bslab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu
64a6(phal chen): thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi
64a7(phal chen): cha la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byam klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston
64b1(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems
64b2(phal chen): can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi glong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
64b3(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
64b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
64b5(phal chen): rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub
64b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil
64b7(phal chen): 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pa dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin glong mi gso
65a1(phal chen): pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig
65a2(phal chen): gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gis tshig rab tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la
65a3(phal chen): rab tu 'jug go/ / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la
65a4(phal chen): mthar thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra
65a5(phal chen): bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub
65a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam
65a7(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i
65b1(phal chen): rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig la 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting '
65b2(phal chen): dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkhar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang
65b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub
65b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
65b5(phal chen): 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems
65b6(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
65b7(phal chen): 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongang su bstan pas kun tu rnam par dmigs
66a1(phal chen): pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
66a2(phal chen): 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
66a3(phal chen): 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad+mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub
66a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i glong dang /
66a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems
66a6(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes
66a7(phal chen): pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlangs dang
66b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab
66b2(phal chen): tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad
66b3(phal chen): cig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig pas chos thams cad tshul
66b4(phal chen): gcig par rnam par 'god pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjed byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
66b5(phal chen): denge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi gzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub
66b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa
66b7(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can thams cad la mngon du byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi
67a1(phal chen): / yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du
67a2(phal chen): rud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du
67a3(phal chen): rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
67a4(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin
67a5(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par
67a6(phal chen): 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa'ang rjes su dran no/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing / bcom
67a7(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs
67b1(phal chen): pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa/ ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par
67b2(phal chen): sprod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang
67b3(phal chen): bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ chos thams
67b4(phal chen): cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med par
67b5(phal chen): zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa med par chos thams cad blang du med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la
67b6(phal chen): zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes
67b7(phal chen): kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil
68a1(phal chen): 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu
68a2(phal chen): rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sgra
68a3(phal chen): brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil
68a4(phal chen): 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
68a5(phal chen): kyis dogs pa med par kun nas rab tu gnon pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/
68a6(phal chen): shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol
68a7(phal chen): tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang
68b1(phal chen): ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/ spobs pa'i stobs dang chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu
68b2(phal chen): mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig
68b3(phal chen): pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa'i shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba
68b4(phal chen): thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol
68b5(phal chen): ba la dpa' ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa
68b6(phal chen): med pa/ zad pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi
68b7(phal chen): mig mngon sum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/ mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam
69a1(phal chen): par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ ye shes kyi
69a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mun pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ thos pa dang / mthong ba dang /
69a3(phal chen): smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcad pa la shin tu dpa' ba
69a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pa/
69a5(phal chen): 'gro ba gdul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor
69a6(phal chen): yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba// ye shes kyi
69a7(phal chen): nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/
69b1(phal chen): chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa/ phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang sgyur ba
69b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sa zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang / yi ge dang / don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad
69b3(phal chen): tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/
69b4(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pas 'jig rten thams cad mngon
69b5(phal chen): par shes pa/ chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
69b6(phal chen): ba las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad
69b7(phal chen): rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/ dmigs pa thams cad la rgyan bzang
70a1(phal chen): por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang
70a2(phal chen): dag par gzhol ba/ shin tu pra ste yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ rang bzhin kha dog med pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang
70a3(phal chen): dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/
70a4(phal chen): bsngags pa/ bkur ba/ tshig dang yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjed du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te 'khod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
70a5(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems
70a6(phal chen): dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stan de dag dang / 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
70a7(phal chen): chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pas/ dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par/
70b1(phal chen): gyur to// 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu
70b2(phal chen): rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin rgya
70b3(phal chen): nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ / dmigs pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las
70b4(phal chen): dang rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems
70b5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas
70b6(phal chen): par khyab par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su
70b7(phal chen): brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad dbyung
71a1(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
71a2(phal chen): cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab
71a3(phal chen): par gyur to/ / dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to//
71a4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab
71a5(phal chen): par gyur to/ / zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo
71a6(phal chen): bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi
71a7(phal chen): khyad pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa
71b1(phal chen): 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
71b2(phal chen): 'dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs// mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos// dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams// mngon par 'thon cing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/
71b3(phal chen): bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa// stan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcas pa la// de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan byung ba
71b4(phal chen): snang / / rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin// bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtsa las// sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing // zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings
71b5(phal chen): su khyab par 'phro/ / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang // spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs// zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te// bsam gtan yan lag
71b6(phal chen): brjod cing kun tu 'dong / / kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras// mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// grangs med bsam yas bde gshegs pa spu las// sprul pa
71b7(phal chen): 'dra thogs pa med par 'byung / / bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba'i rnams// yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag/ rgya mtsho tshe mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun// 'dze ta'i tshe la
72a1(phal chen): na gnas shing rab tu brjod/ / phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las// rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par// 'dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnam
72a2(phal chen): kyi/ / gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grag/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul pa// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang //
72a3(phal chen): so so dmigs kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang // sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin// spu rtsa re rer sna tshogs rnam phye ba'i// sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang //
72a4(phal chen): de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs// 'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed// de dag 'od las spos kyi 'od
72a5(phal chen): 'phro dang / / me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung // mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang // ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa// de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun
72a6(phal chen): khyab byed/ / zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no// dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i rnam tshul du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i//
72a7(phal chen): rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad med pa// phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams// bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam spongs pa// de dag kun kyang 'dze ta'i nags tshal gyi// bar
72b1(phal chen): snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re//
72b2(phal chen): res kyang snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs
72b3(phal chen): par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sgo
72b4(phal chen): renas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par lta ba'i lus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin
72b5(phal chen): par bya ba dang 'phrod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par 'thon nas kyang phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing
72b6(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba byed do/ / lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems
72b7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su skul
73a1(phal chen): pa byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
73a2(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
73a3(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan
73a4(phal chen): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
73a5(phal chen): chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
73a6(phal chen): drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par
73a7(phal chen): 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang phas kyi rgol bas mi
73b1(phal chen): tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad
73b2(phal chen): bapar du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgro dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
73b3(phal chen): kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan
73b4(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
73b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo //
73b6(phal chen): la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par
73b7(phal chen): snang ngo / / la la ni mi 'am tsa'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni
74a1(phal chen): mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / / la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par snang ngo // la la ni sems can
74a2(phal chen): dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / / la la ni yi dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/ mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang
74a3(phal chen): rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye
74a4(phal chen): bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang / smon lam tha mi dad pa dang / ya/
74a5(phal chen): shes tha mi dad pa dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phral pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten
74a6(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo
74a7(phal chen): ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / stan dang / 'khor du bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi
74b1(phal chen): g.yo'o/ / la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang // la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs
74b2(phal chen): ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o/ / la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la la ni brdul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang / chu zheng gi
74b3(phal chen): / gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/ la la ni snyan pas 'tshe ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni
74b4(phal chen): ba po thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes
74b5(phal chen): su 'brang zhing / ming dang / gzugs dang / lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang / dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
74b6(phal chen): spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang /
74b7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs
75a1(phal chen): thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing sems can yongs su smin
75a2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal
75a3(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las/ skal ba mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang /
75a4(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyam brta ba la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi
75a5(phal chen): smon lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lum dang /
75a6(phal chen): mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag
75a7(phal chen): dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la
75b1(phal chen): brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gang chen
75b2(phal chen): mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba
75b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su
75b4(phal chen): bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod
75b5(phal chen): sprin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson
75b6(phal chen): pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las
75b7(phal chen): 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing lus
76a1(phal chen): rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud
76a2(phal chen): pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang
76a3(phal chen): rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/
76a4(phal chen): lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo // // bam po brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/
76a5(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas 'dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du
76a6(phal chen): gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom
76a7(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la
76b1(phal chen): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/ dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa gas/
76b2(phal chen): duzhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang / kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang / lha'i
76b3(phal chen): dpal dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
76b4(phal chen): bskyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur pa/ dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par lta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin
76b5(phal chen): nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pas
76b6(phal chen): 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de ltar lam
76b7(phal chen): du zhugs te 'dong pa'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par
77a1(phal chen): brgyan cing yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su
77a2(phal chen): skyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan
77a3(phal chen): 'gron lam mig mangs ris su gnas pa dang / lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan
77a4(phal chen): g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas shing gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang /
77a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil
77a6(phal chen): 'khor mang po bkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces/ de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du/
77a7(phal chen): zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan te// brjod do// bshad do// smos so// bkrol lo// rab tu brjod do// rnam par phye'o// gsal bar byas so//
77b1(phal chen): de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ji tsam ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur te// rab tu
77b2(phal chen): dang bar gyur to/ / dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// mos pa skyed par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to// dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to// yid bde ba
77b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ / yid mi bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur to// sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to// sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to// sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par
77b4(phal chen): gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skye bar gyur to// snying rje chen po
77b5(phal chen): 'byung bar gyur to/ / pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to// snying rje chen po yongs su skye bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to// de ltar de dag thams cad
77b6(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer te/ mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas// de nas tshe dang ldan
77b7(phal chen): ba shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag
78a1(phal chen): go/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par/ glang po'i lha stangs kyis gzi
78a2(phal chen): dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbar te 'di skad ces
78a3(phal chen): smras so/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang /
78a4(phal chen): gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog cig/
78a5(phal chen): rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phral pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin du thob par shog cig ces/ dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang /
78a6(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa
78a7(phal chen): chen po la zhugs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'ang gnon par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
78b1(phal chen): pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog
78b2(phal chen): cing yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la
78b3(phal chen): yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skye ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu
78b4(phal chen): brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skye ba'i sems
78b5(phal chen): bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems
78b6(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ sems can gcig yongs
78b7(phal chen): su smin par bya ba'i tshul du/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skye ba'i sems bskyed pa'o//
79a1(phal chen): dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs
79a2(phal chen): su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
79a3(phal chen): thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang
79a4(phal chen): dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par
79a5(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa
79a6(phal chen): yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad
79a7(phal chen): rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ / de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
79b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
79b2(phal chen): gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ra rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed
79b3(phal chen): yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to/ / sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
79b4(phal chen): dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho bang thos par gyur to/ / chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming dang / brdas yongs su shes par gyur to// sems
79b5(phal chen): can de dag gi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa la'ang rnam par lta bar gyur to// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu'ang rjes su dran par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de
79b6(phal chen): dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par
79b7(phal chen): gyur to/ / bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang
80a1(phal chen): dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ / ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu'ang yongs su
80a2(phal chen): rdzogs par gyur to/ / ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu'ang yongs su non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu'ang rnam par dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes
80a3(phal chen): rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin
80a4(phal chen): tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskal nas rab tu
80a5(phal chen): bkod do/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pas de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to// de ltar smon lam chen po rgya
80a6(phal chen): mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ / lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar lus rnam par
80a7(phal chen): dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/ mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to// mngon par shes pa thob pas
80b1(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin
80b2(phal chen): las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas/ mthar gyis
80b3(phal chen): yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags
80b4(phal chen): tshal chen po sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten/ sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis
80b5(phal chen): brlabs pa/ zhing mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjes su grags pa/ sngan chad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongs su gtang bar dka' ba du ma yongs su btang ste/
80b6(phal chen): sa'i phyogs de na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa
80b7(phal chen): la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der 'khor dang bcas te phyin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
81a1(phal chen): bcu 'byung ba bstan to/ / de bstan pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mnye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam
81a2(phal chen): par smod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/ lha dang mer skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag
81a3(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / chos de bstan pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul
81a4(phal chen): bar gyur to/ / de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te/ sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi mchod
81a5(phal chen): rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po dag so so nas
81a6(phal chen): 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni/ dge bsnyen
81a7(phal chen): bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang / grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga' bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang /
81b1(phal chen): sgra gcan bzang po dang / dge bster bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal
81b2(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni
81b3(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang /
81b4(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
81b5(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ni/ tshong dpon gyi bu brtul
81b6(phal chen): zhugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo bzang po
81b7(phal chen): dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
82a1(phal chen): gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba
82a2(phal chen): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni/ bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / dpal
82a3(phal chen): bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin pa dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/
82a4(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de
82a5(phal chen): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag 'dus te 'khod par shes nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
82a6(phal chen): du bstan pa'i byin gyis zil gyis mnan/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis sim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par sgrub ste/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang
82a7(phal chen): bsam pa rnam par phye nas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas so// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs zhes bya ba/ ci'i phyir nor badz+ra
82b1(phal chen): zhes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs zhes bya ba de/ thog ma ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu/ khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par gyur te/
82b2(phal chen): rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / asma gar ba dang / mu sa ra gal ba dang
82b3(phal chen): rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang / gter de dag nas skyes te sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to// de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/ zla ba bu/
82b4(phal chen): lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang / rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/ snang bar byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to//
82b5(phal chen): khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya'ang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang / sbrang rtsi'i snod dang / mar gsar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad
82b6(phal chen): sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dge ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod
82b7(phal chen): kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang /
83a1(phal chen): dngul gyi snod gser byes yongs su gang ba dang / phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal bas yongs su gang ba dang / mu
83a2(phal chen): sa ra gal ba'i snod rin po che shel gyis yongs su gang ba dang / asma gar ba'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod asma gar bas yongs su gang ba dang / nor
83a3(phal chen): bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po che chu' dang gis yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su gang ba dang / de
83a4(phal chen): dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga brgya 'thon par gyur to/ / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang / bang ba dang / mdzod thams cad du nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang /
83a5(phal chen): gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to// de la bram ze'i ltas pa dang / pha dang / ma dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs
83a6(phal chen): pa byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzangs nor bzangs zhes de ltar ming du btags te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// mos pa rgya
83a7(phal chen): chen po dang ldan pa'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su
83b1(phal chen): sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o/ / thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o// bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o// byang chub kyi sems
83b2(phal chen): chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas te dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/ de la 'di lta ste
83b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing 'thob par bya ba las kyang brnams/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcis nas gcig tu rgyu
83b4(phal chen): pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsam/
83b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams
83b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
83b7(phal chen): rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
84a1(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed de dga' bar byas nas/
84a2(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi
84a3(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas byin gyis brlabs te/ bde bar byas nas de nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ 'angam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
84a4(phal chen): las rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
84a5(phal chen): gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do/ / blo gros chen po mtha' yas spyod yul can// khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du// bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/
84a6(phal chen): la nges pa gang mchis bdag la gson// dga' ba'i chus bkang 'obs kyis kun nos bskor// nga rgyal dregs pa'i ra ba mtho bar brtsegs// sems can lam brgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gad /
84a7(phal chen): de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che// de ni gti mug ma rig gzings pas khebs// 'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs// rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur// de la byis
84b1(phal chen): pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/ / sred pa'i sgrog dang zhugs pas shin tu grags// gso dang sgra la skyon gyis mtho btsams shing // the tsom yin gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa// lag pa byin
84b2(phal chen): phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/ / phrag dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings// yi dgas byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu// rga shi nad dang skye bas rab tu mnar// mgo
84b3(phal chen): rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/ / de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i// dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho skam par shar te 'phags// nyi ma 'dra ba
84b4(phal chen): bdag la snang ba mdzod/ / byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya// bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i zer 'gyed pa// sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyis// zla ba nyab
84b5(phal chen): lta bus bdag snang mdzod/ / dkar mthu thams cad yongs bsags bskor mnga' zhing // chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas// rgyal por
84b6(phal chen): gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ / byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mnga' ste// bsod nams ye shes shin tu yang bsags shing // sems can kun la phan pa'i don bzhugs pa'i// ded dpon chen
84b7(phal chen): pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/ / bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te// ye shes bshan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas// bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar// dpa' bo chen pos
85a1(phal chen): bdag gi sel yang mdzod/ / chos kyi ri rab spol bstan bzhugs shing // ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor// nyon mongs sgra gcan lha min 'dul mdzad pa/
85a2(phal chen): brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol// byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa nas// nyon mongs las rnams rnam par bsal ba mkhyen// rgyu yi sa dang lham rgyud 'khor rmongs par// ma mar 'dra bas
85a3(phal chen): bdag kyang shul bstan gsol/ / ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing // bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam spong ba// 'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das// bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du
85a4(phal chen): gsol/ / rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan// log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis bcad gyur gyis// bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas// thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol// yang dag log
85a5(phal chen): ba'i lam la mkhas gyur cing / / lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'// lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chud pa// bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol// yang dag lta ba'i sa yi thang la bzhugs/
85a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis bskrun// sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa// byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol// rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang // da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzan
85a7(phal chen): pa/ sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs// de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol// las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa// chos theg shing rta'i la khrul 'khor ma khyen gyur cing // ye shes
85b1(phal chen): theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/ / byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad du gsol// mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyud can// bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing rten// dad pa'i gnyal shing rin chen legs spras pa'i// byang
85b2(phal chen): chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ / gzungs rnams kun gyis rnam dag dkyil 'khor can// byams pa brtsegs pa'i dgab pas rab brgyan pa// tha dad yang dag shes pa'i dril 'phreng can// theg mchog
85b3(phal chen): bzang pos bdag la bsnyad du gsol/ / tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan// ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu// chos kyi rnga yi dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa// theg pa'i dam pas bdag la bstabs
85b4(phal chen): su gsol/ / bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa// ye shos rin chen yon tan 'phreng gis brgyan// khrel yod dul ba'i 'breng bas mchog bsdams pa'i// theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol// sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil
85b5(phal chen): 'khor bzang po can/ / tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing // bzod pa'i zer gyis mtshams rnams dam sbyar ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag gzhag gsol// sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa// bsam
85b6(phal chen): gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor smon cing / / shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor mthun 'gro rgyu ba'i// chos kyi theg pa mchog la bdag gzhag gsol// smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor spong ba// chos kyi gzungs dam mthu brtan che ldan
85b7(phal chen): zhing / / ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i// chos kyi theg pa de la bdag bskyon gsol// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab spangs shing // sems can lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa// kun tu bzang po'i spong
86a1(phal chen): pas gnon 'gyur ba'i/ / ye shes theg pas bdag la bstud du gsol// de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa// ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing // sgrib dang chags pa
86a2(phal chen): thams cad gcod pa yi/ / bzang po'i thig la bdag kyang bskyon par gsol// 'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa// sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing // chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam ska
