86a3(phal chen): ba'i/ / byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// sdug bsngal phung po rab 'gyur gcod byed pa// nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang spyod sel cing // bdud dang las kyi rgol ba kun 'jom pa'i// chos kyi theg la
86a4(phal chen): bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ / phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rang snang ba// chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par klub byed cing // sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/
86a5(phal chen): rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa// sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing // sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan
86a6(phal chen): pas/ / smon lam mthu yis 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing // zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// sa chen gzhi yi stobs kyi stobs ldan pa// snying rje'i mthu dang
86a7(phal chen): shugs kyis khur khyer zhing / / ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing // bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can// gzung
86b1(phal chen): kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzang ba'i/ / ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan du gsol// bskal pa mang po du mar rab bslabs pas// rgyu yi tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa// gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer
86b2(phal chen): gzhom 'gyur ba'i/ / shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis// ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la// tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mangs bslabs
86b3(phal chen): gyur pa/ / de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol// gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing // ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te// chos kyi mthu thod dam pas dbu bcings pa'i//
86b4(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang ba dag kyang ston// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de
86b5(phal chen): ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems
86b6(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam pa legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub
86b7(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te/ 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bas yongs su ma skyo bar gyis shig/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub
87a1(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bgyi
87a2(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub
87a3(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spang par bgyi/ ji ltar byang rlab sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
87a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
87a5(phal chen): spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dbu kun tu bdang ro spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzog pa
87a6(phal chen): 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de spras pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams gang chen mtsho/
87a7(phal chen): de ster byed ni nga'i drung nyer byin te// snying rje snying brtse rgya chen gyi// yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs// 'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du// spyod pa mtshungs mer don du smon lam
87b1(phal chen): bdengs shing / 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yin/ byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i rnams// 'khor ba'i nang na som mid kyis spyod byed pa/
87b2(phal chen): de dag kun tu bzang po sa/ spyong pa thung me chags med 'thob par 'gyur// bsong rnams 'od rkun bsod nams dpal/ 'am khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i sbyor pa la/ 'grol bar byed sngon
87b3(phal chen): byed pa/ / bsod nams rgya mtsho dag bzhi dag pa'i mtshan// mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ dran pa'i mthu dang sngos
87b4(phal chen): kyis kyang / / de dag chos kyi sbyin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur// de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun du rgyal ba mthong nas kyang / byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir
87b5(phal chen): de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag byer 'gyur/ / 'jig rten gtsol slob byed cing // gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni bca' byas shing / 'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa// de dag kun
87b6(phal chen): thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/ khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu// bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yi// spyod pa'i dam pa spyangad byas shing / byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur//
87b7(phal chen): zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa// ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par gyis// kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir// smon lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos// khyod kyi smon lam
88a1(phal chen): thos gyur nas/ / sems cam phrag khrig dga' ba yongs su skyes gyur cing // kun du 'azang po'i ye shes kyi// byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/ de nas
88a2(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshogs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
88a3(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal bar sems pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
88a4(phal chen): bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol
88a5(phal chen): de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no/ / rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang drag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las
88a6(phal chen): gdon mi za bar rtogs pa thob par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen balnga ba la ngoms pa med
88a7(phal chen): par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun pa 'dzin par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig/ rigs kyi
88b1(phal chen): Tab+h+yo phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan
88b2(phal chen): du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bca
88b3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba la spyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar
88b4(phal chen): 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sem
88b5(phal chen): dpa 'akun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur brjes shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to//
88b6(phal chen): de nas rkyong khon gyi bu nor bzangs dka' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
88b7(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas/
89a1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de gdong mchi mas gang bar ngu zhing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
89a2(phal chen): nor bzangs mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song ste phyin nas/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog nas rnam par brgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis
89a3(phal chen): brlabs pa'i longs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing / ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mgul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol zhing sha
89a4(phal chen): phyogs logs su byung ngo / / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang
89a5(phal chen): gi phyogs mtshams su'ang byung ste/ bla 'og tu'ang lnga zhing / dge slong sprin gyi dpal chol tshol ba las/ des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse gcig cig gi sman ljongs na 'chag cing
89a6(phal chen): 'dug pa mthong nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te
89a7(phal chen): mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa'i thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskur na/ ji ltar byang
89b1(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
89b2(phal chen): spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyi
89b3(phal chen): ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par gyi ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su
89b4(phal chen): rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na
89b5(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces spras pa dang dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
89b6(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri ba legs so legs so// rigs
89b7(phal chen): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal
90a1(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub
90a2(phal chen): dpa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyur yod
90a3(phal chen): su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa
90a4(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka' 'o// shin tu dka' 'o// rigs
90a5(phal chen): kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis mig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas/ kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba phyir phyogs med pa dang / yul kun la
90a6(phal chen): thogs pa med cing bsgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam rdzas pa tha ma
90a7(phal chen): cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyi 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis/ phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad kur nas
90b1(phal chen): mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas gnyis dang / bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang /
90b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye
90b3(phal chen): ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ sa mtshams
90b4(phal chen): med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi
90b5(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo //
90b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sdong gi rdul shin
90b7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag spong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu dra nga ste
91a1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul shin tu za ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phrab snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
91a2(phal chen): brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyedan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang rje du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste// shar phyogs logs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
91a3(phal chen): dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang zla'i phyogs kyi
91a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer
91a5(phal chen): rnam par bltas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam
91a6(phal chen): par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba la dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byed pa dang
91a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / pho zang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par
91b1(phal chen): / dmigs par mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rnam par grog pa mang po mthong
91b2(phal chen): ngongo/ / de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sgro kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
91b3(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / pho zang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas
91b4(phal chen): rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su
91b5(phal chen): dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btagA pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo stobs kyis sngo btasa?
91b6(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin la blta bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang
91b7(phal chen): gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
92a1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang
92a2(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par spro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus
92a3(phal chen): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
92a4(phal chen): cad nas mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang
92a5(phal chen): gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo dus gsum du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /
92a6(phal chen): gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par spro
92a7(phal chen): btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs
92b1(phal chen): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes
92b2(phal chen): su dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs
92b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sku'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byang ba
92b4(phal chen): mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya
92b5(phal chen): zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rgyun du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang /
92b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dgos par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / rang gi sems dang bsam pa la bltas na de bzhin
92b7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad rab tu snang ba thob pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis las rnam pa ji lta bur bsags pa'i
93a1(phal chen): gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyi sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad+mo'i tshul gyis
93a2(phal chen): rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /
93a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang bas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nam mkhas sgro btags pa
93a4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na dge slong
93a5(phal chen): mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu
93a6(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshegs dang rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/ / tshogs kyis rgya chen po'ang khong du chud par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs rgya chen po'ang
93a7(phal chen): yongs su skyed par byed do/ / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen po'ang yong su rjod par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po'ang skyed par byed do//
93b1(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshigs kyi stobs rgya chen po'ang rab du byon par byed do// spyod pa rgya mtshol 'jug pa'i rdul rje chen po'ang rab tu rjod par 'gyur ro// smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya cher po'ang yongs
93b2(phal chen): su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ / sgo kun na byu ba'i DU rgya chen po'ang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po'ang yongs su 'phel bar byed do// de nas tshong dpon
93b3(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar
93b4(phal chen): phyir bltas nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu rnam pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i sa
93b5(phal chen): nyen gyi gdams ngag de rjes su bsam pa dang / ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
93b6(phal chen): tshul de rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba
93b7(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang
94a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' de la rjes su blta bar bya ba byed cing mthar gyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang rna ba dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya
94a2(phal chen): mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal
94a3(phal chen): mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na/ ji ltar
94a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya
94a5(phal chen): mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur
94a6(phal chen): zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi 'khor gyi 'khor lor
94a7(phal chen): 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jom zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems shing snying rje
94b1(phal chen): chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / mi 'om pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byer pa
94b2(phal chen): dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu
94b3(phal chen): ba'i smon lam yongs su skyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras
94b4(phal chen): so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsred pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub
94b5(phal chen): tu sems kyang mi skye'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar gyur pa dang / bsod nams
94b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / lus dang
94b7(phal chen): srog la 'phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtho dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis snying rje zhing byams par sems
95a1(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye
95a2(phal chen): ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro
95a3(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las
95a4(phal chen): yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i
95a5(phal chen): sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems
95a6(phal chen): r lung dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtshol la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye
95a7(phal chen): shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/ mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya
95b1(phal chen): ning tshad med pa la rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang bkas kyis gzol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung
95b2(phal chen): gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / 'dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa
95b3(phal chen): dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems pa byed
95b4(phal chen): ning ga nas gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la
95b5(phal chen): sa 'di bas kyang yangs shing 'di zas kyang tshad med la 'dri bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam/ de de ltar kho bo tshul
95b6(phal chen): bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las pad+ma chen po nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nI la thub pa med cing
95b7(phal chen): rdorje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser star dri ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i
96a1(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che a sma gar ba'i ze ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas brdung ba/ rin po
96a2(phal chen): che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yogs pa/ klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang / rin
96a3(phal chen): po na'i lda ldi dang / sen mo de mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu sbyangs pa/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya
96a4(phal chen): stong phrag bcu 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa/ srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa/ dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang klu sna tshogs
96a5(phal chen): snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs
96a6(phal chen): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong
96a7(phal chen): phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba/ mi'i dbang po 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che bdun gyis bsro zhing mngon par mchod pa/ rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'acwo
96b1(phal chen): cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngad brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus 'khos su khebs par 'phel
96b2(phal chen): bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar
96b3(phal chen): gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs rgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu
96b4(phal chen): brgyan pa nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal bar 'grubs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar
96b5(phal chen): ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan rang 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste/ pad+mo chen po de ni de bzhin
96b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o// phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o//
96b7(phal chen): sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyi byung ba'o// rjen pa'i dri med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o// rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su 'byung ba'o//
97a1(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o// phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'geb
97a2(phal chen): pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun pa ste/ de'i rnam pa dang / yon tan dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog dang / rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du
97a3(phal chen): chud par nus te/ pad+mo chen po de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing / yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re'ang 'di nas bzung ba nas/
97a4(phal chen): srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mtha' klas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis me khyem pa dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
97a5(phal chen): rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs
97a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
97a7(phal chen): ljags yangs pa bas mchis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos so// stobs tshad
97b1(phal chen): med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi bsnyengs pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang rjes
97b2(phal chen): su shes so/ / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang rjes su dran no// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab
97b3(phal chen): pa'ang mthong ngo / / chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongs su bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos
97b4(phal chen): so/ / g.yas g.yon gyi sku'i rnam par tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don dang dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub par gyur pa'ang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
97b5(phal chen): des kyang phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba/ de bzhin shegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa/ chos
97b6(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba/ / chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar byed pa/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam pa thams cad
97b7(phal chen): rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ sems can gyi
98a1(phal chen): khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
98a2(phal chen): du rnam par dmigs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang mthasnang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan te// kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blangs so//
98a3(phal chen): bzung ngo // spel to// bsams so// de ltar bzung ba de la'ang phrin ni snag che rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po tsam dang / spyi gu'i phung po'i rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de
98a4(phal chen): las le'u re re dang / sgo re re dang / chos kyi tshul re re dang / chos kyi chog rnam par phye ba re re las kyang zad pa 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ mthar thug pa'am/ mtha' zad par
98a5(phal chen): 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo / / rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od
98a6(phal chen): snang ba sa le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do/ / zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u zangs med pa zhig la zhugs so// glong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs
98a7(phal chen): med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go/ sa la rnam par dpyad cing rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par bsgoms te rnam par dbye ba byas so//
98b1(phal chen): gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su blangs so// pad+mo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bgrubs so// dbyangs
98b2(phal chen): kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi 'od srung bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad do/ / nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye'o// skar ma brtsegs pa'i
98b3(phal chen): gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so/ / rgya mtsho'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u zangs med pa zhig yongs su bkod do// kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs
98b4(phal chen): legs nas lha dang lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu dang klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin rang gnod sbyin dbang po 'am/ dri za dang dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam
98b5(phal chen): mkha'i lding dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci dang mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ mi dang mi'i dbang po 'am/ tshangs pa dang
98b6(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya
98b7(phal chen): ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkod cing bcud do/ / de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so// rtog tu btsud do// yongs su bstan to// yang dag par brjod do// /
99a1(phal chen): yongs su gsal bar byas so// rnam par bya'o// rgyas par byas so// mngon par bstan to// rnam par bkrol lo// rab tu phye'o// shin tu snang bar byas so// de lta
99a2(phal chen): shar phyogs kyi la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lce'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mchu
99a3(phal chen): dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun la'ang snga ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs
99a4(phal chen): gcig gcig shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad
99a5(phal chen): du gnas pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / stobs
99a6(phal chen): bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir
99a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin
99b1(phal chen): gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang wAr
99b2(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bsor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba'i skang rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa
99b3(phal chen): 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad drug cu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/ lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong
99b4(phal chen): shin tu brten pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i kun du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshor
99b5(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang
99b6(phal chen): dang yang bltas te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de dang / kun nas mig gi chos
99b7(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs de'ang rjes su dran par byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de'ang rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang
100a1(phal chen): chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul de la'ang rjes su rnam par bsdu ba dang / chos kyi le'u dang klong gi nub de dag la 'jug par bu bdud cho
100a2(phal chen): kyi nam mkha' de la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dkyil 'khor de'ang rjes su sbyang bar bya ba dang / chos rin po che'i gling de'ang rjes su sems shing mthar gyis lang kwa'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs
100a3(phal chen): shes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar
100a4(phal chen): gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / bla dang 'og tu'ang dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste kun
100a5(phal chen): tu bltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su bskor cing phan tshun 'chag pa mthong ngo // nam mkha'i dbyings de'ang lha'i dbang po rnams kyis
100a6(phal chen): dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang / dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par
100a7(phal chen): mthong ngo / / klu'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la a ka ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'brug smra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo //
100b1(phal chen): mi'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyis bstod pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang / bkrol ba dang / klur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar cing blangs pa thos par
100b2(phal chen): gyur to/ / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' ba dkye ste/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la dad cing
100b3(phal chen): mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo / / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi
100b4(phal chen): khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan par byas pa mthong / / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po'ang mi'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs su 'khod cing / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos
100b5(phal chen): kun nas bskor te/ gsod pa med pa la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang
100b6(phal chen): nam mkha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs su/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khod pa mthong ngo // srin po'i dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis
100b7(phal chen): mi khyab pa dag kyang / nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongs su srung ba byed cing kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo // tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la
101a1(phal chen): thal mo sgyur cing dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i tshug pargyad kyis bstad pa rab tu brjod pa mthong / gnas bcad ma ban skyong bsam gyis mi byas pa dag kyang nam myal
101a2(phal chen): dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang nas gnas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong shin tu
101a3(phal chen): brtan pa de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag
101a4(phal chen): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar
101a5(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub
101a6(phal chen): sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsten par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpes sangs rgyas bya chos
101a7(phal chen): kyi rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brtul bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgom par
101b1(phal chen): ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems/
101b2(phal chen): dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji
101b3(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang sol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang
101b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas
101b5(phal chen): kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba dang / bskal pa thams
101b6(phal chen): cad du gnas pas yongs su mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas
101b7(phal chen): kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
102a1(phal chen): 'jal pa yod / byang ma dpa'i sgru khrus pa da myon
102a2(phal chen): g bar bgyi ba'i spyad du/ 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams ched kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su zung ba'i sring du/ chos mnyan pa rang mi 'bral ba dang / dus
102a3(phal chen): sum gyi mi shes 'ong du rgyad cing rjes su 'brang bar bsti ba'i slad du/ ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba ba pe la bas du gso// de skad ces smras pa dang / dges
102a4(phal chen): shin du brtan pas/ tshong dpon bzangs la 'di skad ces sproso// de ltar byed kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / thams cad m
102a5(phal chen): khyen pa'i chos dang / rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo thob pa sa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
102a6(phal chen): napa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kho bos blangs te/ yongs su bzung nas rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dpyang ba dang / rnam par brtus pa dang / snang
102a7(phal chen): bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byas pas thogs pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i saM shes snang ba tho bo// de thob pas cho bos mi sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod gcong du chung bar byas la
102b1(phal chen): thogs pa med do/ / sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang shi 'phos yongs su shes par bya ba la thog pa med do// sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par bya ba'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// phyi mar
102b2(phal chen): mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang 'grogs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi
102b3(phal chen): sgra skad dang kun rdzob yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / sems can thamacad kyi the tsom gcad par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa khong du chud par bya
102b4(phal chen): la thogs pa med do/ / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// nyin mtshan dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang /
102b5(phal chen): dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyur du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rang gis lus kyis rgyas par dgang bar
102b6(phal chen): bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu
102b7(phal chen): 'phrul de'i byin gyis/ kho bo nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang / skyes pa dang / spyod lam sna tshogs su spyod do// maM snang ba byed do// snang bar 'byung ngo // du ba
103a1(phal chen): 'phrul bar byed do/ / me lce 'bar bar byed do// gcig tu byas shing mang por bsgyur ro// mang por byas shing gcig tu bsgyur ro// snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar bye
103a2(phal chen): ro/ / rtsig pa la'ang thags thogs med pa dang / ra ba la thags thogs med par 'gro ste/ dper ni nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab
103a3(phal chen): chags bya bzhin no/ / sa la'ang byi'u zul dang steng du 'byung ba byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la'ang bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no// du ba 'thul ba dang re lce
103a4(phal chen): 'bar bar byed do/ / dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// sa'ang yongs su g.yo bar byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu che la/ de ltar gzi brjid che'ang lag pas kun
103a5(phal chen): nas yongs su nyug go/ / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// 'jig rten na spos kyi dud pa na bun du chags pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed
103a6(phal chen): do/ / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun nas khebs par byas shing 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed ro// kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin
103a7(phal chen): rab tu bkye zhing phyogs kun tu'ang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs su'ang 'gro'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / bya'i phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs
103b1(phal chen): mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs su'ang 'gro'o// sems kyi skad cig re re zhing yang shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten/
103b2(phal chen): gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu'ang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi kham brgya phrag stong dang
103b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
103b4(phal chen): khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa
103b5(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang / 'jig
103b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams mtshams med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig
103b7(phal chen): bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang / 'jig
104a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'du ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba
104a2(phal chen): de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo de dang de ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsal bar bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
104a3(phal chen): snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de
104a4(phal chen): dag las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu
104a5(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o/ / de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang
104a6(phal chen): byug pa thams cad dang / na bza' thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / tha re thams cad dang / dra ba thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad kyi mchod
104a7(phal chen): pa rgyun ma chad par byed do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang / bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par smos pa dang
104b1(phal chen): yongs su brjod pa dang / man ngag tu gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang / rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
104b2(phal chen): yongs su dag pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ / shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
104b3(phal chen): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi
104b4(phal chen): khams gnyis dang bcu'ang 'da' 'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig
104b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag nas/
104b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas/ gzugs thams cad kyi bar gyis mchod
104b7(phal chen): pa byed do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
105a1(phal chen): de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ / sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / gang dang 'tshogs par gyur
105a2(phal chen): pa de dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ / sems can phra mo 'am/ rags pa 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ mi bde ba gang ji snyed
105a3(phal chen): cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun la'ang yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'du ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khong ta de dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par lus byin gyis rlob bo//
105a4(phal chen): sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i rlung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rnam par gnon pa don yod pa
105a5(phal chen): la rab tu gzhog go/ / rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang rim gro rab tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams
105a6(phal chen): cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'thun pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can// theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mi
105a7(phal chen): 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ / thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can//
105b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyen pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'jig rten thams cad
105b2(phal chen): la mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chung mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma nyams pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma god pa'i ngang tshul can/ glags med pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can/
105b3(phal chen): rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod
105b4(phal chen): par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer ces bya ba yod de/ de na na byi la sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang
105b5(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong shin tu brtam pa'i rkang pa
105b6(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du bltas nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo // / de nas
105b7(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs chos kyi rang pa'i shugs dang byin gyis non pa/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa la rab tu brtson pa
106a1(phal chen): dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa/ smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/
106a2(phal chen): 'dus byas kyi dga' ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su
106a3(phal chen): sbyang ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa/ chos kyi snang ba rjes su dran par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes
106a4(phal chen): su dran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su rjod pa byed cing / mthar gyis rba byi la'i grong rdul rdo rje'i grong khyer du phyin nas/ dra byi la sprin yongs su tshol tshol ba las/
106a5(phal chen): grong khyer gyi khyams shig na chos bstan pa'i don du seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la/ chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongs su ston
106a6(phal chen): cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ da byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
106a7(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di ska ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na
106b1(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lam rgyud thams
106b2(phal chen): cad du chab mi 'tshal ba dang / ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang
106b3(phal chen): ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing snying rjes chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang /
106b4(phal chen): ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i
106b5(phal chen): tshig dang spobs pa la mkhas pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor
106b6(phal chen): lo tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rig pa'i snang ba rjes su rtogs shing rig pa'i stobs rnam par
106b7(phal chen): dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za bar rab tu dbye ba la brtson pa 'grub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to//
107a1(phal chen): de nas dkyil sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim mor bya ba'i phyi seng ka'i wi las langs te babs nas/ tshong dpon gyi nu nor bzangs la lus thams cad kyis byab
107a2(phal chen): byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor to// nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to//
107a3(phal chen): gos tshon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo// spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa tha dad cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par
107a4(phal chen): gtor nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so//
107a5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
107a6(phal chen): pa de ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba la brtson pa yin/ zhing gi
107a7(phal chen): rgyud thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la zhug pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la sta gon du gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag par ji
107b1(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du brtags pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad rang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson/
107b2(phal chen): pa yin/ smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ mos pa'i rigs
107b3(phal chen): shin tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin/
107b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad kyis rjes su dgyes par bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar
107b5(phal chen): bya ba yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bsrungs pa yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas
107b6(phal chen): pa yin/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsu ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin
107b7(phal chen): des ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su gcad pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang / dbul ba'i lam thams cad
108a1(phal chen): las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyis mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po
108a2(phal chen): mnyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba
108a3(phal chen): thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par bya ba yin/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du
108a4(phal chen): sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dka' ba byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar byed pas pa
108a5(phal chen): dang ma lta bu'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba rnams la skyabs su gyur pa'o//
108a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o/
108a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las yongs su ston pa'i phyir rlung gi 'khor lo lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i
108b1(phal chen): rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pas sa lta bu'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gtos dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye she
108b2(phal chen): kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba
108b3(phal chen): 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang byung gi chos kyi grong khyer
108b4(phal chen): du phyin par byed pas rtul phod pa lta bu'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byams pa'i rlan yongs su skams pas me lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
108b5(phal chen): chos kyi sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pas sprin lta bu'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la sogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o//
108b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos rgya mtsho'i 'gram yongs su ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par sgrol ba'i phyir
108b7(phal chen): zam pa lta bu'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bzod par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs lta bu'o// de ltar na dra byi la sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du
109a1(phal chen): 'dug ste/ tshig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la legs so zhe bas sa/
109a2(phal chen): deltar des byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i tshogs brjod pa'i tshe/ kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
109a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ lha dang / lha rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ klu dang / kru rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ dri za dang
109a4(phal chen): nidrizirnga rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lha ma yin dang / lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ nam mkha' lding dang / nam mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi 'am ci dang / mi 'am ci rdzu 'phrul chen po
109a5(phal chen): 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mi dang / mi rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi ma yin pa dang / mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ tshangs pa dang / tshangs
109a6(phal chen): pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/ snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de dag dra byi la sprin gyi drung du 'ongs so// de nas de ltar dra byil sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis
109a7(phal chen): brlabs shing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa/ lus dang sems sim par gyur pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po skyes pa/ sri zhu chen po la gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba/ dbang
109b1(phal chen): po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la dra byi la sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud gyi rgyan ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ khong du chud pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes
109b2(phal chen): pa dang / rig par byas so// de thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldob par gyur to// de nas de'i phyir chos kyi stan la 'dug
109b3(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
109b4(phal chen): 'di'i lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so/ / de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma
109b5(phal chen): yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
109b6(phal chen): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad gcig pa'ang shes
109b7(phal chen): so/ / de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams
110a1(phal chen): tshangs pa'i sad gcig pa'ang shes so/ / rna rnams kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa'ang shes so// de bzhin du nu dang / gnon sbyin dang / dr-irba dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mtha' /
110a2(phal chen): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad tha dad pa'ang shes so// byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi
110a3(phal chen): brda dang / skad dang / ming tha dad pa'ang shes so// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so// gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad
110a4(phal chen): dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ / 'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skar dang ming rnams kyang shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang / brda
110a5(phal chen): dang / nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba'ang shes so// sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dpyad kyi yan lag dang
110a6(phal chen): gsung rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang tshig tu ldan pa'ang rtogs shing khong du chud do/ / ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi bar
110a7(phal chen): dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi Sh+yal
110b1(phal chen): pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
110b2(phal chen): dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi
110b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming rgya mtsho thams
110b4(phal chen): cad la'ang 'jug cing shes te/ ji ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so// tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
110b5(phal chen): gzugs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang ming rgya
110b6(phal chen): mtshol zhugag pa de dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de
110b7(phal chen): dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs gcis
111a1(phal chen): tu rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gis brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gnyis nas brtsegs te bstan/
111a2(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro
111a3(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyan thams cad la zhugs pa de dag dang / yi ge'i 'khor lo'i mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba la
111a4(phal chen): byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na tshong dpon btang
111a5(phal chen): brjod ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang / ji ltar sems nges par
111a6(phal chen): gzhag par bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ drA byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim gro byas nas/ dad pa'i
111a7(phal chen): mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu brtag pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par lta zhing gdong mchi mas gang bar dus te/ dra byi la sprin
111b1(phal chen): la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du bltas te phyag 'tshal zhing / dra byil sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcurtsa
111b2(phal chen): gcig pa/ / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba dpyad dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi
111b3(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byang bas rnam par dag pa
111b4(phal chen): de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu smin par bya ba'i sgo de
111b5(phal chen): nyid rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam par dag par
111b6(phal chen): bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs de nye bar brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de'ang yongs su sbyang ba dang
111b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam chen po de nyid mthar byin par byed cing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs yi dam la
112a1(phal chen): brtan cing smon lam gyi sems kyis yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis brtul ba las mi/
112a2(phal chen): zlogs pa/ rang pa mi 'thogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i mthu bo ches mi phyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyer thams cad kyi gdams ngaga'athun par len pa
112a3(phal chen): shes rab ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul sdang ba dang ldan pa/
112a4(phal chen): sa'i gzungs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par
112a5(phal chen): dmigs pa gnas med pa dang / bdag gi med pa dang gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul la rab tu brtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dag pa/
112a6(phal chen): kyi phyogs dang bzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir ldog pa/ sang
112a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi phyogs dang bzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba/ dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang
112b1(phal chen): dag par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa// yid kyi lus yul kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa
112b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dad pa'i dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu slob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mo pa'i
112b3(phal chen): shugs dang 'bral ba med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud du khong du chud pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur
112b4(phal chen): pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dkang ba'i smon lam dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang / mngon par
112b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa la brtson pa de mthar gyis so song ste/ lo bcu gnyis kyis yul nabs tshul na gnas par phyin nas/ des tshong dpon btang rjod de btsal btsal te mthong ngo //
112b6(phal chen): mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag re ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
112b7(phal chen): mjal bar gyur pa ni/ bdag gis 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka' ba'o// 'byung bar dka' ba'o//
113a1(phal chen): 'jal bar dka' ba'o// bzod par dka' ba'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o// mnyes par bgyi ba dka' ba'o// 'grogs par dka' ba'o// rim gror
113a2(phal chen): bgyi ba dka' ba'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjes su 'brang bar dka' ba lags na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur to// 'ja
113a3(phal chen): pa bdag gis 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gror bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang / sangs rgyas tham
113a4(phal chen): cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas
