113a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgya thams cad kyi yang dag par 'grub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par sgrub
113a6(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa rang gi spyod par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang
113a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang sangs rgyas tham
113b1(phal chen): cad kyis chos bstan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa
113b2(phal chen): rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub
113b3(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha
113b4(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
113b5(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par gyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang
113b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gter dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang
113b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i
114a1(phal chen): gter dang mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gter dang mdzod rang gi sems kyi dbang du u0f7fradang / byang chub//
114a2(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems sbyang nas/ 'phags
114a3(phal chen): pa de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dir mchis so/ / bsam pa de lta bu dang / yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang sems pa de lta bu dang gdon mi 'a
114a4(phal chen): bar bsgrub par bsams pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhol pa de lta bu dang / rnam
114a5(phal chen): par dpyod pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te'aja
114a6(phal chen): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad cing tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/ rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad lam ni bstan par mdzad
114a7(phal chen): mu stegs la ni 'jog par mdzadachos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byod par mdzad/ the tsom ni yongs su gcod par mdzad/ nem nur ni sel bar mdzad/ yid gnyis kyi zag rngu ni 'byim par
114b1(phal chen): mdzad/ dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyospyong bar mdzad/ sems kyi thibs po ni snang bar mdzad/ sems kyi dri ma ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang bar mdzad
114b2(phal chen): sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi dung pa ni yongs su sim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba las ni phyir zlog
114b3(phal chen): par mdzad/ sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang ni da pral bar mdzad/ mngon par zhen pa las ni gyen du baspyod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs
114b4(phal chen): su 'brel pa mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon du gyur pa mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzas
114b5(phal chen): byams pa chen po la ni rab tu gzhol ba mdzad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa mdzad/ rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la
114b6(phal chen): ni gnas par mdzad/ rang bzhin nges par rdzogs pa la ni gzhog pa mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad
114b7(phal chen): ro zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems
115a1(phal chen): dpa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la bsnyun du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon btatung brjod kyis de'i cha byang chub sems dra pa'i ting nge 'dzin
115a2(phal chen): gyisgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo slong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
115a3(phal chen): gyi rlabs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing / ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par zhugs so// tshong dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par
115a4(phal chen): zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bu gnas par gyur te/ lus yongs su dge ba de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
115a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgya kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcus/ sngon gyi spyod pa la bzhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs
115a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang
115a7(phal chen): bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi ru'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongs su chud cing
115b1(phal chen): 'dus par snang ste/ de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dzes pa dang / phan tshun ma chod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su bzhum/
115b2(phal chen): pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rkyen dang ldan pa
115b3(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs su yongs su ston par snang ngo // theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang /
115b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams la ya na ni dpa' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo // la la na ni dga' ldan gyi phro brang nas 'pho ba dang / la la na ni yum
115b5(phal chen): gyi skun bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshog yong su ston pa dang / la la na ni skye ba dang / la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang / la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /
115b6(phal chen): la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang / la la na ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
115b7(phal chen): dri zas yongs su bskor cing / tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / la la na ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang / la la na ni sems can thams
116a1(phal chen): cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams la lan ni de bzhin gshegs pamya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi
116a2(phal chen): ring bsrel rnam par 'god par snang ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis sgrub pa byed par snang ste/ sad+yas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
116a3(phal chen): sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems
116a4(phal chen): can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa
116a5(phal chen): pa dang / sems can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa
116a6(phal chen): tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lce mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par
116a7(phal chen): spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bkra chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar
116b1(phal chen): gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnamapa sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rnam pa sna
116b2(phal chen): tshogs su bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang / 'phags
116b3(phal chen): pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
116b4(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa dang / dran pa sgo tshegs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
116b5(phal chen): / chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil khor mtha' dang dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'khor gyi
116b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yengs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam
116b7(phal chen): nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
117a1(phal chen): @de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan laka dang / s+thA skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'thobs/ chos ji skad du bsnun pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor
117a2(phal chen): bzangs kyis thos so/ / blangs so// yang dag par bzung ngo // bsams so// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
117a3(phal chen): khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo / / de nas tsheng dpon btang rjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad
117a4(phal chen): ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs
117a5(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa thog pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma bcom pa yang
117a6(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
117a7(phal chen): cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par
117b1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
117b2(phal chen): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
117b3(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs
117b4(phal chen): cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
117b5(phal chen): rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhug
117b6(phal chen): pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
117b7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
118a1(phal chen): 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba nA
118a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa/
118a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i zer ltar snang ba na/
118a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od kun nas 'gro
118a5(phal chen): bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // nub byung gi phyogs
118a6(phal chen): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i
118a7(phal chen): 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs
118b1(phal chen): cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
118b2(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing rnam par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems
118b3(phal chen): radaba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs
118b4(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan thags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs
118b5(phal chen): pa med pa'i blo zos la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshes
118b6(phal chen): pa 'di dag la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong yang / de bzhin
118b7(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon/ kho bo'ang der 'gro ba med de/ nam 'dod pa de na bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas bzhugs
119a1(phal chen): pa'ang mthong ngo / / tsan da na yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rdo rje bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten
119a2(phal chen): kyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // pad+mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen pad+mo bzhugs pa'ang
119a3(phal chen): mthong ngo / / gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
119a4(phal chen): gshegs pa mi bskul ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / / shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // me long
119a5(phal chen): gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ / de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // rin chen dpal gyi dang pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi
119a6(phal chen): khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi
119a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo / / dus gang dang gang de dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang
119b1(phal chen): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang
119b2(phal chen): gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no// rig
119b3(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ka las kyang byon pa med par shes la/ rang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam
119b4(phal chen): par dmigs pa'ang rmi lam lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa'ang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa'ang
119b5(phal chen): gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa'ang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa'ang sgyu mas
119b6(phal chen): byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la/ rang kyi sems rnam par dmigs pa'ang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan ri'i zag cha lta bur brjod
119b7(phal chen): par shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa'ang sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs
120a1(phal chen): las byung ngo zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlab so// byang chub
120a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// byang chub sems
120a3(phal chen): rapa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zong khyer du phyin par bya ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// rnam
120a4(phal chen): par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi
120a5(phal chen): rlabs so/ / chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung zhing rnam par 'phrul pa'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar
120a6(phal chen): smra ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so zhes bya bar khong du chud cing rjes su rtogs so/ / rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
120a7(phal chen): kyis ni rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o/ / chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlan par bya'o// sgrib pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su
120b1(phal chen): sbyang bar bya'o/ / brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o// zod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems
120b2(phal chen): nyid gzhol bar bya'o/ / shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa
120b3(phal chen): nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
120b4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rkyen 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags pa
120b5(phal chen): med par rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i ma
120b6(phal chen): la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa
120b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par ba'am pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul tha mi dang pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyor yul dang ldan pa/
121a1(phal chen): byin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang / de dag la bdag dang 'jig
121a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyur 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gabs
121a3(phal chen): pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub semA da pA byang chub sem dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
121a4(phal chen): pabar bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon
121a5(phal chen): btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par rjod de brtag pa dang /
121a6(phal chen): mos par bya ba dang / mi gtang bar bya ba sems shing du ste/ smre sngags bton nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dge
121a7(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus par
121b1(phal chen): rjes su lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su bsam pa dang / dge ba'i shes gnyen la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar
121b2(phal chen): bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pas pha tsam du sems/
121b3(phal chen): shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi drung nas song ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing /
121b4(phal chen): dpon btang brjod kyi gdayas ngag la nan tan bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang
121b5(phal chen): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar
121b6(phal chen): bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu
121b7(phal chen): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rje su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / khye
122a1(phal chen): mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la bsgribs pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang /
122a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shin tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang smon lam gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing / mthar
122a3(phal chen): gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las 'chag pa'i gnas shing gi 'chag sa'i
122a4(phal chen): mthar 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par gzhag nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing mi g.yo la/ byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrangs te dran pa mngon du byas nas/ ting nge
122a5(phal chen): 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing / g.yas g.yon dang steng logs su lus mtha' yas la/ tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ spyi gdug
122a6(phal chen): bltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la ni ste/
122a7(phal chen): g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la/ dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis ma khyab
122b1(phal chen): pa rab tu 'byed pa byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
122b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog
122b3(phal chen): pa dang / ngan song gyi lam thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba
122b4(phal chen): rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'phrul
122b5(phal chen): pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang rim gro sna tshogs
122b6(phal chen): byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i yul spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ rdo
122b7(phal chen): tsugs dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / cod pan sna tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba
123a1(phal chen): mthong ngo / / bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gos thams
123a2(phal chen): cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang
123a3(phal chen): gnas thams cad dang / snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su sdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams
123a4(phal chen): nathugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed cing // phyogs
123a5(phal chen): bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / / pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bzo
123a6(phal chen): sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang / rgyus la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i
123a7(phal chen): gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas
123b1(phal chen): yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing / chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang
123b2(phal chen): log par lhung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang / theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs
123b3(phal chen): su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu zag par bya ba dang / sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzung pa dang /
123b4(phal chen): don spyad pa la sems can dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don mthun par bsdub
123b5(phal chen): pa ston par byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbyibs su 'khod pa/ pags pa dang / shun
123b6(phal chen): pa'i gos gyon pa/ ril ba thogs pa/ gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/ steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
123b7(phal chen): rjod pa byed cing / chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod
124a1(phal chen): pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rang tu dgod pa dang / 'jig
124a2(phal chen): rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu
124a3(phal chen): dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // rtsib logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/ lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab
124a4(phal chen): pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab dang
124a5(phal chen): me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par grub
124a6(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
124a7(phal chen): rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i byang phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char
124b1(phal chen): 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub
124b2(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi klu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs
124b3(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo ze ba mtho ba mu tig ki dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba bsam
124b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lnga'i
124b5(phal chen): lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te gser gyi me
124b6(phal chen): tog snyim pas 'thor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings
124b7(phal chen): la byin gyis rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / bdug spos kyi nabun dang / sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
125a1(phal chen): 'khor la 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar
125a2(phal chen): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // thong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas
125a3(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi skyes rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing / chu 'dzin chen po yongs
125a4(phal chen): su bskyam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil
125a5(phal chen): 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems pa'i
125a6(phal chen): sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam
125a7(phal chen): par gtor ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi skyes rnam par 'phrul pa dang rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang /
125b1(phal chen): sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sem
125b2(phal chen): la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la
125b3(phal chen): rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul
125b4(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyi sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan
125b5(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rna
125b6(phal chen): la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su rjod pa byed cing / rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod
125b7(phal chen): pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang / gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjod pa dang / cha mnyam
126a1(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dka' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod
126a2(phal chen): pa dang / zhi ba la nas su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can
126a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi don du rjod pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzabs kyis mthong ngo // phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dbang po dbyin
126a4(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa dang / kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs
126a5(phal chen): su bskor ba/ sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
126a6(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gebs shing / dge ba'i spyod pa thams
126a7(phal chen): cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / laka na rdo rje'i las kyis yang
126b1(phal chen): gdag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan
126b2(phal chen): song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa/ sems can gyi don
126b3(phal chen): byabs 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
126b4(phal chen): pas kyi rgol ba'i khor char gcod pa byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zabs kyis mthong ngo // mdun gyi lto nas mi 'am
126b5(phal chen): ci dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul gis sa ba rnyed mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs medu bya can dang / dri zla'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
126b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / kwa'i dbyangs kyis chos
126b7(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rjod pa byed cing / byang chub kyi sems yong su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon/
127a1(phal chen): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor ma'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa
127a2(phal chen): thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bskrun pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzungs pa dang
127a3(phal chen): sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang
127a4(phal chen): sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su skyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
127a5(phal chen): mthong ngo / / kha'i sgo nas 'khor lo'i sbyar ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing // stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi
127a6(phal chen): rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba
127a7(phal chen): dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dpral ba dang
127b1(phal chen): rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa lus rnam par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod
127b2(phal chen): pa dang / brdzun du smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par brtsom
127b3(phal chen): pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / / zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
127b4(phal chen): byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi zla bral yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gnyis pa thams cad las 'jig rten
127b5(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa la brtson par
127b6(phal chen): sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams
127b7(phal chen): cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi rab thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tshom gyi spo thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som
128a1(phal chen): rab rib yongs su bsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu rjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i
128a2(phal chen): tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgri pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs rjod pa byed
128a3(phal chen): cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor baN+Di stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing
128a4(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed ring 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems can rnams kyi gti
128a5(phal chen): mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog
128a6(phal chen): dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DU R+Sha'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong gser gyi kha dog can
128a7(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyer pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang
128b1(phal chen): ga ser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / asma gar ba'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
128b2(phal chen): gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od asma gar ba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog
128b3(phal chen): can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams
128b4(phal chen): su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing
128b5(phal chen): rnams su 'od mu tig dam po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su zad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang ba'i/
128b6(phal chen): gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi
128b7(phal chen): dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i
129a1(phal chen): dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags par byed cing
129a2(phal chen): sems can tshad med pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / / dpral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul
129a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshad
129a4(phal chen): med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gebs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
129a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dbyibs sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa'i lus yongs su ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bres pa'i lus rab tu brten pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'a
129a6(phal chen): gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste gtong ba dang / len pa
129a7(phal chen): dang / dngos po yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa'i sprin mang po rab tu dge ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sbyin pa'i
129b1(phal chen): spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams
129b2(phal chen): cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yongs su yang dag par brjod pa dang
129b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo / / yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
129b4(phal chen): phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / ba spu ni bug thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang
129b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang /
129b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rjeche
129b7(phal chen): po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa
130a1(phal chen): dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing / mi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang
130a2(phal chen): nyon mongs pa la dbang sbyar ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo / / yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig
130a3(phal chen): rten rnams la mdog gi ser gyi kha dog lta bu mngon par ston cing khro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / shar gnyer ba med pa dang // zhe sdang ba med pa dang / chung gson pa med pa dang /
130a4(phal chen): khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol
130a5(phal chen): tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dbang sgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang
130a6(phal chen): bar byed pa mthong ngo / / yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu
130a7(phal chen): ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas mi skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
130b1(phal chen): pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzung pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang //
130b2(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod
130b3(phal chen): pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / las la dbang
130b4(phal chen): sbyar ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang rgyan mi 'chad pa brtson par byed pa mthong ngo / / yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung
130b5(phal chen): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal
130b6(phal chen): ba dang / rlom pa dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa 'gying ba dang nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan
130b7(phal chen): rab tu gzhom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang
131a1(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / sems can la dbang sbyar ba la sem
131a2(phal chen): can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / skad cig re re la n+do kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sred
131a3(phal chen): byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams rud nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad
131a4(phal chen): thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsla
131a5(phal chen): pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i r-i'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang / lta ba thams cad zug rngu dbyung ba dang / the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rib
131a6(phal chen): rnam par bsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re ra la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sem
131a7(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu rjod pa byed cing / ba spu'i bu gzam
131b1(phal chen): cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i
131b2(phal chen): 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha mi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
131b3(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnam la byang chub sem dpa'i dbang gi
131b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / / yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs med pa'i rdul
131b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug snga sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga tham cad nas byang chub sems
131b6(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par
131b7(phal chen): bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dkod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril ba dang / chos
132a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu rjod pa byed cing smon lam
132a2(phal chen): / tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu
132a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu byung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
132a4(phal chen): nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dbye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang
132a5(phal chen): khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang mi nyam pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas 'tshog pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa
132a6(phal chen): med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing
132a7(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gebs pa rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo / / yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas
132b1(phal chen): sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ka thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i son gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyir
132b2(phal chen): papa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rang ye shes mngom par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan
132b3(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su
132b4(phal chen): brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par 'grub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
132b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam
132b6(phal chen): la ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
132b7(phal chen): kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa dang mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yang dag par brjod pa dang
133a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par dgrol ba dang / sems can thams
133a2(phal chen): cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
133a3(phal chen): bgengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
133a4(phal chen): mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur sba zhing tshad
133a5(phal chen): med par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa
133a6(phal chen): dang / 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos
133a7(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi
133b1(phal chen): kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya
133b2(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub
133b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i
133b4(phal chen): bsam pa dag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon
133b5(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnam
133b6(phal chen): la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
133b7(phal chen): rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi rab tu smog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las
134a1(phal chen): dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems
134a2(phal chen): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
134a3(phal chen): yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
134a4(phal chen): dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi
134a5(phal chen): swA rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad
134a6(phal chen): mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par
134a7(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dka'i lha rnams la ye shes kyi rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
134b1(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang
134b2(phal chen): mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin
134b3(phal chen): gshegs pa mthong ba sa dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam
134b4(phal chen): mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin
134b5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces
134b6(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i chos
134b7(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
135a1(phal chen): par dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos
135a2(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho nom par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
135a3(phal chen): mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten
135a4(phal chen): du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol
135a5(phal chen): slong gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa lanan tan+da bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su rngam pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhan ces bya ba'i chos kyi g
135a6(phal chen): yi char mngon par dbab pa dang / / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems
135a7(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i
135b1(phal chen): kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ka thams
135b2(phal chen): cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor kha dog dang gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can/ dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la snga gon du gnas pa/
135b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor
135b4(phal chen): la la las ni/ sbyin pa'i sbyor ma sgron med pas bdog mi thams cad yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i rdo'i dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ dus gsum gyi
135b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer
135b6(phal chen): gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpo'i thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang yan lag
135b7(phal chen): gi dam pa bcad kyang / nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khu tshur rang dbyig pas bsnun te mtshon gyis lus la btab kyang / nyams su bzod par byed pa'i
136a1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad gshegs sam snying dang mig phyung yang / nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // byang chub
136a2(phal chen): sems dpa' dus gsum du byung ba rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du/ lus dang sems la gnod
136a3(phal chen): pa thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la zhi bar byas pa dang / btang
136a4(phal chen): snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brlan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo / / ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las
136a5(phal chen): nibyang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byang
136a6(phal chen): ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad
136a7(phal chen): yongs su tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad sra bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer
136b1(phal chen): gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang // lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigs su skye ba
136b2(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge
136b3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag dang
136b4(phal chen): gnas dang / gzhal med khang dang / yul dang / ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrubs pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang
136b5(phal chen): rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang
136b6(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyis mthong ngo / / ba spu'i so'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la lus ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyor pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos
136b7(phal chen): thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du'ang 'dog pa thams cad yong su bdang ste/ sems can
137a1(phal chen): thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / rim mo dang bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshen gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / dad pa dang
137a2(phal chen): zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig
137a3(phal chen): thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongs su btsal ba de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
137a4(phal chen): baspu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la mthong ngo / / ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yong
137a5(phal chen): su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pas sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo / / sems can re re la'ang lus dang spyod
137a6(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa'ang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi
137a7(phal chen): dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / / ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du smon lam mngon par
137b1(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon
137b2(phal chen): lami mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor
137b3(phal chen): skyon thams cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so so re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi rna ba'i
137b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / / ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor
137b5(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo / / ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i
137b6(phal chen): sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu ni babangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan
137b7(phal chen): ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
138a1(phal chen): gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la
138a2(phal chen): mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin
138a3(phal chen): gyi rlabs yang dag par mnon pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs
138a4(phal chen): de brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no// nyin zhag
138a5(phal chen): gnyis dang bdun yang lon no/ / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag kyang drug tu/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun
138a6(phal chen): du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang nyin zhag drug 'das nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// de nas nor bzangs kyis smras pa
138a7(phal chen): 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rkyen dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang
138b1(phal chen): mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'brog pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa
138b2(phal chen): dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mtshur te/ de ni sems can
138b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so//
138b4(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang / mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang
138b5(phal chen): mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang // 'dus
138b6(phal chen): byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// byang chub kyi sems yang dag par
138b7(phal chen): skye ba'i rgyud yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs
139a1(phal chen): rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs yongasu bskyed par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob par
139a2(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i khyad por la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing
139a3(phal chen): snang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i
139a4(phal chen): rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnon pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i ming
139a5(phal chen): ci zhes bgyi/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yong su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang
139a6(phal chen): ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyun ces bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thod pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nga
139a7(phal chen): 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongs
139b1(phal chen): su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / smras pa/ 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bas sam ma bas/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig
139b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med
139b3(phal chen): / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su spang ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya//
139b4(phal chen): ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas
139b5(phal chen): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyu
139b6(phal chen): mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba ma 'dres pa shwe shing khong du
139b7(phal chen): chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su 'grang
140a1(phal chen): bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su rtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya ba
140a2(phal chen): la thogs pa med do/ / snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med do// byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas blta ba'i
140a3(phal chen): phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang
140a4(phal chen): po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ / sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho bos
140a5(phal chen): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos kyi
140a6(phal chen): dbyings kyi yul la tho gros rnam par drag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzung
140a7(phal chen): chen po'i snang ba la dbang sgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu
140b1(phal chen): 'byung ba/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pas sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa
140b2(phal chen): ba'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul bstan pa 'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa 'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su
140b3(phal chen): snang bar bya ba 'am/ yang dag par sgrubs pa mngon par brjod pa 'am/ lam yongs su bstan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ sems kyi yul
140b4(phal chen): shes par bya ba 'am/ / ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod
140b5(phal chen): de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig/ grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od
140b6(phal chen): bzangs kyi chung ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
140b7(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya mcho
141a1(phal chen): rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/ chos kyis nye bar 'tsho bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa/ ye shes snang bar gyur
141a2(phal chen): pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pas khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang
141a3(phal chen): ldan par gyur pa/ phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu 'dal ba des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
141a4(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas yang dang yang lta zhing / yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / rab tu
141a5(phal chen): gdud pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar
141a6(phal chen): du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / mi gtang ba dang /
141a7(phal chen): yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / gzungs
141b1(phal chen): kyi rjes su bsam pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su yong ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjes su bsam pa
141b2(phal chen): dang ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yongs
141b3(phal chen): su gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo / / / bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
