141b4(phal chen): bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon ngan gyis ni mgu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du 'drag/
141b5(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams dag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas
141b6(phal chen): tsam du lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
141b7(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthor gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa ga na ba der phyin nas de mthong ba/ bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba/
142a1(phal chen): rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba spel legs pas yongs su brgyan
142a2(phal chen): pa/ ring po che thams cad kyi shing gi 'phreng ba'i me tog srad bu yid du 'ong sprin rab tu 'phrul pa sa gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa/ shing
142a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i shing
142a4(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi lhun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba 'phyang ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin po
142a5(phal chen): che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing sba la rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can/ yid bzhin gyis gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing mdzes
142a6(phal chen): par brgyan pa sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mtho dman
142a7(phal chen): med par gnas pa/ rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas rgyan du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas
142b1(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na/ khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag
142b2(phal chen): bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bad dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin po che rnam par snang ba las bres pa dang / rdzing bu brgya stong phrag ru
142b3(phal chen): rin po che thams cad las bzhi blangs te rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi them sas btag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/
142b4(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu tham pa gzhi nor bu rin po che chu'angang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par zos pa/
142b5(phal chen): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ ngang dur dang / rma bya dang / khu byug dang / zung khrung dang / ka la bing ka dang / ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin
142b6(phal chen): po che'i ta la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po zas
142b7(phal chen): pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi rabs yongasu bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lags par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang 'thun
143a1(phal chen): pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis mtha' 'khor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad+mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i 'od chen pos snang
143a2(phal chen): bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las
143a3(phal chen): blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhan mngon par 'phags pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas
143a4(phal chen): brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po mi 'pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i
143a5(phal chen): rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i nga kun tu ldang ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing
143a6(phal chen): gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der stan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed
143a7(phal chen): pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod skra
143b1(phal chen): tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing thags kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches
143b2(phal chen): brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po chu 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtshon
143b3(phal chen): gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i bod zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag
143b4(phal chen): bshams shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po'ang rin po che bsam gyi mi khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par
143b5(phal chen): brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag brkus
143b6(phal chen): kun nas khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang / 'khri shing gI t+ka re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / 'phreng ba'i zla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang nor bu rin po che'i
143b7(phal chen): bla re dang / ka ser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che'i rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang nor bu rin
144a1(phal chen): po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o// rin po me pa brgya skyong
144a2(phal chen): phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i
144a3(phal chen): dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bai DAR+Ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang spos kyi gzugs kyi rba ba dang / rin po
144a4(phal chen): che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i dra ba dang / de dgu la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa'o// snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus
144a5(phal chen): kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po rje nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan
144a6(phal chen): kyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che pad+mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang /
144a7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang // nor
144b1(phal chen): bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po'i snang ba dang / glog gi 'phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong zag bcus rtag
144b2(phal chen): tu snang bar byas pa'o/ / bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong
144b3(phal chen): phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ lha dzes las 'das pa'i 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos
144b4(phal chen): tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa lha rdza sa las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthob bar dga' ste 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/
144b5(phal chen): lha mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba
144b6(phal chen): mnyam pas rang rang kyi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu chos mnyan pas skom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par
144b7(phal chen): par 'bab pa ste/ de ni dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa
145a1(phal chen): lag pa la wA rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang gdu bu thogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par
145a2(phal chen): mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon mthing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i du bas mdzes par brdzun pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gyi
145a3(phal chen): rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba
145a4(phal chen): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan/
145a5(phal chen): nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab 'phrul dga' 'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris su gdog
145a6(phal chen): pa 'am/ rab dga' ldan ma/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab 'tshe ma 'am/ 'tshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum
145a7(phal chen): kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po 'am/ dri za 'am/ phul bum gyi dbang po 'am/ grul bram mam/ klu'i dang
145b1(phal chen): po 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto
145b2(phal chen): 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gshin rje'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ yi dag sa sam/ mi'i dbang po 'am/
145b3(phal chen): mi 'ang rung ste/ sems can tshad me da grabs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang // nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang //

145b5(phal chen): lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'od
145b6(phal chen): bde dag nang sna tshogs shig gis btab bam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas
145b7(phal chen): bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nang thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bar
146a1(phal chen): 'gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shigs par 'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa
146a2(phal chen): med pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur/ dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang
146a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par
146a4(phal chen): 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ spyod pa'i sgo thams
146a5(phal chen): cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po'ang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan
146a6(phal chen): pa'i tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// se nas tshong dpor gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi rang
146a7(phal chen): kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma yi bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas// de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
146b1(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras
146b2(phal chen): so/ / 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
146b3(phal chen): dkyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te// 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ga damra ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na// 'phags
146b4(phal chen): ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des
146b5(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod
146b6(phal chen): pa'o/ / mnyan na don yod pa'o// rim gror byas pa don yod pa'o// ka nas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o// rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o// rig
146b7(phal chen): kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ma dgongs pa rnams
147a1(phal chen): kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ sems can rnams kyang bla na med/
147a2(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing gdun/
147a3(phal chen): rin po che'i khri 'di la bzhugs nas chos ston to// shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du/ phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mo ni
147a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o/ / chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo dang
147a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/
147a6(phal chen): / rig kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
147a7(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub lnga phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang sbyor pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go/ smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa
147b1(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yul ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
147b2(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar med mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos
147b3(phal chen): mchod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mo yongs su bzung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa
147b4(phal chen): la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo / / chos kyi 'khor lo'ang kho mos zung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'ang kho mos bsnyen bkur to//
147b5(phal chen): de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshes
147b6(phal chen): pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo / / de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag bzhes
147b7(phal chen): bya ba byung ngo / / de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de
148a1(phal chen): ltar tshe gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab chag
148a2(phal chen): su bsams te dran par byas nas/ gang kho mo'i rim gror byas te bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos thob par gyur pa dang
148a3(phal chen): gang gi bstan pa la kho mos tshang ba'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan cad du kho mos de bzhin
148a4(phal chen): gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to/ / rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/
148a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi
148a6(phal chen): bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa chen po'i 'gro ba thams
148a7(phal chen): cad rgyas par 'gebs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su
148b1(phal chen): srung bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
148b2(phal chen): rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
148b3(phal chen): rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pas// byang chub sems
148b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnam kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i
148b5(phal chen): 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu tha dan pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis tshig brjod kyang / 'gro ba
148b6(phal chen): thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/ byang chub sem dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis
148b7(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
149a1(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig cig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang smin par bya ba'i/
149a2(phal chen): phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin// sems can stong gi phyir ma yin// sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sem can
149a3(phal chen): bye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong
149a4(phal chen): kigi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yino/ / sems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin/
149a5(phal chen): sems can pan bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyir phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying ki phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal byol gyi
149a6(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldad khyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyor zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
149a7(phal chen): can lham snyem gyi phyir pa yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ma
149b1(phal chen): nub kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'as yar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can /
149b2(phal chen): yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam sum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
149b3(phal chen): rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zab thid kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grib yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zin 'byo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
149b4(phal chen): bsam khyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang zeng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
149b5(phal chen): rgyal 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsno yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phro ba kye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rtse
149b6(phal chen): 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yod than gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhing yig kyi
149b7(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin// sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin// sems can khrig zas kyi phyir ma yin/
150a1(phal chen): sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yang sud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
150a2(phal chen): can phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sgrub pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug phyir ma yin/ sems can zhig ge'i phreng ma yin
150a3(phal chen): sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyed med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog 'phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin/ sems can sku
150a4(phal chen): 'phyes kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod pos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhong yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir
150a5(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can zhi snyad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dag thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
150a6(phal chen): phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sam sal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin
150a7(phal chen): sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rem 'drol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi dad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phul yon gyi phyir ma yin/
150b1(phal chen): sems can 'ol rol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dang dad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'brang ba rtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga'
150b2(phal chen): rgyarkyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can pyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol khyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang ba yas kyi phyir
150b3(phal chen): ma yin/ sem can cal yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrangs yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byim 'phyi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yam me'i phyir
150b4(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can stsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngab ldeb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can pang phung gi phyir ma yin
150b5(phal chen): sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'byangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin// sems
150b6(phal chen): can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can sgrub
150b7(phal chen): ljib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'byam yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can smos yal gyi phyir
151a1(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can bkra tshal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can po rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin// sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/
151a2(phal chen): sems can phyem byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bzang 'phyos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/
151a3(phal chen): sems can dpag yas las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal phyong las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yas kyi
151a4(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'thang yol las bsres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems
151a5(phal chen): can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyed kyi phyir ma yin// sems can bsam phyod las bsgres pa'i phyir mayin
151a6(phal chen): sems can mtha' 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag las bsgres
151a7(phal chen): pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
151b1(phal chen): pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa
151b2(phal chen): nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
151b3(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can
151b4(phal chen): rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
151b5(phal chen): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
151b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang
151b7(phal chen): gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtoH
152a1(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
152a2(phal chen): gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs
152a3(phal chen): rgyas bcu bsnyer bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra
152a4(phal chen): bsnyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams
152a5(phal chen): gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
152a6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i
152a7(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
152b1(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang
152b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
152b3(phal chen): chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/
152b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
152b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon
152b6(phal chen): lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
152b7(phal chen): gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
153a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyun la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye
153a2(phal chen): ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs
153a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems
153a4(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas
153a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
153a6(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin
153a7(phal chen): pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
153b1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ / sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
153b2(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du meng pa'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes
153b3(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sem
153b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya
153b5(phal chen): mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
153b6(phal chen): pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shi
153b7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/
154a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
154a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
154a3(phal chen): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig
154a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
154a5(phal chen): chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams
154a6(phal chen): cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gto
154a7(phal chen): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas
154b1(phal chen): z hing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par byaba'i
154b2(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams
154b3(phal chen): cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
154b4(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
154b5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul
154b6(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod ring rim
154b7(phal chen): zor bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen
155a1(phal chen): bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin// sangs
155a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma
155a3(phal chen): lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa
155a4(phal chen): tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
155a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyun ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin
155a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro
155a7(phal chen): ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor
155b1(phal chen): los lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa
155b2(phal chen): thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas
155b3(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags
155b4(phal chen): kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin// sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang nyon
155b5(phal chen): mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes
155b6(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi
155b7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprir cher po can nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag la so zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyodapa
156a1(phal chen): tshul dang / sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
156a2(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// byang chub sems
156a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam
156a4(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig/ bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du
156a5(phal chen): thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig/ bdag gi sgor lam semasu thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i mtha'
156a6(phal chen): gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig ces de ltar smon lam btab bo/ / smras pa/ 'phags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
156a7(phal chen): bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes
156b1(phal chen): par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir ri rab
156b2(phal chen): dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel/
156b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir rlung du gyur pa/ sems can
156b4(phal chen): thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa/ bsod nam
156b5(phal chen): kyi 'od zer gyi rnga ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir brgya byin lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa
156b6(phal chen): 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan
156b7(phal chen): bapabar nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na/ yul chub gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na drang srong 'jigs mchog
157a1(phal chen): dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la dris shig/ des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro//
157a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar
157a3(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal nas ngo mchims gang bar dus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing dge ba'i bshes
157a4(phal chen): gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i rjes su
157a5(phal chen): bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i gshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su
157a6(phal chen): bsam pa dang / byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i
157a7(phal chen): chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrog pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam
157b1(phal chen): pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa byed cing / dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo //
157b2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
157b3(phal chen): pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa
157b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter 'thob par bya ba la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ smon
157b5(phal chen): lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin
157b6(phal chen): gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par rnam par lta ba'i sems
157b7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi tshogs pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing thub par dka' ba'i
158a1(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa de mthar gyis yul chub gtsang ma gal ba der byin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang srong
158a2(phal chen): 'jigs mchog dbyangs dge ba sbyangs pa'i gnas shing dang shing phran sna tshogs mangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/ lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas
158a3(phal chen): 'grigs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shing thog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing thog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshog
158a4(phal chen): kyi shing drung nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/ a ka ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing las spos
158a5(phal chen): kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa/ n+ya gro d+ha'i shing dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang
158a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog smin pa 'brul pa/ me tog gi tshal pad+mo dang ut+pa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong
158a7(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzang kyis/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing / tsan dan gyi yal gshin tu 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na// thor tsugs
158b1(phal chen): kyi cod pan can/ pags pa dang cu'i gos son/ shing kun gyi slad g.yogs can/ rtswa'i spyan la 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang skyong 'jig
158b2(phal chen): mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas//
158b3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams
158b4(phal chen): ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus
158b5(phal chen): par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dag par skyed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par
158b6(phal chen): yang dag par lta/ nyam nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes kanyen yin par yang
158b7(phal chen): dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ g.yang sa'i
159a1(phal chen): 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dab pur wA/ byams pa
159a2(phal chen): zo'iri stobs kyis sim pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen po yongs skyed pa
159a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs rdog po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa
159a4(phal chen): nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ / lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs pa
159a5(phal chen): lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis/ yid du 'ong ba'i chog brjod de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
159a6(phal chen): pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
159a7(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'bas pa ji lta byang chub semaras byang chub
159b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ bram ze'i
159b2(phal chen): byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
159b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la mgron du gnyer to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/ ye shes
159b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o//
159b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o// snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o// ye shes chen
159b6(phal chen): po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pararu spel bar
159b7(phal chen): 'dod pa'o/ / de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos/ tshong dpon
160a1(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang la gtor to/ / mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// mngon par phyag 'tshal to// de ltar btud de phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyog
160a2(phal chen): su bskor ba byas te tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ / 'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid
160a3(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro/ / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro//
160a4(phal chen): mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i 'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par
160a5(phal chen): zlog par 'gyur ro/ / ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs su skor bar 'gyur ro// ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs
160a6(phal chen): su ston par 'gyur ro/ / ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// chos kyi mig rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rnam la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston
160a7(phal chen): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
160b1(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu skyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro//
160b2(phal chen): byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong
160b3(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sem
160b4(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o/ / nor bzang gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul dri lta bu
160b5(phal chen): zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mgo la byugs nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo // tshong
160b6(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzang la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung ma thag tu/ de'i mod la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing
160b7(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
161a1(phal chen): kyi zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang rnam pa zangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong
161a2(phal chen): ngongo/ / de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil
161a3(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig
161a4(phal chen): las kyang phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa nyan to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to//
161a5(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshig pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshog
161a6(phal chen): kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la'ang zhugs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhug
161a7(phal chen): so/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi
161b1(phal chen): ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs
161b2(phal chen): pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/
161b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba/ phyogs kun
161b4(phal chen): gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba
161b5(phal chen): rab tu thob pa/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po'i yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam
161b6(phal chen): mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin
161b7(phal chen): gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par
162a1(phal chen): shes so/ / la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo gcig lon
162a2(phal chen): pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyan// la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo sh+ya
162a3(phal chen): ba brgya lon pa sA ma/ la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal
162a4(phal chen): pa phyed lon pa snyan/ / la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyan// la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa
162a5(phal chen): brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ ya lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la la
162a6(phal chen): ni bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du
162a7(phal chen): bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin
162b1(phal chen): tu za ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur to//
162b2(phal chen): de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes
162b3(phal chen): par gyur to/ / de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smas pa/ rig kyi bu dran mo dang / smras pa/ 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zan
162b4(phal chen): no/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro/
162b5(phal chen): ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus thams cad du 'khor lo skor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi
162b6(phal chen): mtshan dang ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu 'god pa dus gsum gyi yul skad cig
162b7(phal chen): gcig gis ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ye shes snang
163a1(phal chen): ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa
163a2(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa bzhin du kun snang zhing ni ma mang la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
163a3(phal chen): rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa 'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa'am/ ye shes kyi
163a4(phal chen): yul la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par thar
163a5(phal chen): pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba 'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
163a6(phal chen): dag pa brjod pa 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu brtan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyur 'di nyid na/ yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/
163a7(phal chen): de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i kun du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar
163b1(phal chen): nan rgyus rnas ts+tshak+Sha/ de nas nga cor yang sgyu sa/ smras ni rnams pad la rlo ma ni med 'di smras nas/ rlung song 'dzugs
163b2(phal chen): dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la hU~M bos blag 'tshal te/ rang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong dusar gams phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang da
163b3(phal chen): yang bltas te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsam pa/ na
163b4(phal chen): tsho da pon gyi bu nor bzang byung chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar nus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi u hU~Mn
163b5(phal chen): par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mngon sum gyi ye shes
163b6(phal chen): kyis mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa
163b7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams
164a1(phal chen): cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/ gnyis
164a2(phal chen): su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dul ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyan pa thams cad la mngon
164a3(phal chen): du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa/ rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
164a4(phal chen): spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye shes
164a5(phal chen): snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/ / chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pa/ ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la
164a6(phal chen): 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon
164a7(phal chen): lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyar ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dpung med pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa
164b1(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta
164b2(phal chen): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten
164b3(phal chen): kyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang /
164b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag/
164b5(phal chen): par blta ba dang / sems can rnam par phye ba'i tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba khong du
164b6(phal chen): chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can dang / phyogs dang / dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon
164b7(phal chen): du bya ba byed cing mthar gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ka la ba der phyin to// de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
165a1(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shin tu mtho ba'i g.yang sa'i lam gyi rtsu
165a2(phal chen): spu gri'i sos gshibs pas 'khor bar snang ngo / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas
165a3(phal chen): thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
165a4(phal chen): spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos
165a5(phal chen): 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu song la sdu
165a6(phal chen): bri'i so dngang ba'i ri di la 'dzegs te/ me'i 'o bas 'dir mchongs shig dang / des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang 'a
165a7(phal chen): snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa'ang shin tu dkon/ mir gyur te lom pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'ang shin tu dkon sangs rgyas 'byang
165b1(phal chen): ba'ang shin tu dkon/ dbang po nyams pa med pa'ang shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa'ang shin tu dkon/ skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa'ang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
165b2(phal chen): yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pas legs par sdud pa'ang shin tu dkon/ yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba'ang shin tu dkon/ mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan
165b3(phal chen): byed pa'ang shin tu dkon na/ de skad zer zhing bdag gis dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la/ de ltar bdag gis srog bcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam/ cig ma yin nam/ bdud kyis byin
165b4(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa 'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar brdzus pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi gcags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gis thams
165b5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid la bgegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin thang / / bdag la ma gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin thang/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi
165b6(phal chen): sgo la bgegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang nas/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems
165b7(phal chen): brtan par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o// brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o//
166a1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o// blta ba'i rnam pa dang dra ba thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o// nyon mongs pa'i lhag smrig thams cad
166a2(phal chen): zad par bsregs pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ / mi gom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dkon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang 'jigs pa rnam
166a3(phal chen): par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o/ / dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o// chos thams cad kyi 'od zer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka'
166a4(phal chen): thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang / dbang sbyar ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhim/ sems dpa' blta ba'i rnam pa sna tshog
166a5(phal chen): la mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad/ 'phags pa 'di'i dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyi thugs dam gyi mthus rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing / de dag bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong /
166a6(phal chen): bab med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de dag phyin pa dang 'phags 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang / drag shul gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi zil gyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa
166a7(phal chen): thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / nga rgyal dang rlom sems thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i phyir chos ston to// 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang /
166b1(phal chen): byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang / byang chubatu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
166b2(phal chen): kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston
166b3(phal chen): to/ / bdud stong phrag bcu'ang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor ta 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas
166b4(phal chen): yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing / kho bo cag gi khyim dang / lus dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de'i phyir
166b5(phal chen): kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnasan bag dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // kho bo rug 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag
166b6(phal chen): la ci nas kyang rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to//
166b7(phal chen): dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su
167a1(phal chen): gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo //
167a2(phal chen): bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang sbyar ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang sbyar ba thob par bya
167a3(phal chen): ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang sbyar ba thob par bya ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug
167a4(phal chen): pa thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshe la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos
167a5(phal chen): ston to/ / rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'ang steng gi bar snang la 'khor da/ lha rdzas kyi klu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags te/ mchod pa byas
167a6(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od byung zhing / des kho bo cag
167a7(phal chen): gi gzhal med khang 'di dag rnam par dag ste/ gsal ba dang 'od shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro// rgyan 'di dag dang lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang rnam par dag cing gsal la 'ong shi
167b1(phal chen): dang bar 'gyur ro/ / de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang cas pas 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med de/ 'dod pa'i 'de ba la mngon par
167b2(phal chen): dga' ba med pas lus dang sems sim par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ba yin te/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la sems rnam par dag
167b3(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ / sems kyi 'od dang bar bya ba dang / sems shin tu dag par bya ba dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed
167b4(phal chen): pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes 'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub
167b5(phal chen): pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par
167b6(phal chen): bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ / rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang steng gi bar
167b7(phal chen): snang la 'khod nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas
168a1(phal chen): yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la
168a2(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ / chog shes pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
168a3(phal chen): rab tu thob par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang
168a4(phal chen): bcas pa dag gis kyang / lha rdzas kyi me tog man+da ra ba'i char mngon par phab ste 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe
168a5(phal chen): bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag tug phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dka' ba thams
168a6(phal chen): cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin sdong phrag bar so so nas de ba'i dbang po sum du rtsa
168a7(phal chen): gnyis dang / lnga'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog gi sprin gyim mngon par phab sde 'di skad ces
168b1(phal chen): 'dzer to/ / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa dri dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i nags
168b2(phal chen): tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang / gam yon glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du dong ngo // bdag
168b3(phal chen): cag der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ / 'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi brtan zhing 'jig
168b4(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i cho ga brjod do/ / dregs pa dang bag med pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston
168b5(phal chen): to/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gshegs pas sems skyo bar gyur nas thams cad mkhyen
168b6(phal chen): paba'i sems brtan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo// klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo la sogs pa/
168b7(phal chen): klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing // dus dang 'thun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu mos glu blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas
169a1(phal chen): kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par rab ste 'di skad ces 'arjer to/ / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshwa/ me'i
169a2(phal chen): phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas bye ma'i char dang nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to// khro ba 'byung ba'ang zhi bar byas
169a3(phal chen): telus sim par byas shing yid shin tu mos par byed do/ / de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/ 'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyu ngan pa rnam
169a4(phal chen): par smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de// thams cad
169a5(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu'ang nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod de/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal po'i drod kyi skye mched dang /
169a6(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe// kho bo cag gi 'khor kun
169a7(phal chen): kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan cing/
169b1(phal chen): 'tshe ba med pa la zhugs pa'i rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo // kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gis zil gyis non pas rang rang gi gnas de dang de dag na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang
169b2(phal chen): rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / / bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing bde bas khyab par
169b3(phal chen): mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / lus srul po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de
169b4(phal chen): ltar chos ston to/ / dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas
169b5(phal chen): yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i me'i bu mo 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste/ bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur par 'phags pa
169b6(phal chen): 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag drung du phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to//
169b7(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thor te/ nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces
170a1(phal chen): 'dzer to/ / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe// kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i
170a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang // rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyis zil gyis non te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo //
170a3(phal chen): der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i bzod pa la gzud pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs
170a4(phal chen): su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang / bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugs su mngon par
170a5(phal chen): sprul te 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar byas nas yongs su
170a6(phal chen): g.yo bar byed do/ / des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/ skye ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'khod do// 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing byams pa chen po la yang
170a7(phal chen): dag par sbyor bar mdzad do/ / snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do// 'khor ba'i rtse mtshor 'jug pa la'ang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// 'dod pa'i 'dam du phreng ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba
170b1(phal chen): la'ang yongs su sbyong bar mdzad do/ / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la'ang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// rnam
170b2(phal chen): pa ji lta bur yongasu smin pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/ / mi 'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu'ang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags
170b3(phal chen): pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i 'phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lnga ldir brgyus pa'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i yo
170b4(phal chen): byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag
170b5(phal chen): par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so// 'jig rten gyi kham
170b6(phal chen): kyi tshangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dka' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
170b7(phal chen): ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su spong ba byed do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba
171a1(phal chen): zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdud dang
171a2(phal chen): tu pham par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig rlos
171a3(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo skor ba mdzad do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi thangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang ni che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i dbying
171a4(phal chen): su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad do zhes bya ba'i skra 'byin te/ rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char rlags pa'i mur thug par
171a5(phal chen): nirung yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i
