171a6(phal chen): shing ta la'i 'phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du zag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo // de ltar bdag
171a7(phal chen): cag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te/
171b1(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag bcin kyang kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
171b2(phal chen): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do/ / 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing / yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byas
171b3(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ / 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'byung ste/ 'od des mar na mnar med pa yan chad du sem
171b4(phal chen): can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pa
171b5(phal chen): de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i rtsa'i ri tsamA su bde bar skyes so/ / de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du gzo zhing mthong bas
171b6(phal chen): mi ngoms pas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // der bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad med pa rnam byang chub tu
171b7(phal chen): smon lam 'deb par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu blo nA dga' rangs te/ mgu ning nyam bde la tshom zhing yid bde ba skyes te/ tham
172a1(phal chen): ze rgyal ba'i rjod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de/ zam ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces snga so// 24#
172a2(phal chen): pa de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so/ / de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad
172a3(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang 'thun byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/ de phyir de yi don rnams thams cad 'thun par 'grub par 'gyur/ 'thun pa'i
172a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang kyis ri g.yang sa'i lam spu gri'i so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/ me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so// de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang
172a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/ / me des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas/ des 'di skad
172a6(phal chen): ces smras so/ / 'phags pa'i me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di'ang de ltar re ka na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
172a7(phal chen): thar pa dkyil 'khor mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' mi'i phung po lta
172b1(phal chen): bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / blta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can du mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa med cing sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/
172b2(phal chen): yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta bu/ brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa/ sbyor ba lhod pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson
172b3(phal chen): 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go ru bgos pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgying pa zhe
172b4(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo bya mA ma nye bya ba bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub semA dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji
172b5(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzad kyis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyi la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya
172b6(phal chen): stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshwe gnyen la rim po
172b7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhus pa/ mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa/ theg pa chen po la mngon du phyog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par nus pa/ dge ba'i
173a1(phal chen): gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar slob/ chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha' la mi
173a2(phal chen): gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gdon mi za ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings
173a3(phal chen): kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha' gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/ chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha'
173a4(phal chen): med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/ zhing la mngon par chags
173a5(phal chen): pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/
173a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa// gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par
173a7(phal chen): rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de mthar gyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer kang na ba der phyin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa la rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma 'khor
173b1(phal chen): bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na/ / khri tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos
173b2(phal chen): ston to zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo khang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing
173b3(phal chen): 'dug 'dug pa dang / des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang / srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/ khyed gang nas 'ongs dkang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag na re ngeng ni/
173b4(phal chen): bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas des 'asam pa/ 'dir ni su 'gro'ang dkag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de'ang nang du phyin to// de ltar phyin te bltas na/ khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can
173b5(phal chen): de'ang gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai DUR+Ya'i ka ba bkye ba/ rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pas
173b6(phal chen): rnam par bres pa/ rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu sba bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa// rin po che'i shing tags grangs med pas yongs su
173b7(phal chen): bskor ba/ gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan par 'dug par mthong ngo // bu mo byams ma de'ang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ sra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mdog
174a1(phal chen): gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te mdun du 'dug
174a2(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan
174a3(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
174a4(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig ces nas/ des kun tu byung ste bltas pa dang / rtsig par
174a5(phal chen): re dang / ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang / gser gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re dang / rin po che'i se mo do
174a6(phal chen): re las kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang
174a7(phal chen): rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to// dmigs pa de dag re re las
174b1(phal chen): ji lta ba de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na chus yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba la ni/ nam mkha'i nyi zla dang skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa
174b2(phal chen): gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo / / de bzhin du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i dmigs pa re re las kyang / chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du
174b3(phal chen): yongs su snang bar gyur to/ / de ni bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma de yongs su bzung ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bu mo byam ma'i gdong du
174b4(phal chen): bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung
174b5(phal chen): bad+hA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su brtsal ba ste/ de bzhin gshes pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di/ sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par
174b6(phal chen): mdzad de/ gcig gis gang gsungs pa de'ang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so// sbas pa/ 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs
174b7(phal chen): kyibu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la kho mo mngon du byed cing sems pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su sems pa dang / dran par bya ba dang
175a1(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba dang / rnam par brtags pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag par brgyan pa bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas so zhes bya ba
175a2(phal chen): su skye ste/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su 'du'o// khongs su chung ngo // mngon du 'gyur ro// mngon par 'du'o// longs na 'khod do// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
175a3(phal chen): sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa'i mtha' sgo dang / bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bsod nam
175a4(phal chen): / kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / sngon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i
175a5(phal chen): sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / lam mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam pa'i las yongs su spang ba
175a6(phal chen): sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang / las la dbang sgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang
175a7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang 'tsho sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems
175b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya nga'i sgo dang / sems
175b2(phal chen): 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang / mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can
175b3(phal chen): gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang /
175b4(phal chen): / chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye'i sgo dang
175b5(phal chen): yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas
175b6(phal chen): kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par
175b7(phal chen): dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag la kun nas
176a1(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs par sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kani mnyam pa/
176a2(phal chen): nyid du khong du chud bar bya ba sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang /
176a3(phal chen): gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phrab rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgrosgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa
176a4(phal chen): tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang /
176a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor
176a6(phal chen): pa kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
176a7(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgong ba
176b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan
176b2(phal chen): gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi don tshad med pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs kyi tshul
176b3(phal chen): gyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /
176b4(phal chen): spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo
176b5(phal chen): dang shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud phra
176b6(phal chen): pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ blo gros chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/
176b7(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su mi rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i mig rab rib med pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha'
177a1(phal chen): ltar tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mig can/ chags pa med pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa
177a2(phal chen): zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho ba med pa/ 'jig rten gyi don
177a3(phal chen): byed pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa ston pa/ dus kyi 'khor lo
177a4(phal chen): thams cad la dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba
177a5(phal chen): 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
177a6(phal chen): bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mo byams mal lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo //
177a7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi kazhi zab mo khong du chud par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes
177b1(phal chen): shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo
177b2(phal chen): rjes su bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su
177b3(phal chen): bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / lus kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo'i rjes su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su
177b4(phal chen): bsam par byed cing / mthar gyis yul mig gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te/ yul gyi 'khor dang / grong khyer gyi 'khor dang / tshong dus kyi 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dge ba
177b5(phal chen): sbyospyo ba'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul dang phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang / ri'i sal sul gyi 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu/ dge sbyong blta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/
177b6(phal chen): des dge slong blta na sdug pa nags tshal stug po zhig na gzhon zhing ngar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa
177b7(phal chen): mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs pa/ mig dkar gnas 'byes shing ring la rdzim pa'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa dang ldan
178a1(phal chen): gamachu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lhang seng ge ltar gdug pa/ mabur
178a2(phal chen): bshas gang zhing rgyas pa/ smig tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan
178a3(phal chen): zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring
178a4(phal chen): ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan
178a5(phal chen): gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'ong 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ pa spu re re
178a6(phal chen): nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mig mi 'gebs shing mi rgod pa/ dran pa nye bar gnas pa/ ri'i rgyal
178a7(phal chen): po la ba can lngar du dang / nags tshal dang / An dang / shing zan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ blo shin du yangs pa/ ye shes kyi skyod tshul dang dul ma grub pa med pa/ byangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sri kyi
178b1(phal chen): lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / g.yeng ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba
178b2(phal chen): thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i bsam pa'i rgyun mi 'chad pa/ snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
178b3(phal chen): kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la
178b4(phal chen): @zhugs te/ drag ngal med cing pad ral med la/ shin tu mdzes par 'chag pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
178b5(phal chen): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // dge slong blta na
178b6(phal chen): mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub pa byed do// rkang gis 'gro'i lha rnams rin po che'i pad+mos gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe yongs
178b7(phal chen): su blang ba byed do/ / me'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad mi shes pa rnams kyang mun pa dang rab rib rnam par sel to// 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams kyang me tog mang po'i char mngon
179a1(phal chen): par 'bebs so/ / sa'i lha mo g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to// nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyi nam mkha'i dbyings
179a2(phal chen): yong su rgyan pa byed do/ / rgya mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor ro// ri rab kyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal lo// rlung
179a3(phal chen): gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'gyed do// mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu btud cing
179a4(phal chen): phyag 'tshal lo/ / nyin mo'i lha rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do//
179a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge slong blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong
179a6(phal chen): blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la bzhin sbyar te/ legs par phyis nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
179a7(phal chen): dad par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lag+sa te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang mA ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gri thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar
179b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni tshes btab na ngar la/
179b2(phal chen): bab pa/ rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bdag gi de
179b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni nyin zhag gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ / la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/ la lar ni zla ba phyed du/ la lar ni zla ba gcig tu/ la lar ni lo gcig tu/ la lar ni lo brgyar/ la
179b4(phal chen): lar ni lo stong du/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong du/ la lar ni lo bye bar/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig tu/ la lar ni lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ la lar ni bskal pa bar mar/ la lar ni bskal pa
179b5(phal chen): phyed du/ la lar ni bskal pa/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis de
179b6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstan pa thos te/ gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa yang dag par blangs so// smon lam gyi rgyan yongs su sbyangs so// yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so//
179b7(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par byas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so// de dag gi chos kyi 'khor
180a1(phal chen): kho 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ngo / / de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so// de dag gi bstan pa'ang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du
180a2(phal chen): yongs su bzung ngo / / kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
180a3(phal chen): yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ / kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob
180a4(phal chen): pa'i rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ / kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'ang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis
180a5(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs so/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho bo 'chags 'di na 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams
180a6(phal chen): kyi rgyud kyi thams cad kyang / smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i nga' zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam
180a7(phal chen): pabar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par
180b1(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag
180b2(phal chen): pa dag kyang / snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mchod
180b3(phal chen): pab dang / bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnam kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo
180b4(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo// sems bskyed
180b5(phal chen): ba gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs
180b6(phal chen): kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ / sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo ba ci
180b7(phal chen): tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thas cang yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig
181a1(phal chen): la dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stob kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo dag du
181a2(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ / sems bskyed pa gcig la dus kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i
181a3(phal chen): smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ / sems bskyed pa gcig la dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa
181a4(phal chen): t hams cad kyang dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir
181a5(phal chen): mngon sum du 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje lta bu dang
181a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba/ srog gi dbang po la rgyun 'chad pa med pa/ ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi bar 'gyur ba med pa/ mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/
181a7(phal chen): ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa/ rgyu'i chos dang mnyam pa'i yan lag dang nying lag tu ldan pa'i lus can/ gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa
181b1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad 'dra ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng yongs su ston pa/ me mdag dang / me lde dang / dug dang / mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing khor yug
181b2(phal chen): ltar thub pa med pa'i lus can/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa
181b3(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dmigs pa'i bzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo thams cad du rnam par dmigs shing thos par gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngor blta ba/ chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa
181b4(phal chen): phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor bas bldan mdzes pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu 'jom pas shin tu dpa' bar snang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa las
181b5(phal chen): byung bas bldan dga' ba/ 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dum wa ra lta bu de dag gi spyod pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re san/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul
181b6(phal chen): dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na grong khyer so bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ den khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'
181b7(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / nan tan rnam par dag par bya
182a1(phal chen): la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub cing brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa/ byang chub
182a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan pas kun tu gnas shing yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char
182a3(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char gyis yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam mngon du gyur pa
182a4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha' dgon pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang /
182a5(phal chen): mnyan pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi ngoms pas chos kyi rim gro tshad med pa skyed pa dang ldan pa des/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa la
182a6(phal chen): lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i drung nas song ngo // // 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
182a7(phal chen): bam po dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams ngag rjes su zlos shing / spel ba dang / bstung ba dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / bshad pa dang / so sor
182b1(phal chen): rnam par bsgom pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'jug par bya ba dang / bkur ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang @
182b2(phal chen): yang bzlas pa dang / shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / snang bar bya ba dang / rjes su rnam par lta bar byed cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis
182b3(phal chen): yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der byin te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ de'i steng gi bar snang la sa lba dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis
182b4(phal chen): bos pa/ rigs kyi bu khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ni chu klung gi chu 'dus dang nye ba zhig na byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtse bas rtse zhing 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer
182b5(phal chen): sgo bzang po dang nye ba'i chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing / bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i
182b6(phal chen): dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang
182b7(phal chen): byug gi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'
183a1(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos
183a2(phal chen): na 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jam dpal
183a3(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pas yi ge dang / grangs dang / brda dang / rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni 'jig rten
183a4(phal chen): yi ge dang ming gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / brda dang / shod thabs shes par bya ba dang / bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi cho ga dang / dug gso ba'i thabs dang / skem pa dang / brjed byed dang
183a5(phal chen): 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / tshong dus dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gnas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang / ra ba dang / khang pa dang
183a6(phal chen): skaslar khung dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / shing rta sbyar ba'i tshul sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / dge mi dge dang / 'jigs mi 'jigs kyi ltas dang mtshan ma
183a7(phal chen): shes par bya ba dang / rmos dang / tshong dang / rnam par spyad par sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang / sems can gyi yan lag dang nying lag gi batshan gyi rgyud dang / rgyus dang / rnam par spyad pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro
183b1(phal chen): dang ngan song gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang tshogs mchod pa shes par bya dang / bde 'gro dang ngan song gi tshogs shes par
183b2(phal chen): bya ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / rgyu dang / byed pa dang / sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed pa
183b3(phal chen): de dag thams cad shes te/ de dag la sems can yongs su gzud par byed do// rab tu dgod pa byed do// yongs su gzhog par byed do// slob tu 'dzud do// sbyong du 'dzud do// brtan par byed do// lhur len par
183b4(phal chen): byed do/ / rdzogs par byed do// yongs su sgrub par byed do// yongs su spyod par byed do// gsal bar bstan pa byed do// rnam par 'phel bar byed do// mtshan mar byed do// mthar phyin par byed do// rnam
183b5(phal chen): par sbyong bar byed do/ / dri ma med par byed do// shin tu dag par byed do// 'od gsal zhing dang bar byed do// shin tu yangs par byed do// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi
183b6(phal chen): tshul shes pa de gang zhe na/ brgya stong phrag brgyan bye ba'o// bye ba bye ba na long khod do// khong khod khong long na thang dgu'o// tha dgu thang dkun khrig khrig go// khrig phrog khrig khrig na thams thams so// thams
183b7(phal chen): thams tha mas thams na myang myed do/ / myang mying myang myid na gang ya'o// gang ya gang ya na ban bun no// ban bun pan bun na phyar phyur ro// phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go// lcug lcig lcug lcig na byang bying ngo //
184a1(phal chen): byang bying byang byin chematsham mo// ches chom che mchis na stsal byol lo// khyul phyos phul grolan kyang byung ngo // byang chung byung byung ba par byer ro// ma zer bar zer na rdzing bris so//
184a2(phal chen): khrikhan ya gangs so// ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o// cho mchos na khram khrim mo// khram khrim khram khriman na ba nub bo// nab nub na pa nub na sang sang ngo // sang sang sang sa na brgyud yas so// brgyad
184a3(phal chen): yas brgyad yas na gdang yas so/ / gtang yas gtang yas na bkra yar ro// bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so// gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do// mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum
184a4(phal chen): mo/ / la ma lum la ma lu ma na yal yol lo// yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo// khral khrul khral khrul na thung thung ngo // thung thung thung thung na bsam phyod do// bsam phyong bsam phyong na brang phreng ngo // brang breng

184a6(phal chen): na yod tan na blug sa yos so/ / drug g.yos brug g.yos na sang yal lo// sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug so// 'thing yug 'bring yug na yid 'phyo'o// mi 'tsho yid 'phyon ma batheb bo// rab cheb napa nem na

184b1(phal chen): yag yag go/ / yag yag yag yag na tha ma thim mo// tha ma thim tha ma thim na rlom bskal lo// rlom pa snyal rlom pasnyal na gzhal 'phyos so// gzhal byos gzhal phyos na gzhal yal lo// gzhal yal gzhal

184b4(phal chen): nyer char nyer na phyag phyig go/ phyag phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo// zal zul zal zul na sa la sal lo// sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go// g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no// phan phun phan phun na
184b5(phal chen): brnang la'o/ / brnang ya brnang ya na re ma 'drol lo// rem 'jol rem 'drol na rdzi dang do// rdzi ngadang rdzi ngang na rdzi rdul to// rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo// phun yol phun yol na dang ngang ngo // ngang ngang dang da na
184b6(phal chen): bgrang brtsi'o/ / grang brtsi bgrang brtsin zab bgrang ngo // zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo // dga' rgyang dga' rkyang za gzhung 'jal lo// gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyung ngo // khrug phyang
184b7(phal chen): khrug phyang na 'ol phyed do/ / 'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so// gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so// gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas so// bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o//

185a2(phal chen): phang phung phang phung na khye'u tsang ngo / / khye'u tsang khye'u tsang ni zhung zung ngo // zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo// mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rdul to// mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so//

185a6(phal chen): 'phyos la bsgres pa'o/ / bgrang phyos la bsgres pa bgrang phyos la bsgres pa na dpag yas so// dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o// dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na

185b5(phal chen): 'dug 'dug pa las/ 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya ba na/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa 'di snyed cig yod do zhes rab tu phye nas bgrangs brtsis te grangs su bcad do//
185b6(phal chen): des bye ma'i phung po de rtsis kyi brdar bstan pas shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun
185b7(phal chen): na'ang yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
186a1(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su'ang byang chub sems
186a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag bgrang zhing rtsi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du
186a3(phal chen): bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing
186a4(phal chen): rtsi'o/ / ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bstan du yod pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa bstan du yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas
186a5(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / chos kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang / sems can gyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / las kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa bstan
186a6(phal chen): du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs bcu na ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/
186a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ phyogs bcun ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji skad yod pa thams cad kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang rab sems dpa'i
186b1(phal chen): shes snang ba chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad
186b2(phal chen): grangs la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
186b3(phal chen): grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo la dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul spros pa 'am/ yul brjod pa 'am/ stobs bsngags pa 'am/
186b4(phal chen): bsam pa bstan pa 'am/ tshogs yongs su brjod pa'am/ smon lam bshad par bya ba 'am/ spyod pa yongs su bstan pa 'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa 'am/ yang dag par
186b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa 'am/ ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid/ grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa
186b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/
186b7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yosate/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur pa/ ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa'in
187a1(phal chen): tshe rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang bsam pas byung ba/ sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang sgyur ba/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
187a2(phal chen): bar dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/ thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rig pa rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams
187a3(phal chen): mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la dbang sgyur ba khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcog pa des/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi
187a4(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar kay+Ya phyog+sa suM bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo //
187a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / gang chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms mi shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes
187a6(phal chen): gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis dge ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od zer gyi drabs
187a7(phal chen): lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i ri dgas kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi
187b1(phal chen): chul 'thung bar 'dod pa/ bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad+mo dang ldan pa'i bad+mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis sems kyi me tog puN+Da ri ka kha bye ba/ rin po
187b2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i
187b3(phal chen): tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam
187b4(phal chen): mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i rnang shin tu che ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyis brgyan sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
187b5(phal chen): gdamra ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma med pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshog rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
187b6(phal chen): gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis mi non la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa gang na ba der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul
187b7(phal chen): du byung ba yongs su tshel tshol ba las de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge bsnyen ma
188a1(phal chen): phul du byung ba'i gnas gang na ba der song ste thal mo sbyar nas/ sgo khang na sdong sdong ba dang / des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i rabs yongs
188a2(phal chen): su bskor ba/ phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/ rin po che tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste
188a3(phal chen): kun tu bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba phyugs cung shin tu gzhon la/ thog ma dar la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog dam pa pri ya ba/ shin tu rgyan pa dang ldan pa/ sgra phye mar
188a4(phal chen): bzhag pa/ lus la rgyan med pa/ gos dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lus sam/ sems kyi dbang
188a5(phal chen): ngam/ gzi brjid dam/ kha dog gis zil gyis ma non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang med de/ lha 'am mi'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad
188a6(phal chen): kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo // gzhan yang khyim de na stan lha rdzas dang / mi'i rdzas las shin tu 'jadra
188a7(phal chen): ga byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang / mdun du phru ba gcig cig bzhag pa las/ kha zas dang skom gyi bka gam/ gos dang rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi
188b1(phal chen): bka gzhan ci'ang mi snang ngo / / bud med stong phrag bcu tsam zhig mdun na 'dug par mthong na'ang / de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa// lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan
188b2(phal chen): pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i
188b3(phal chen): bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha sta ka ste/ de'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang des ci bsgo ba bzhin byed cing mdun na 'khod do// rim gro byed do// bkur sti byed
188b4(phal chen): do/ gdong du lta'o// ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so// rje sar 'khod do// yongs su lta'o// rnam par lta'o// 'dud do// rab tu 'dud do// phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang bas ni/ grong khyer de'i/
188b5(phal chen): 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/ sems can gang gis dri de tshor bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems med pa'i sems dang / shar gnyer ba med pa'i sems dang / 'tshe
188b6(phal chen): pa med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / zhum pa dang gzeng mtho ba med pa'i sems dang / byam pa'i
188b7(phal chen): sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba med pa'i sem su 'gyur te/ gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang /
189a1(phal chen): dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar mthong nas
189a2(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du
189a3(phal chen): 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
189a4(phal chen): bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gad ma ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
189a5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i
189a6(phal chen): rgyun ces bya ba thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phru ba gcig pu 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du/ tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha zas sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis
189a7(phal chen): tshim par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba gcig pu 'di las ci la dka' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya'ang yongs su tshim par byed do// sems can stong dang / sems can brgya phrag stong dang / sems
189b1(phal chen): can bye ba dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du/
189b2(phal chen): med pa mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// yongs su stobs par byed do// yongs su dga' bar byed do// yongs su mgu bar byed do// yongs su spro bar byed do//
189b3(phal chen): shin tu tshim par byed do// yid bde bar byed do// 'on kyang phrub 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med do// 'grib pa med do// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// sa
189b4(phal chen): mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro/ / mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i
189b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
189b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas sems can mos pa sna tshogs can/ sangs rgyas zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang / ci la dga' ba'i kha zas
189b7(phal chen): tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// yongs su dga' bar byed do// nyams bde bar byed do// shin tu tshim par byed do// yid shin
190a1(phal chen): tu bde bar byed do/ / 'on kyang phrul pa 'di las god par 'gyur ba med do// 'grib pa med do// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// zad par mi 'gyur ro// sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thug par
190a2(phal chen): mi 'gyur ro/ / mur thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams
190a3(phal chen): cad 'ongs par gyur na'ang / de dag thams cad ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid bde bar bya ba'i bar du byed do// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du
190a4(phal chen): btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro dam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng bsna
190a5(phal chen): tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal chen
190a6(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi
190a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed gcig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
190b1(phal chen): kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/ / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag sdong dang
190b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
190b3(phal chen): stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong
190b4(phal chen): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
190b5(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
190b6(phal chen): kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/ / shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub
190b7(phal chen): kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs na ji skad cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
191a1(phal chen): khams gcig na sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / pho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs
191a2(phal chen): nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten
191a3(phal chen): gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang /
191a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
191a5(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
191a6(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thog
191a7(phal chen): paji skad gcig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / lo mo'i kha zas las gsol cig/ snying po byang chub la bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
191b1(phal chen): tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub
191b2(phal chen): kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
191b3(phal chen): ba de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pha par mdzad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
191b4(phal chen): 'tshang rgya'o/ / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag skyong dang
191b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgyadang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jog rten gyi khams byed
191b6(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
191b7(phal chen): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
192a1(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshegacig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag rnams/
192a2(phal chen): cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//
192a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bud med 'di dag la
192a4(phal chen): sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu lo mo dang skal ba mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i las rnam par dag pa
192a5(phal chen): gcig pa/ kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo tshad med par gyur pa/ skal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa
192a6(phal chen): skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs par/ skal ba mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/ skal ba mnyam
192a7(phal chen): ra chos kyi don ston pa/ skal ba mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad meng ba/ skal ba mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ skal ba mnyam
192b1(phal chen): par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par spyod pa/ thams cad la skal ba mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing / rnam par dag pas
192b2(phal chen): skal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa skal ba mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas mi skyo ba'i
192b3(phal chen): phyir/ skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas skal ba mnyam par lus kyi las rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi
192b4(phal chen): dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal ba mnyam par 'dong ba/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ sangs
192b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la
192b6(phal chen): skal ba mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa sha stag gcig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe gcig gis thog pa rnams la zhal zas yod/
192b7(phal chen): su dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo // phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing srid pang tha ma pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo //
193a1(phal chen): phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni bru ba 'di nyid
193a2(phal chen): nas lnga rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ / klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis// gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnam ni dri za'i khazas kyis// lha ma yin rnam ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas
193a3(phal chen): kyis/ nam mkha' lding rnams ni nam mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ mi 'am ci rnams ni mi 'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ mi rnams ni mi'i kha zas kyis/ mi ma yin pa rnams
193a4(phal chen): ni mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdong dang de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro// dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta
193a5(phal chen): ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung
193a6(phal chen): ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas
193a7(phal chen): stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so// yongs su bstabs
193b1(phal chen): ba byas so/ / yongs su dga' bar byas so// yongs su mgu bar byas so// yongs su spro bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// yid bde bar byas so// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du
193b2(phal chen): btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro dam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang /
193b3(phal chen): spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs
193b4(phal chen): dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas
193b5(phal chen): kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang mi ma yin pa'i
193b6(phal chen): kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// 'on kyang phru ba de las god par gyur pa med/ 'gribs pa med/ dmas pa med/ zad par gyur pa med/ sa mtshams
193b7(phal chen): su gyur pa med/ mthar thug pa med/ mur thug pa med do// de nas dge bstan ma phul du byung ba des/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lo mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i
194a1(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang
194a2(phal chen): ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bsags pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad
194a3(phal chen): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su srung bas bsod nams chen po'i khor yug dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed
194a4(phal chen): pas bsod nams chen po'i mdzod pa mngon sum du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re
194a5(phal chen): skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
194a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
194a7(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bu'i drung nas blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du song
194b1(phal chen): dade nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/ bsod nams kyi nam
194b2(phal chen): mkha' de la ni kun tu lta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/ bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yongs su 'bog/ bsod nams
194b3(phal chen): kyi mu stegs de la ni rab tu 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de na yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par lta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de la ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/
194b4(phal chen): bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yongs su sbyong ba byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bas bsgos pa'i sems kyi
194b5(phal chen): rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang
194b6(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rab lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod nams chog thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i
194b7(phal chen): spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring me 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
195a1(phal chen): dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i ma thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par
195a2(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
195a3(phal chen): spyod pas chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus/ lam gyi bzhi mdo
195a4(phal chen): zhig na rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i khri/ nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI la sna tshogs kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcags bod kyi dra bas
195a5(phal chen): legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal
195a6(phal chen): mtshan dang ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang rin po che'i me tog gi lnga lding mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing /
195a7(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa bai DUR+Ya las byas pa ni drung nas bsgreng zhing bzung / g.yag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab dang ba'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yab/ spos kyi rim
195b1(phal chen): gro yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs shing bsangs/ rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba lha rdzas kyi dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer
195b2(phal chen): 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon gyi
195b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa/ ngag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa yongs su grub pa lha dang
195b4(phal chen): mi'i gzugs las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag mkhas
195b5(phal chen): pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
195b6(phal chen): pa bdag ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par
195b7(phal chen): gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang
196a1(phal chen): dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing
196a2(phal chen): bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha' dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing mos pa
196a3(phal chen): yang dag par skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad khams gsum grong rdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par sems can thams cad kyi des
196a4(phal chen): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
196a5(phal chen): ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
196a6(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
196a7(phal chen): khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
196b1(phal chen): bskyed pa legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang
196b2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes nyen la rim gro bya bas sgyid lug pa med pa dang / dge
196b3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid mi bde ba mi skyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par
196b4(phal chen): mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir mi zlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la zhum pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang
196b5(phal chen): bsnyen bkur bya bas mi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong mod/ smras pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun
196b6(phal chen): kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas
196b7(phal chen): bsdud de gsos pa'o/ / 'di dag ni khos pos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni lo 'os
197a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o/ / 'di dag ni kho 'os de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las brjod
197a2(phal chen): pa'o/ / 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la
197a3(phal chen): bkod de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa ste/
197a4(phal chen): de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza
