197a5(phal chen): ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / blag pa 'dod pa rnams la blag pa dang / mu ra ba 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams
197a6(phal chen): la me tog dang / 'phrer ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / bye ma 'dod pa
197a7(phal chen): rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang / ser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams dngul dang /
197b1(phal chen): su tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tika dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams
197b2(phal chen): la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dag la ba 'dod pa rnams la dgal ba dang / glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba glang dang / bong bu
197b3(phal chen): dang / ma he dang / ra lug 'dod pa rnams la/ glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba glang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan 'dod pa rnams
197b4(phal chen): la rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / bran po dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la bran po dang bran mo dang / 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa
197b5(phal chen): rnams la bud med dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che dang / thor pag dang bcas pa'i
197b6(phal chen): gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che dang / skra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la sgra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
197b7(phal chen): sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la'ang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar
198a1(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ / de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pa des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la/ sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam
198a2(phal chen): gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul dang gnas tha dad pa dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'or gyi grong tha dad pa dang /
198a3(phal chen): khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mi mthun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang mi
198a4(phal chen): du bya ba tha dad pa nas/ sems can skye mched rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod
198a5(phal chen): ba dang / sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras chan dang //
198a6(phal chen): sran chan dang / 'khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la sogs pa lam gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na rnam
198a7(phal chen): par spyod pa dag las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang
198b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la spongs mo 'debs so// gdong du lta'o// sdod do// gsol ba
198b2(phal chen): 'debs so/ / de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang btung ba rnam
198b3(phal chen): pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ong bar gyur to// des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus
198b4(phal chen): pa'i slongs mo pa mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so// ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no//
198b5(phal chen): rab tu dga' bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so// nyams shin tu bde bar byas so// yid rab tu dga' bar byas so// de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas
198b6(phal chen): nas des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyud yongs su brjod de chos bstan to// 'phongs pa thams cad 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu
198b7(phal chen): yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen
199a1(phal chen): po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' pa bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang pos shin tu brgyan
199a2(phal chen): pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / nub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bla na med pa'i khabs yongs su shis pa 'thom
199a3(phal chen): pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'jom pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa bya ste chos bstan to//
199a4(phal chen): des kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang /
199a5(phal chen): spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa de
199a6(phal chen): dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dka' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed
199a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ / des ro'i mchog don du gnyer zhing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dang rab dang / skur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bas pa rnam pa tha dang
199b1(phal chen): pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de bzhon pa don du gnyer zhing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa
199b2(phal chen): rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bstud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des gos don du gnyer zhing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas
199b3(phal chen): 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel
199b4(phal chen): gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa kha dog sna tshogs can/ kha dog du mar rnam par dga'athon cing lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gis slongs mo pa de dag la yongasu bskrad nas/ de bzhin gshegs
199b5(phal chen): pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis
199b6(phal chen): ji ltar 'ongs pa'i spongs mo pa rnams la bstud pa byas nas ci rigs su chos bstan to/ / de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab
199b7(phal chen): pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas/ chongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zang na/ kho bos
200a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yo byad la dbang thob pa/ rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par byas
200a2(phal chen): shing / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ de bzhin du
200a3(phal chen): rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas kyis rol mo brdung
200a4(phal chen): ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng bdang
200a5(phal chen): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char dang /
200a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin
200a7(phal chen): pa dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs
200b1(phal chen): kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsugs bud ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems
200b2(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la
200b3(phal chen): tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su lta zhing /
200b4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rag lug par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems
200b5(phal chen): dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang tshig mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes
200b6(phal chen): gnyen las byung ba'i dad pa'i dbang po la bsam pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi btams te btang bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen cing bkur ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems kyis
200b7(phal chen): khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ khyim bdag mkhas
201a1(phal chen): pa'i drung nas song ngo / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par lta/
201a2(phal chen): bsod nams kyi ri bo do na yongs su spyod/ bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi gter de la ni shin tu lta/ bsod nam
201a3(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len// bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su skyed/ bsod nams kyi shugs de na rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / mthar gyis
201a4(phal chen): grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pud yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ tshong dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
201a5(phal chen): 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar
201a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/ 'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
201a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag legs par mi sbal tam/ de nas chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pud kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag nas bzung ste/ rang gi
201b1(phal chen): khyim gang na ba der khrid de/ khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces spras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ de bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser
201b2(phal chen): las byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho la dngul gyi ra bas bskor ba/ shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs par brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/ mu sa
201b3(phal chen): ra gal ba'i ka ba bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i
201b4(phal chen): bla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ asma gar ba las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas
201b5(phal chen): gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/ rgya che zhing yangs pa/ rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/ shin tu mtho ba/ sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/ des
201b6(phal chen): khyim de'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltas na rim khang tha ma'i nang na bza' ba dang btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba
201b7(phal chen): mthong ngo / / rim khang gsum pa'i nang na rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba bud med rin po ches
202a1(phal chen): chen po'i steng na bzang du bya ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / / rim khang lnga pa'i nang na sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par bgro ba'i dka' ba la mos pa
202a2(phal chen): 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa/ gzungs kyi tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang
202a3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa dang / ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo // rim khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par
202a4(phal chen): spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab shin tu zab pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / snying po mang pos sgo kun nas 'byung ba/ bsgribs pa
202a5(phal chen): med pa'i spyod yul can/ / mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ chos yang dag par bgro ba la rnam par 'phrul pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang rab tu gsal
202a6(phal chen): bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par 'gro ba byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'bod pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang
202a7(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi g.yo ba'i klong zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ra
202b1(phal chen): rdub dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'grob thams cad mos par byed cing rjes su 'brang
202b2(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang
202b3(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b4(phal chen): pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa med pa'i spobs
202b5(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la dmigs pas rim pas mi dmigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa/
202b6(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing / rgyan brjod du med pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to//
202b7(phal chen): rim khang bdun pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
203a1(phal chen): smin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / / rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' mnyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/
203a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bye ba/ de bzhin gshes
203a3(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gung du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
203a4(phal chen): du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / / rim khang dgu pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod
203a5(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / / rim khang bcu pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / smon las rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam
203a6(phal chen): par 'phrul pa'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul ba mdzad
203a7(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pung la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs
203b1(phal chen): pa mnga' na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de ji lta bu zhig tu sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ngo bos dran te 'das pa'i
203b2(phal chen): dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol gcig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs shes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od
203b3(phal chen): zer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
203b4(phal chen): sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la sogs pa nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang / ye shes
203b5(phal chen): nyi ma'i gzi brjid la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang thabs cag tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shing gi rab chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan rgyan
203b6(phal chen): gyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/ tshong dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems
203b7(phal chen): dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ri lu gcig cig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyis
204a1(phal chen): @bsangs so/ / spos kyi ri lu gcig sung de ltar bsregs pas/ zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi nathun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams
204a2(phal chen): cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su khebs par gyur to/ / spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dus gsum du dri ma med pa'i
204a3(phal chen): ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o/ / thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ sgrib pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba
204a4(phal chen): thams cad kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad med pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad du kho bos dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sIn
204a5(phal chen): par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo //
204a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang / kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum par zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phongs
204a7(phal chen): pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par
204b1(phal chen): 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so/ / rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zang na/
204b2(phal chen): kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang tha mi dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
204b3(phal chen): yang dag par 'dzin pa/ tha mi dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub
204b4(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad tha mi dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa/ dus gsum tha mi dad pas mnyam
204b5(phal chen): pa nyid la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha mi dad par yongs su gnas pas mi skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba tha mi dad pa'i yul gyis la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par
204b6(phal chen): nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul spu'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis
204b7(phal chen): de'i gan du song la ji lta byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
205a1(phal chen): chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug bud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug dra pa pan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba
205a2(phal chen): byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug dud kyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu lnga pa// de nas tshong dpon rgya
205a3(phal chen): bu nor bzangs sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i
205a4(phal chen): tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyi
205a5(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
205a6(phal chen): spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gyis thub pa med pa
205a7(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i rgyal mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ mthar
205b1(phal chen): gyis yul spa'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang / sgang dang / gshong dang /
205b2(phal chen): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sems dang / ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa med pa'i sems
205b3(phal chen): kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag ma brjed pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgos pa dang / sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pa'i dbang po
205b4(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mig dang rna ba g.yeng ba med par tshel tshel nas/ yul spa'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong dus kyi rdal stong phrag
205b5(phal chen): bcu'i gnas su gyur pa de shin tu bzang por grub pa/ rab brtan pas bskor ba/ shin tu mtho ba/ bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'ang
205b6(phal chen): spos 'tshong gi khyams shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal
205b7(phal chen): mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
206a1(phal chen): la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
206a2(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa
206a3(phal chen): dang / cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnon par byas pa dang / mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs pa'i sbyor ba
206a4(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / me las gyur pa dang / chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang / spangs pa dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so// nang de dag thams cad zhi bar bya
206a5(phal chen): ba'ang shes te/ 'di ltar sdum par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so// skyub par bya ba dang / bkru ba dang / brta ba dang / gtar ba dang / sna'i cho ga dang / nyar dang / dugs dang / lums
206a6(phal chen): dang / byug pa dang / dug gso ba dang / 'byung po'i gdon med par bya ba dang / bcung dang / khrus dang / gzhag pa dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog sbyang ba dang / nyam bstod pa'ang
206a7(phal chen): tu shes te/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams kyi dang thas cad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang / lus la byug pas
206b1(phal chen): byug pa byas nas ci tshul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag shin tu brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/ kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par
206b2(phal chen): bya ste/ nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum par byed do// de'i 'og tu'ang de dag la mi gtsang ba bstan cing 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// byams pa chen po yongs su bsngags
206b3(phal chen): shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ / chos rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam
206b4(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa dang nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yongs su brjod cing byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to//
206b5(phal chen): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du med pa yongs su bstan cing snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa yang dag par bsngags
206b6(phal chen): shing / yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing / theg pa chen po'i
206b7(phal chen): smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin tu rgyas par bshad cing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
207a1(phal chen): bzang po 'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags shing mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
207a2(phal chen): sku 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i
207a3(phal chen): rgyu yongs su ston to/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston to// brtson 'grus
207a4(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thub par dka' ba yongs su ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zil
207a5(phal chen): gyis mi non la/ bil gyis gnon pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa yongs su ston to// thabs mkhas
207a6(phal chen): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / bskal
207a7(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams du mngon
207b1(phal chen): bar 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta bu bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa
207b2(phal chen): yongs su ston to/ / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par ldog pa yongs su brjod cing / blta na phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// de ltar de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su
207b3(phal chen): bsdus te/ / nor dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do// yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba sbyor shes te/ 'di
207b4(phal chen): ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sin du ba ra la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi 'pham pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed la sogs pa dang
207b5(phal chen): spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang 'thun pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ka ru la sogs
207b6(phal chen): pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa spos sbyar ba thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// yang rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams
207b7(phal chen): cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
208a1(phal chen): pa dang / bsnyen dkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho za sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rgyun gyi
208a2(phal chen): sprin byin gyis rlob pa byed de/ 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas/ rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do//
208a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang //
208a4(phal chen): bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du med pa bton cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos
208a5(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan
208a6(phal chen): dang / spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi sar lung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi
208a7(phal chen): pra shra'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi sngags kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / rjes kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / sa kyi
208b1(phal chen): bla re'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi 'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab
208b2(phal chen): 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur pa'i spos kyi
208b3(phal chen): gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa/ blta na don yod pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/ rjes su dran na don yod pa/
208b4(phal chen): brtul zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/ ming thos na don yod pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams ngan song
208b5(phal chen): gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs phye ba thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po
208b6(phal chen): thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems
208b7(phal chen): can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang g.yang sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba
209a1(phal chen): tsam gyis sems can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re
209a2(phal chen): skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i kun du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
209a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
209a4(phal chen): 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i drung nas song ngo //
209a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang
209a6(phal chen): bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo zhes rang gi sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/ da ni bla na med pa yang dag par
209a7(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro snyam du rnam par sems shing sems dga' ba ni rab tu thob/ sems dang ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems rangs pa dang
209b1(phal chen): sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems kyi shugs dang / sems rnam par zhi ba dang / sems rgya chen po dang / sems rgyan dang / sems la thogs pa med pa dang / sems
209b2(phal chen): la sgrib pa med pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / sems yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems dbang sgyur ba dang / sems kyi chos khong du chud pa dang / sems kyis
209b3(phal chen): zhing rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'ang thob nas/ de mthar gyis ldongs nas ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang
209b4(phal chen): yul nas yul du tshol zhing grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po me gang na bzhugs shes dris na/ de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu 'di re
209b5(phal chen): rgyal po me ni rgyal po'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyal po'i 'phrin las mdzad do/ / khams rab tu skyong ngo // chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcod do// bya dgas bsdu
209b6(phal chen): pabar 'os pa ni bya dgas sdud do/ / g.yon yod pa'i rnams la ni gyod rmed do// rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal che ni yongs su gcod do// dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to// dregs pa rnams ni 'dul ba
209b7(phal chen): mdzad do/ / srog gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog go// ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do// gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par zhi bar mdzad do//
210a1(phal chen): sgrums san bya rnamapa / na la pa ya sa pa na yong pa so/ kAk+Sha A na nas sas /
210a2(phal chen): no// chags sems dang ni mi 'dre bar mdzad do// gnod sems dang ni rgyang bsring ngo // log par lta ba dang ni 'dre ba med par mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
210a3(phal chen): rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin na des mthong ba/ rgyal po me de rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa
210a4(phal chen): las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/ rin po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas shing chub par btags
210a5(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar gting ba/ gam yon
210a6(phal chen): nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag stong rnam par bres pas
210a7(phal chen): brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lda ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing / de ni gzhon zhing ngar la
210b1(phal chen): ba pa/ gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs pa/
210b2(phal chen): mig dkar nag 'byes shing ring la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/
210b3(phal chen): so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur bshas rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin
210b4(phal chen): tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar bdug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa
210b5(phal chen): snying la dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i ro stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang
210b6(phal chen): lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na
210b7(phal chen): 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas
211a1(phal chen): phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cong pan
211a2(phal chen): thogs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa'i dpral ba'i rgyan zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba las rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i se
211a3(phal chen): mo do'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas dri ma med pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i dpung rgyan dang / gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po
211a4(phal chen): rin po che bai DUR+Ya dri ma med pa'i yu ba can rin po che'i shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can/ nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can/ rin po che'i
211a5(phal chen): dril gyi 'phreng ba las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/ srid la gzhan gyi 'khor
211a6(phal chen): gyis gtse ba med pa/ dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ngo // de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa la brtson pa mthong
211a7(phal chen): ngo / / de'i mdun na chad pas gcod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma lta bu/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu 'jigs 'jigs lha'i gos gyon pa/ gtum zhing mi bzad la 'jigs pa chen po
211b1(phal chen): skyed pa/ mig dmar ba/ so gtsigs pa/ gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ral gri dang / sta re dang / lcags kyi chang mdung dang / mda' dang / ber ga dang / mdung la sogs pa'i
211b2(phal chen): mtshon cha dang lag cha thogs pa/ lus dang bzhin gyi dbyibs mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba/ sprin nag po ltar 'dug pa/ mi snyan cing brlang la sdang pa'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/ gzi blta ba
211b3(phal chen): dka' ba/ 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gam par byed pa de lta bu dag chad pas gcad par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo //
211b4(phal chen): de na srog chags rku ba/ gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/ sems can gyi longs spyod chud gson pa/ lam bsgugs shing 'phrog pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / lhas la mes gtong
211b5(phal chen): / grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs 'debs pa/ sdig sdig ltar byed pa/ dug ldud pa/ dkrugs ma byed pa/ thong mi byed pa/ byi ba byed pa/ log par zhugs pa/ gnod
211b6(phal chen): par sems pa/ 'dod chen che ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las mi bzad pa byed pa brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing / rgyal po me'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de dag la'ang
211b7(phal chen): rgyal po mes ci rigs par chad pas gcad bar gyur pa mthong ngo / / des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing / la la ni rkang lag bcad/ la la ni rna ba dang sna bcad/ la la ni mig phyung / la la ni yan lag dang /
212a1(phal chen): nying lag dang mgo bcad/ la la ni lus thams cad mes btang / la la ni ba tshwa'i chu khol mas lus la gtor cing / pags pa snyil ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i chang pa sna tshogs
212a2(phal chen): du ma mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ brlang ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba// srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong ngo // bsad pa'i sa de na'ang bsad pa'i rkang lag dang / rna mig dang / sna dang / mgo dang /
212a3(phal chen): yan lag dang / nying lag gi phung po ri tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo // khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad gsum tsam du gzabs su zab la chu zheng du dpag tshad du ma yod pa'ang mthong ngo // de na shi ba'i ker rus yan
212a4(phal chen): lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/ spyang ki dang / wa dang / khyi dang / bya rgod dang / khA dang / bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/ 'drad cing 'thog pa mthong ngo // de la yang la la ni
212a5(phal chen): kha dog gyur te sngon por gyur pa tsam/ / la la ni rnags pa tsam/ la la ni bam pa tsam/ la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur te/ shin tu spyi g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // bas dang
212a6(phal chen): de dag gsod pa'i tshe/ mi sdug cho dgur byas pas na 'jigs 'jigs skad dang / snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing / cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos nas/ spyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po skyed pa/
212a7(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhos pa'i sgra lta bu'ang thos so// des de ltar la btags te btungs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to//
212b1(phal chen): bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing 'bad de/
212b2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/ mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri 'dri na/ rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang med de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la spyod pa/
212b3(phal chen): yid kyi yongs su rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs pa/ sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa/ tshe phyi ma la lta ba med pa/ ngan song gi
212b4(phal chen): g.yangs sa'i gang kha na 'dug pa zhig na/ 'di las cig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ram snyam ste/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed de/ sems can thams cad yongs su
212b5(phal chen): bskyab pa la mngon par brtson pa/ snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa de la/ steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las lha mang pos bos pa// rigs kyi bu drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la dge
212b6(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam/ des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas nas dran no zhes brjod do// lha rnams kyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdas/
212b7(phal chen): ngag la de ltar the tsom ma skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi/ log pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas spyod pa'i
213a1(phal chen): ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
213a2(phal chen): sems can tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can gzengs bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
213a3(phal chen): sems can yongs su skyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can 'dzud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems
213a4(phal chen): can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / song rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dri shig ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis lha'i ngag mnyan te/ rgyal po me gang na ba der
213a5(phal chen): song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras
213a6(phal chen): so/ / 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan
213a7(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
213b1(phal chen): sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal poms rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/ seng ge'i khri las langs nas
213b2(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khring ngo // de mthar gyis rang gi gnas su phyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs btsun mo'i 'khor
213b3(phal chen): gyi nang du khrid de/ khri la bzhugs nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu nga'i khyim dang longs spyod la ltos shes nas/ des bltas na/ khyim de rgya che zhing yangs la rin po che bdun gyi rabs
213b4(phal chen): yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab
213b5(phal chen): pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad par rnam par phye zhing bres pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkye
213b6(phal chen): ba/ nang du seng ge'i khri mu sa ra gal ba las byas pa/ rin po che brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu
213b7(phal chen): bsgreng ba/ steng nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa'i
214a1(phal chen): bkam gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ a swa gar ba las byas pa'i rdzing chu bsol bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gis 'khor bar 'dug par mthong ngo // de'i 'khor/
214a2(phal chen): gyi bud med bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa/ bzang ba'i phul du bya ba dang ldan pa/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ sngon du ldang ba/ phyi nas nyalag byams pa'i sems dang
214a3(phal chen): ldan pa/ ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing ngag nyan pa bye ba phrag bcu'ang 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po mes/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems
214a4(phal chen): cig sdig pa byed pa rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ skyid pa chen
214a5(phal chen): bophun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ dbang phyug dang dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa de lta bu ni ma mchis so// des smras pa// rigs kyi bu nga ni byang
214a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang / phal cher srog gcod par byed pa/ ma byin par len pa/ 'dod pas log
214a7(phal chen): pabar g.yem pa/ brdzun du smra ba/ phra ma can/ tshig brlang por smra ba/ byung rgyal du brjod pa/ chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems can/ log par lta ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa/
214b1(phal chen): zhing gtum pa/ bab rgyal can mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las bzlog pa dang / dgag pa dang / bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar
214b2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / shin tu dul bar bya ba dang / phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ gso
214b3(phal chen): pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams bsad pa'i mir sprul pa rnams la gsod du gzud pa dang / chad pas gcod pa'i mi sprul pa rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod par sprul pa'i mi rnams la chad pa sna tshogs
214b4(phal chen): kyis gcod du gzud pa dang / rkang lag dang / sna dang / rna ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo bcad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams su tshor bar gyur pa lta bu dag kyang
214b5(phal chen): yongs su ston par byed de/ de mthong nas nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtong zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag
214b6(phal chen): sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams gtong zhing bag byed par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des nyes pa gtong zhing / 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / skyo ba'i yid dang
214b7(phal chen): ldan par shes nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par byas nas/ dga' zhing bde ba'i mthar phyin pa sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chang pa'i thams
215a1(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod pa byed kyi/ rigs kyi bung ni lus dang ngag gam/ yid kyis kyang sems can sa la'ang tsam 'dri ma tho ma 'tshal mo// rigs kyi bu ngan gyi ma
215a2(phal chen): mtha'i mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bgrangs shes pa ste/ byol song gi skye gnas glen pa'i khams su gtogs pa las kyang / chung ngu na rtswa'i rtse mos blta ba'i srog chags phre'u 'ga' la'ang /
215a3(phal chen): sems bskyed pa gcig tsam du'ang sdug bsngal bar bya bar mi dga' na/ zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig la ci smos/ rigs kyi bu nga ni rmi lam na'ang mi dge ba'i
215a4(phal chen): chos yongs su rgyu ba mi skyed na/ ched du bsams te lta smos re skan/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i
215a5(phal chen): mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/ srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par khong du chud pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten
215a6(phal chen): thams cad rnam par rig pa/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa/ thogs pa med pa'i sgo chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rjes su zhugs pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa'i dra ba rtogs par gyur pa/
215a7(phal chen): ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi byung ba/ glong kun tu 'khyal ba'i rgyud kyi gzungs la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul
215b1(phal chen): kyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi chud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po 'od chen po zhes bya ba
215b2(phal chen): 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
215b3(phal chen): bzangs kyis/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po me'i drung nas song
215b4(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ye shes sgyu ma de rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam
215b5(phal chen): pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang / las kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du
215b6(phal chen): chud par bya ba dang / / ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa de mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang
215b7(phal chen): spyod pa sprul pa'i chos nyid chags pa med pa de rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / dus gsum sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de'ang rnam par dbye ba byed cing / mthar gyis yul nas yul du dri ba dang / kun tu btsal
216a1(phal chen): ba dang / rjes su rnam par lta ba byed cing / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang / lam dang / sman ljongs dang / thang dang / thag thug dang / khal kol dang / ri dang / ri sul dang / grong dang /
216a2(phal chen): grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang / lus la nub pa med par tshol tshol te/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nyen kor
216a3(phal chen): du phyin nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs shes dris na/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di re 'di ni grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di na rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs so zhes
216a4(phal chen): nas/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde
216a5(phal chen): la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di na bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa lta ste/ de ring ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de las byang chub
216a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
216a7(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par
216b1(phal chen): spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa chen po mthar 'byung ba rnam par dag pa
216b2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bsam pa yid la byed cing / grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de la bltas na/ gser
216b3(phal chen): dang / dngul dang / bai nuR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / a sma gar ba dang / mu sa ra gal ba dang / rin po che 'di bdun gyis shin tu bzang zhing blta na mdzes pa/ rin po che'i
216b4(phal chen): 'obs zabs su zab pa chus gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi gram pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu dang / puN+Da r-i kas kun nas yog pa/ dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam
216b5(phal chen): dang / lu mas 'khor ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phreng ba'i rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyis kun
216b6(phal chen): nas yongs su bskor ba 'di lta ste/ seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis thub pa med pa'i ra ba dang / 'bug pa'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / thub par dka' ba'i ngang tshul gyi rdo
216b7(phal chen): rje'i rab dang / rdo rje brtan pa chags pa med pa'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i 'od zer dra ba'i snying po'i ra ba dang / rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi rgyan gyi rdo rje'i rabs yongs su bskor ba ste/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba de dag
217a1(phal chen): thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che grangs med pas yongs su spras pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lan kan dang / ba so mdzes par bkye ba/ dngul rin po che'i bso'i 'phreng ba
217a2(phal chen): mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i bso'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che shel gyi ba so'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i byi ru'i ba so'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ mu tig
217a3(phal chen): dmar po'i ba so'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ mu tig rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ba so'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa ste/ grong khyer chen po de'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi bar bar na'ang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod do/
217a4(phal chen): sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las sna tshogs mdzes par byas pa ste/ blta na yid du 'ong ba'o// grong khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la yan lag rnam pa brgyad du rnam par phye ba/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i sa la
217a5(phal chen): / chen po na na ba rgya zlas parba ba dang / 'i gro / rgyamachen po brgyaman gang bsas sems par 'ardzogs pa
217a6(phal chen): tshogs las byas pa dag go/ / rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa dag go// rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang / ba dan che phra dag dang ldan pa dag go// yo byad
217a7(phal chen): thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dag go/ / sems can khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag go// grong khyer chen po de'ang nor bu rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i khang pas mdzes par byas pa ste/ 'dzam
217b1(phal chen): bu chu klung gi gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / dngul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la
217b2(phal chen): mu tig dmar po'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / bai DUR+Ya'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun
217b3(phal chen): nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / shel gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po snying po yangs pa'i dra bas kun nas 'dra ba 'asam
217b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i nyi ma'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas ledra pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
217b5(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
217b6(phal chen): grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po skar ma'i 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas lengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyar gyis
217b7(phal chen): brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / rin po che rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis
218a1(phal chen): brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog man nga ra ba'i dra bas kun nas bebra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rin po che
218a2(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / spos kyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi byab ba'i rin po
218a3(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i lan kan du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che 'di la 'i 'phreng ba rin
218a4(phal chen): bdun gyis bskor bar dkrigs pa'o/ / rin po che'i lan kan de dag dang / rin po che'i ta la de dag thams cad du'ang phan tshun rin po che'i srad bus spel ba'o// rin po che'i srad bu de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi dril gyi 'phreng
218a5(phal chen): bas brgyan pa'o/ / gser gyi dril gyi 'phreng ba de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bres shing sbrel ba'o// rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi de dag thams cad las kyang
218a6(phal chen): rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sbyangs pa de dag ste/ de lta grong khyer chen po de thams cad ni/ nor nu rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs so// rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba grangs
218a7(phal chen): med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// lha dzes kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba
218b1(phal chen): grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ / rdo rje'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i gdugs kyi bla re grangs med pas kun nas
218b2(phal chen): khebs pa'o/ / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// gos rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// me tog gi 'phreng ba'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas
218b3(phal chen): khebs pa'o/ / rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sna tshogs btsugs shing bsgreng ba ste/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dbus su rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs pa'i pho brang brtsegs pa 'khor kun tu
218b4(phal chen): dpag tshad bzhi yod pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// rin po che'i dril bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan par 'grol ba'i dra ba rim
218b5(phal chen): bdun gyi sgra kun nas 'byung ngo / / rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyar brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o//
218b6(phal chen): rdzing rin po che sna tshogs du ma las byas pa gser gyi gram pa kun tu bkram pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu dang / me tog puN+Da ri
218b7(phal chen): kas chu'i steng kun tu yog pa/ rin po che'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i ga gus brtsigs pa'i them skas rnam par bkye ba/ tsan dan gyis
219a1(phal chen): shin tu mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya bran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin tu 'byung ba yod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang 'gran pa ste/ de'i dbus/
219a2(phal chen): na rin po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bzang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas gya nom par brgyan pa yod de/ de'i nang na rgyal
219a3(phal chen): po 'od chen po'i dam pa'i chos gces pa'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhugs so/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni chags pa'i sems med/ rin po che'i rab de dag la
219a4(phal chen): ni ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i yid med/ rin po che ta la'i 'phreng ba de dag la ni 'dod cing chags pa med/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba'i sgra la ni ro myong bar byed pa med/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang glu bro snyan pa'i
219a5(phal chen): dbyangs la ni chags pa'i sems med/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod ni yid la bya ba med par shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i skyes pa dang /
219a6(phal chen): bud med kyi tshogs kyi chos kyi dga' ba'i mos pas shin tu dga' zhing / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la dga' bas dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos nges par brtag pa
219a7(phal chen): la shin tu mos pas sems can gang dang phrad kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu 'dri zhing mthar gyis grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i drung zhig tu phyin nas kun tu bltas na/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus
219b1(phal chen): kyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas ha cang yang mi ring bzhig na/ rgyan chen po dang ldan pa'i khri rin po che bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i rkang pa bkye ba/ bai DUR+Ya dkar po'i seng ges blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lcag bod kyis dra ba
219b2(phal chen): legs par btags pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs bting ba/ rin po che'i 'bru grangs med pas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dra ba kun nas
219b3(phal chen): khebs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi snam bu la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gur shin tu sba bar bkye ba'i gnam yol bres pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i pad+mo'i snying po dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i
219b4(phal chen): chos kyi khri chen po la rgyal po 'od chen po mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs brgyad cu tham pas lus shin tu mdzes pa/ gser gyi ri bo ltar ring po che sna tshogs
219b5(phal chen): rnam par bkod pas rnam par mdzes pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar blta na bzang ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes
219b6(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho ltar zab pa'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po ltar chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa/ nam mkha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis
219b7(phal chen): brgyan pa/ ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po'i sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ rin po che'i gling ltar gzhi ye shes sna tshogs rin po ches yongs su gang ba de skyil mo krung du
220a1(phal chen): 'dug pa mthong ngo / / de'i mdun na'ang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul rin po che'i
220a2(phal chen): phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / zhim pa'i mchog khyad par du
220a3(phal chen): 'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang / dngar ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yul du bkod pa mthong ngo // lha rdzas kyi shing rta rin po che bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong du mngag
220a4(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyi phung po du ma dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi phung po spyad du rung zhing / kha na ma tho ba med pa mang po sems can rnams ci
220a5(phal chen): dga' bar spyod du gzud pa'i phyir bshams te bkod pa dang / ba bzhon gser gyi ru mig can stong phrag du ma 'o ma bres 'jal ba mang po'ang sems can 'phongs pa rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir bkod pa mthong
220a6(phal chen): ngongo/ / bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bzhin bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rgyan thams can gyis rnam par klubs pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying
220a7(phal chen): pos lus byug pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshul shes pa/ 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang / cho ga thams cad la mkhas pa dag kyang bsogs shing bkod par mthong ngo // de'i mdun na ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams
220b1(phal chen): yongs su bsdu ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su gzud ba dang / sems can rnams dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi yid dang bar bya ba dang / sems//
220b2(phal chen): can rnams kyi sems shin tu bde bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhin gyi don la yongasu dgod pa dang / sems can rnams thams cad
220b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du don mnyam par bya ba dang / sems can rnams gzhan la 'khu ba rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / lus dang ngag gis ngan du spyod pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i drug
220b4(phal chen): rngu yang dag par dbyung ba dang / sems can rnams kyi lam yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / sgo dang / khyams dag na'ang de bzhin te/ srang re re'i ngos
220b5(phal chen): g.yas g.yon nas kyang / stegs bu bye ba nyi shu nyi shu tsam la yo byad thams cad yongs su spungs te bkod pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po la
220b6(phal chen): lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag byas te/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa
220b7(phal chen): bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te
221a1(phal chen): 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
221a2(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal
221a3(phal chen): mtshan yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di'i'ang sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas
221a4(phal chen): stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yongs su
221a5(phal chen): dris so/ / yongs su zhus so// rnam par sbyangs so// yongs su sbyangs so// rnam par bkod do// rnam par bltas so// rnam par spyad do// rjes su btsal to// yongs su brtags so// rnam par bris so//
221a6(phal chen): rgya cher byas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di la gnas shing / chos dang 'thun par khams skyong zhing ston to// chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten la phan par byed
221a7(phal chen): do/ / chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten na rjes su spyod do// chos dang 'thun par sems can bcos par byed do// chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la nan tan byed do// chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can
221b1(phal chen): rnams yongs su 'dzud do/ / chos kyi tshul sems can rnams la nye bar sgrub bo// chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la yongs su bsgo ba byed do// chos kyi nan tan la sems can rnams yongs su sbyor ro//
221b2(phal chen): chos kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i dbang dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / phan pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems
221b3(phal chen): dang phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i sems dang / sems can yongs su 'dzin pa mi gtong ba'i sems dang / sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i smon lam rgyun mi gcod pa'i
221b4(phal chen): sems dang / bde ba'i mthar phyin pa la rab tu 'god par yang dag par spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// bag yangs kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pas/ sems can de dag gi lus kyang shin tu
221b5(phal chen): bde bar byed do/ / de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde ba la zhen pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rnam par zlog par byed do// de dag gi sems kyi rgyun kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa la yongs su gzhol bar byed do// nyon mongs pa'i
221b6(phal chen): dri ma thams cad las rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongs su sbyang ba byed do// 'khor ba'i rgyun las rnam par zlog par byed do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongs su gzung
221b7(phal chen): pa byed do/ / de dag gi srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir sems kyi ma rig pa yongs su sreg par byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi myu gu/
222a1(phal chen): yongs su skyed do// mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi rgya mtsho'ang rab tu dang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
222a2(phal chen): pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan la gnas te/ chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten skyong zhing ston to// rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ ngas 'jigs shing sdang ba'am/ bag tsha zhing skyi
222a3(phal chen): g.ya' ba med de/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang 'phongs shing yo byad sna tshogs kyis brel pa/ bza' ba 'dod pa'am/ btung ba 'dod pa'am/ gos 'dod pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad gang 'dod
222a4(phal chen): kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad nga'i drung du 'ong ngo // de dag la'ang ngas snga nas bsham pa'i mdzod sgo phye zhing ci 'dod pa khyer cig ces bstabs te/ gang gi don du khyed sdig pa'i las la spyod par gyur cing / srog gcod pa 'a/
222a5(phal chen): ma byin par len pa 'am/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'am/ rdzun du smra ba'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po 'am/ tshig bkyal pa 'am/ chags sems sam/ gnod sems sam/ log par lta ba 'am/ de ma yin pa'i lta ba'i
222a6(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de thams cad kyang grong khyer chen po 'ong bzang po 'di'i sgo dang / srang dang / khyams dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo kun tu spungs te/ snga nas byin pa yin gyis/ su
222a7(phal chen): ci 'dod pa kun kyang khyer cig ces bstabs shing byin no/ / rigs kyi bu grong khyer 'od bzang po 'di na sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'o//
222b1(phal chen): de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di'ang de dag la bsam pa rnam pa ji lta bur dag pa'i tshu bzhin du snang ste/ la la la ni dog par snang ngo // la la la ni yangs par snang ngo // la la la ni gni sa la gnas par snang ngo //
222b2(phal chen): la la la ni gzhi rin po che bai DUR+Ya las blangs par snang ngo // la la la ni sa'i rabs bskor bar snang ngo // la la la ni rin po che rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rabs bskor bar snang ngo // la la la ni gsas
222b3(phal chen): ma dang gyo mos gang zhing thag thug dang / grog po dang / g.yangs mang po can du snang ngo // la la la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs med pas gzhi brgyan cing yongs su bkram pa dang / lag mthil bzhin du gzhi mnyam par
222b4(phal chen): snang ngo / / la la la ni sa las byas par snang ngo // la la la ni rin po che grangs med pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bzhag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang stangs dang / ba gam dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang /
222b5(phal chen): zla gam rin po che seng ge'i dra bas brgyan par snang ngo // grong khyer gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i sems can sngon ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa/
222b6(phal chen): bsam pa dag pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rab tu gzhol ba de dag
222b7(phal chen): la'ang rin po che las byas par snang ngo / / de ma yin pa gzhan dag la ni sa las byas par snang ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can yul dang / phyogs dang / grong khyer dang /
223a1(phal chen): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na/ rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhin gyis dkrug te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par
223a2(phal chen): 'dod par gyur na'ang / de'i tshe de dag la phan par bya ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong zhes bya ba/ byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/
223a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / de nyid kyi mod la sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa de dag dang / mi bde ba de dag dang / shar gnyer ba de dag dang / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa de dag dang /
223a4(phal chen): sems kyi 'khrug pa de dag dang / 'tshe ba'i sems de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba de'i chos nyid thob pas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
223a5(phal chen): nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rnam par ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'od chen pos de'i
223a6(phal chen): tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par gnyag go/ / de ltar rgyal po 'od chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon
223a7(phal chen): du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i yul dang phyogs su bcas pa/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal
223b1(phal chen): po'i pho brang 'khor dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / de g.yos pa'i che rin po che'i ra ba de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / rin po che'i khyim dang / rin po che'i gnas dang
