223b2(phal chen): rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i ba gam dang / rin po che'i pu shu dang / rin po che'i skar khung dang / rin po che'i stegs bu dang / rin po che'i rta babs dang / rin po
223b3(phal chen): che'i zla ga ma dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i lan kan dang / rin po che'i 'bru dang / rin po che'i bla re dang / rin po che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i dril bu g.yer ba'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i
223b4(phal chen): dril bu dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i ta la de dag kyang rab tu g.yos te sgra 'byin to// rab tu 'khrol lo// de dag de ltar sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong la snyan pa dang / mnyan na
223b5(phal chen): dga' ba'i dbyangs brjod cing / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud de phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nang na sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang rangs pa'i sems
223b6(phal chen): kyis yongs su rgyas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bde logs su mngon du bltas te/ lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag 'tshal lo// de'i khams kyi grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang
223b7(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas/ rgyal po 'ong chen po gang na ba de logs su phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gi skye gnas su
224a1(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su ldan par gyur nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su lta zhing mngon
224a2(phal chen): par 'dud do/ / ri dang sgang mthon po'i sa'i phyogs thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der mngon par 'dud do// me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / lo ma'i shing dang / sa bon gyi tshogs
224a3(phal chen): dang 'byung po'i tshogs dang / me tog dang / ldum bu dang / rtswa dang / gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par 'dud par gyur to//
224a4(phal chen): de'i khams na mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / chu klung dang / rdzing dang / khron pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par gzhol
224a5(phal chen): zhing rlabs kyi sgra 'byin par gyur to/ / klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'ang a ka ru nag po'i bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'grigs pa'i spos kyi sprin las glog sna tshogs 'gyu ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing
224a6(phal chen): 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / spos chu'i char gyi rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// brgya byin dang / rab mtshe ma dang / rab dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po
224a7(phal chen): la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcus kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod do/ / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sprin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra phyung bas/ dbyangs snyan pa rgya cher
224b1(phal chen): bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo grangs med pa lha'i klu sbran pa len pa'i sprin gyi sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i matog
224b2(phal chen): kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 'phreng ba sna
224b3(phal chen): tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyar gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i lba ba
224b4(phal chen): lbub sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma med cing 'jam pa kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis
224b5(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin grangs med
224b6(phal chen): pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i lce shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po 'od chen po la mchod pa bya ba'i
224b7(phal chen): phyir byin gyis brlabs so/ / glang po'i dbang po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas
225a1(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs so/ / lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i se mo do grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i snam bu'i lnga ldi dang chun po grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang /
225a2(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i rgyud grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub dang / 'phreng ba grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan
225a3(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda ldi grangs med pa mngon par bres pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rgyal po kha dog sna tshogs phyogs thams cad du dri zhim pos
225a4(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'beb pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lnga rdzas
225a5(phal chen): kyi bdug spos kyi dud pan bun du 'khrigs pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char phra mo rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis
225a6(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed pa dang / glu snyan pa'i dbyangs yid du 'ong bar len cing / bstod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i char mngon par 'bebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyar par nam mkha'i
225a7(phal chen): dbyings byin gyis brlabs so/ / srin po'i dbang po brgya stong grangs med pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rten gyi sa'i gzhi la gnas pa/ kha zas su sha dang khrag 'thung zhing thal/ chu la spyod
225b1(phal chen): pa dang / ri dgas dang / phyugs dang / bya dang / ba glang dang / rta dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyi mdangs 'phrog pa zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/ rtag tu 'gro
225b2(phal chen): ba la 'tshe zhing mtho 'atsam pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang / byams pa dang phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing / bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing mtho 'tsham pa med pa la zhug te/
225b3(phal chen): 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med
225b4(phal chen): pa yang myong bar gyur to/ / gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / 'byung po'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams
225b5(phal chen): cad la mi 'tshe zhing mtho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dad cing phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus dang
225b6(phal chen): sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa'ang myong bar gyur to/ / de ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / 'thab
225b7(phal chen): mo dang / rtsod pa dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam par zhi bar gyur to// rnam par log par gyur to// 'gags par gyur to// phyir log par gyur to// gling bzhi
226a1(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
226a2(phal chen): bcu'i bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang / byang chub sems
226a3(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong gi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ / rnam par zhi bar gyur to// rnam par log par gyur to// 'gags par gyur to//
226a4(phal chen): phyir log par gyur to// de nas rgyal po 'od chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i ye
226a5(phal chen): shes snang ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde ba'i bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pas byams pa chen po'i gdugs tshad
226a6(phal chen): med pa dang ldan pa/ 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pas 'gro ba thams cad 'khor du gyur pa/ rab 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su gzung ba la
226a7(phal chen): zhugs pas byams pa'i sems lta bu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa lta bur gyur pa/ shes bya thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed
226b1(phal chen): pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mun pa thibs po rab tu sel bas sgron ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho'i gso sgyu'i rnyog pa
226b2(phal chen): dang bar byed pas nor bu rin po che chu 'dang dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang /
226b3(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa'i khang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang chen por gzhog pas/ rlung dmar chen po dang 'dra ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ bsod nams kyi ri bo gzhal
226b4(phal chen): ba'am/ yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' la blta ba 'am/ smon lam chen po'i rlung gyi dkyil 'khor las mtshams gcad pa 'am/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad
226b5(phal chen): gzung ba 'am/ theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'am/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po bsgoms pa'i sgo dbye ba
226b6(phal chen): kham snying rje chen po'i sprin yongs su smos par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/
226b7(phal chen): de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
227a1(phal chen): rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen
227a2(phal chen): po'i drung nas song ngo / / / bam po dgu bcu drug pa// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po nas byung ste/ yud tsam du lam
227a3(phal chen): gyi mgo btsal nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i gdams ngag de la rjes su bsam pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig
227a4(phal chen): rten gyi dbang po'i glong gi snang ba chen po de yongs su bsgom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par
227a5(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / bsod nams kyi dbang dang / stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag rjes su spel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya/
227a6(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de shin tu brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mong du gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems
227a7(phal chen): dpa'i gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de rjes su dran
227b1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su dag pa de la brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don bsam pa snang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la yid
227b2(phal chen): ches par byed byed pas/ sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang / sems kyi nyams bde ba dang / sems shin tu tshim pa dang / sems khong nas dga' ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems 'od dang
227b3(phal chen): ba dang / sems brtan pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / sems mi zad pa thob ste/ de de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas gdong mchi mas gang nas rjes su sems pa/
227b4(phal chen): kyi hud kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba 'di yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yong su dag pa dang yongs su rdzog par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o//
227b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad
227b6(phal chen): yongs su skyed pa'o/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrubs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam
227b7(phal chen): kyi tshul thams cad rab tu brjod pa'o/ / shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang dag par skyed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes
228a1(phal chen): gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g.yang sa thams cad nas skyob pa'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la gzhog pa'o//
228a2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang mi bde ba ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang
228a3(phal chen): nub sems dpa' kun tha bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'dems pa'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes parten
228a4(phal chen): rnams ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su byin par skyel ba'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni
228a5(phal chen): bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
228a6(phal chen): rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o/ / zhes de de ltar ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang
228a7(phal chen): dag par bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ sangs rgyas
228b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang shin tu bste/
228b2(phal chen): pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tsom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang
228b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song zhig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
228b4(phal chen): thos par 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bo gang na
228b5(phal chen): ba der song nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'grogs shing gzhon nur
228b6(phal chen): gyur pa ste/ rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' ba chen po dang mos shing spro bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge
228b7(phal chen): bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe/ des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa/ gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing
229a1(phal chen): gsal bar gyur nas/ 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la phog par gyur ma thag tu/ tshor ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang
229a2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge
229a3(phal chen): 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes so/ / de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar dper na thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin
229a4(phal chen): tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to/ / des dri zhim po zhig tshor na'ang de ni lha la'ang med/ lha'i bu mo la'ang med/ klu la'ang med/ klu'i bu mo la'ang med/ gnod sprin la'ang med/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la'ang med/
229a5(phal chen): dri za la'ang med/ dri za'i bu mo la'ang med/ lha ma yin la'ang med/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo la'ang med/ nam mkha' lding la'ang med/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo la'ang med/ mi'am ci la'ang med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la'ang/
229a6(phal chen): med// lto 'phye chen po la'ang med/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la'ang med/ mi la'ang med/ mi'i bu mo la'ang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to// bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa'ang phyogs
229a7(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / kha dog dang mdog de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang mdog ma gtogs
229b1(phal chen): par/ de'i kha dog dang mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong // lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de lta'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zhedang dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub
229b2(phal chen): sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs ma gtogs par/ de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs su mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / 'od kyi rgyan de lta
229b3(phal chen): bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par/ de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las
229b4(phal chen): 'od de'i kha'i ngad kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
229b5(phal chen): 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob
229b6(phal chen): pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par/ de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod du mnyam pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ba las 'ong / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
229b7(phal chen): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par/ de'i g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang mnyam pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta
230a1(phal chen): galas 'ong ste/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med do//
230a2(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag tu/ nyon mongs pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa chen po stong brgya
230a3(phal chen): phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi rgyu'o/ / de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'ang mthong ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o// dge bsnyen ma mi
230a4(phal chen): g.yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu'ang / shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do//
230a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng bsam gyis
230a6(phal chen): mi khyab pa dang / sa'i gzhi dang / grong khyer dang / rin po che chen po thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab sgrub pa
230a7(phal chen): mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tsher nas/ 'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong
230b1(phal chen): nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do// khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrungs te/ bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongs su
230b2(phal chen): bsgom mdzad cing / / brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na// ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro ba 'phags shing 'bar/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi
230b3(phal chen): g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa des mngon par bstod de 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
230b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/
230b5(phal chen): 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi
230b6(phal chen): g.yo bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam zhing yid du 'ong la nyams su bde bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
230b7(phal chen): bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes
231a1(phal chen): kyi snying po thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa'i sgo yi dam brtan pa la slob pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o// kho mo ni spobs pa'is
231a2(phal chen): shes snang ba/ chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o// kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub
231a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ yi dmal brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa
231a4(phal chen): nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i spobs pa snang ba'i sgo dang / chos yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis
231a5(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka' 'o// smras pa/ 'phags ma bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na yid lta ches par mchi grang / rtogs
231a6(phal chen): pa dang / 'tshal ba dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang / rig pa dang / dmigs su phebs pa dang / goms pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang / rnam par mi rtogs pa dang / sgro 'dogs
231a7(phal chen): pa ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid par yang mchis grang / de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das
231b1(phal chen): pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu gcig ma zhig tu gyur nas/ de'i tshe nub
231b2(phal chen): mo mi nya ba tsam zhig na/ rgyal po'i sgo'ang bcad/ pha dang ma'ang nyal/ skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyis log/ rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra'ang zhi/ lhan cig sprod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag
231b3(phal chen): kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/ kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing / nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi 'greng ba rnam par 'khod pa la lta lta ba las/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
231b4(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
231b5(phal chen): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par
231b6(phal chen): khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ba kru'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ des kho mo'i lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur/ yid shin tu dka' bar
231b7(phal chen): gyur te/ mal gyi steng nas langs nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag la rgya bachung ba de la phyag 'tshal te/ de'i spyi gtsug la bltas na'ang mtha'
232a1(phal chen): thug par ma rung / g.yas g.yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung / mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsams na'ang ngoms par ma rung ste/ de'i tshe kho mos 'di snyam du bsams
232a2(phal chen): so/ / las ji lta bu zhig byas na lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 'od kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung
232a3(phal chen): bar 'gyur/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang longs sbed phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/
232a4(phal chen): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs
232a5(phal chen): su rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba des/ kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas
232a6(phal chen): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir 'pham pa med pa'i sems
232a7(phal chen): skyed cig/ chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sems can bsam pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i glong du lhung bas mi bskul ba'i sems skyed cig/ sri
232b1(phal chen): pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas
232b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig/ de bzhin
232b3(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci smos kyi/ chung ngu na brdar byas pa tsam
232b4(phal chen): la'ang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste/ de ltar
232b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba las/ chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas/
232b6(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar
232b7(phal chen): dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
233a1(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par
233a2(phal chen): mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun su tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang
233a3(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa skyed de/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las
233a4(phal chen): kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran na/ gnyis kyi gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong khro ba'i sems cig ma bskyed na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can ma
233a5(phal chen): nyes pa gzhan lnga la ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bdag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na/ de ma yin pa'i ye byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mngon par
233a6(phal chen): chags lta ci smos/ shi 'pho dang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe'ang sems rmongs pa 'am/ 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na/ legs par bsams shing lta ci smos/ bskal
233a7(phal chen): pa de snyed cig tu sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rjes su mi dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du
233b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang / chung ngun ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge gcig kyang brjed par mi dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal
233b2(phal chen): mdzad nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang rlung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la tshig 'ga' yang ma bsams ma brtags par mi dran no//
233b3(phal chen): nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig gis chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la'ang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs
233b4(phal chen): pa de lta bu med do/ / de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang / ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las/ sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngu
233b5(phal chen): na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang yi ge 'ga' yang bor bar mi dran no/ / de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang / chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ sman
233b6(phal chen): lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do/ / de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
233b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i sprod pa 'ga' tsam yang / kho mos bdag gi spod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems can gang
234a1(phal chen): kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul ba de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no/ / de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid
234a2(phal chen): la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi dran no/ / rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig len yang / tshig dang yi ge 'ga'
234a3(phal chen): la'ang the tsom bskyed pa 'am/ gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du
234a4(phal chen): mi dran no/ / rigs kyi bu kho me ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes
234a5(phal chen): gnyen rnams dang ma bral lo/ / sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo//
234a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
234a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing / khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo// 'gro ba thams cad
234b1(phal chen): kye nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo/ / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad kyi
234b2(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo/ / sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dang ba dang ma bral lo// rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i
234b3(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi
234b4(phal chen): dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / cho 'phrul
234b5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma 'tshal lo// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub
234b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo den yod
234b7(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la sogs
235a1(phal chen): pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang / rnam par spyad pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so// de ltar dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba snyoms par/
235a2(phal chen): zhugs ma thag tu/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa drug tu g.yos pa dang / bai DUR+Ya yongs su dag pa'i
235a3(phal chen): chu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste/ la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs
235a4(phal chen): pa nas/ la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo // de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so
235a5(phal chen): nas 'od zer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab par mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho'ang mthong bar
235a6(phal chen): gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad rjod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to// de nas dge
235a7(phal chen): bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ thos sam/ shes sam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma mthong ngo // thos so//
235b1(phal chen): rig go// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ byang chub sems
235b2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par bka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar
235b3(phal chen): brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings
235b4(phal chen): la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/
235b5(phal chen): tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba/ mthu dang ldan pa'i nya pa ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i
235b6(phal chen): lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba/ lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po gdul ba bzlog
235b7(phal chen): pa'i phyir khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i dbyings
236a1(phal chen): la yang dag par 'phags pa/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba/ sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba
236a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir byams mi byams dang / mtho dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa/ rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
236a3(phal chen): pa dang / lta ba'i shing dang / shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i ye
236a4(phal chen): byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi sprod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga'
236a5(phal chen): 'dzin tshad med pa na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun tu rgyu thams cad du bgro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
236a6(phal chen): la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la
236a7(phal chen): lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du/
236b1(phal chen): byas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag
236b2(phal chen): par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang / rgya cher bstan pa de dag la thams cad gdon mi za bar yid ches shing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud par
236b3(phal chen): bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul du
236b4(phal chen): brgyus te rgyu zhing song song nas/ yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te/ nyi ma nub tu cha ba zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas/
236b5(phal chen): grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig tu phyin nas/ srang gi sgo nas srang gi sgo dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo nas lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / grong phrag nas grong phrag
236b6(phal chen): tu kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang / mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/ de'i rtse mo rtswa dang / gel ba
236b7(phal chen): dang / sman sna tshogs dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa/ 'od chen po dang ldan pa nyi ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa mthong ngo // des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te/ 'di snyam du bsams so//
237a1(phal chen): bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin tu mod pa gang na ba der phyin pa dang / ri shin
237a2(phal chen): tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas/ ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang / rgyang yang ring po zhig nas/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis
237a3(phal chen): shin tu 'bar ba zhig tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te 'chags na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung du phyin te/ rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
237a4(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
237a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems sa dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos
237a6(phal chen): na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na
237a7(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o// sgo thams
237b1(phal chen): cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol
237b2(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho'i sgo
237b3(phal chen): thams cad dang / sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang / skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang /
237b4(phal chen): dbyibs dang / chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ skye ba kun tu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste/ lha'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
237b5(phal chen): klu'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gnod sprin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du
237b6(phal chen): gtogs pa dang / mi 'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du
237b7(phal chen): gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang / nyan thos
238a1(phal chen): gyi theg pa la mos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang / sbyor ba sna
238a2(phal chen): tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzungs snang bas 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di
238a3(phal chen): lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyis don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
238a4(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo snang ba yongs su bskyed pas pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do/ / sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan zhing yongs
238a5(phal chen): su bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do/ / sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang sems can thams cad
238a6(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ ngan du
238a7(phal chen): spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang 'thun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do/ / sems can la la
238b1(phal chen): la ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba chen po bskyen cing don byeda'o//
238b2(phal chen): sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang skul mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang
238b3(phal chen): bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do/ / sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi zlogs shing lhun gyis grub pa dang rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang
238b4(phal chen): ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ chus zil gyis gnon la phas zil gyis mi
238b5(phal chen): non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa
238b6(phal chen): 'di'i bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang / khyim thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i rdul thams cad dang /
238b7(phal chen): grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / spor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji
239a1(phal chen): lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gis de sus bstan pa
239a2(phal chen): dang / de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te/ gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na zhags pa 'thub pa lta ba rnam pa sna tshe gal
239a3(phal chen): mngon par zhen pa dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du'ang / sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang mthun par gnas te/
239a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di na sems can gyi don byed cing 'dug pa de bzhin du/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal
239a5(phal chen): po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na'ang sems can gyi don byed do/ / 'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang
239a6(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems
239a7(phal chen): can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang / sems can yongs su rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang
239b1(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang
239b2(phal chen): sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang thabs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / phrad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang /
239b3(phal chen): bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do// gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do//
239b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan
239b5(phal chen): pa/ bdag dang sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus
239b6(phal chen): la rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / tsher skye ba rab tu ston pa bskal
239b7(phal chen): pa thams cad du gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par bye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed kyang gos pa
240a1(phal chen): med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen po
240a2(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu
240a3(phal chen): lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spod ut+pal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
240a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
240a5(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de
240a6(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la mi lta/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang / yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta/ sems can
240a7(phal chen): gyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ g.yog 'khor dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyad pa thams cad la mi
240b1(phal chen): lha ste/ rgyal srin dang dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
240b2(phal chen): bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su dag par bya ba la lta ba/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / rim gror bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin med
240b3(phal chen): pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad la lta ba/ yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi don du nan tan bya ba las nyams pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i/
240b4(phal chen): yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po
240b5(phal chen): la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par bya ba la lta ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad
240b6(phal chen): gzud pa la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung bas/
240b7(phal chen): mi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las
241a1(phal chen): byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing / mthar gyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas
241a2(phal chen): spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pal yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ / mthong nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pal gang na ba der phyin te/ drung du song nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon
241a3(phal chen): longs spyod ut+pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon
241a4(phal chen): longs spyod ut+pa la'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon
241a5(phal chen): gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes
241a6(phal chen): kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
241a7(phal chen): 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtan par yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
241b1(phal chen): gtong bar yang dga'/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub sems
241b2(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma
241b3(phal chen): 'tshal to/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legasaso legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos
241b4(phal chen): thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams
241b5(phal chen): cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i spos kyang shes so// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
241b6(phal chen): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so// nad gso ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba bsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi
241b7(phal chen): dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa bzhi par bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed/
242a1(phal chen): pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad yongs su sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la
242a2(phal chen): bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang
242a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/ kho bos spos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongs
242a4(phal chen): su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su sdang ba dang / rab tu sbar ba dang / yongs su sprad pa dang / yul dang / mthu dang / las dang / rgyu'ang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu mi'i
242a5(phal chen): 'jig rten na spos glang po'i snying po'i zhes bya ba klu yongs su 'khrug par byed po yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gyis kyang yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba shin tu sdug pas
242a6(phal chen): kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo// de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gos bab par gyur pa de dag
242a7(phal chen): thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro// khang pa dang / gzhal med dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams
242b1(phal chen): 668/ ma tog ga ser gyi kha dog la bus rnam par brtan par gnas so// sems can khyis kyi nang na gnas par gang gis/ thos kyi sbyin gyi chab de la rlung gis mngan pam dra chad par gyur pa de
242b2(phal chen): thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus
242b3(phal chen): la'ang khams 'khrugs pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med de/ sems kyi sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba'ang mi 'byung ngo // 'dis
242b4(phal chen): pa 'am/ sdang ba 'am/ bag tsha ba 'am/ yid 'khrug pa 'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su
242b5(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
242b6(phal chen): 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ri ma la ya las byung ba'i tsan dan sa stengs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na/ me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshig pa med do//
242b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des rnga'am rung la bskus na de'i sgras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
243a1(phal chen): mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ka ru nag pa pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang
243a2(phal chen): bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing sdom pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i
243a3(phal chen): spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tsher na sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces
243a4(phal chen): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ / rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i longs
243a5(phal chen): spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas so// rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzang
243a6(phal chen): po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdags ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lnga'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i
243a7(phal chen): gnas na spos kyi rnam par dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo // de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i
243b1(phal chen): rgyal po rab mtshems chos kyi gtam bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa sa 'du bar zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' che gcig gis thog
243b2(phal chen): pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam
243b3(phal chen): pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu ba bo/ / rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal
243b4(phal chen): po rab 'phral dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub
243b5(phal chen): sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/
243b6(phal chen): ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/
243b7(phal chen): thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang yul du ldan pa/ kun gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan
244a1(phal chen): brjod pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa 'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang /
244a2(phal chen): ngag dang / yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i
244a3(phal chen): drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/
244a4(phal chen): spos 'tshong gi tsheng dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas
244a5(phal chen): yang dang yang bltas te/ spos 'tsheng gi tshong dpon longs spong ut+pa la'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug
244a6(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / lam mi bde ba dang / lam dog pa dang / lam
244a7(phal chen): bgegs med pa dang / lam 'khrug pa dang / lam 'khrug pa med pa la rnam par spyad de bltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni byang chub
244b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ / pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad byam
244b2(phal chen): sdang dang mtho dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar
244b3(phal chen): bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma bsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa la gzhol bar bya ba
244b4(phal chen): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// dge ba'i
244b5(phal chen): bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas/ mnyan
244b6(phal chen): pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa' bo de tsheng pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs
244b7(phal chen): nyan par 'dod pa sha stag gcig gis kun nas bskor cing rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
245a1(phal chen): mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
245a2(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/
245a3(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang
245a4(phal chen): rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la
245a5(phal chen): bka' stsal du gsol/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye shes chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'i
245a6(phal chen): dra ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer med pa'i theg pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang
245a7(phal chen): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye
245b1(phal chen): shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyad pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag
245b2(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i
245b3(phal chen): rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang sgo thams cad kyi phyi mo'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag/
245b4(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su
245b5(phal chen): sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can 'phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'jig
245b6(phal chen): rten gyi zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ / chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o// de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya'o// ye shes kyi
245b7(phal chen): tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o// byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o// snying rje chen
246a1(phal chen): po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o/ / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu bstan par bya'o// sems
246a2(phal chen): can rgya mtsho bsdub la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o/ / yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o// 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'o ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad
246a3(phal chen): kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la'ang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang yid la byed pa la brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong
246a4(phal chen): khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so// rin po che'i 'byung gnas
246a5(phal chen): thams cad dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sprin gyi gnas
246a6(phal chen): thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad dang / 'byung
246a7(phal chen): po'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya ba'ang rab tu shes te/ glong yod pa thams cad dang / glong thams cad bkol ba dang / dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang / chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang
246b1(phal chen): rab tu shes so/ / nyi zla dang gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang gcig kyang rab tu shes so// phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums
246b2(phal chen): dang bde mi bde dang / gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung brdo ba dang / rlung bskyed pa dang / gru bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang / gru brtod pa dang / gru
246b3(phal chen): gtang ba'ang rab tu shes so/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor mi
246b4(phal chen): 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis tshig ste phun
246b5(phal chen): sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang / rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa 'am/ nye zhor gyur ma myong ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa
246b6(phal chen): dang / sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mchen
246b7(phal chen): 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ / sred pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// sems
247a1(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir
247a2(phal chen): yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/ / zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro// phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi
247a3(phal chen): ldog par 'gyur ro/ / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba'i
247a4(phal chen): bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin dubang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / rjes
247a5(phal chen): su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med
247a6(phal chen): pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsku
247a7(phal chen): paba'i dngos pos yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa/ sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrub pa
247b1(phal chen): dus rgya mtsho thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro brgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbris las mi 'das
247b2(phal chen): ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dga' ba'i 'greng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa
247b3(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon
247b4(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/
247b5(phal chen): gdong mchi mas bkang ste ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo // // bam po dgu bcu bdun pa/
247b6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa
247b7(phal chen): rgyud can/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shin tu bsags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang / mun pa dang / dri ma dang / 'dam thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam
248a1(phal chen): pa nyid khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad
248a2(phal chen): kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byang ba/ rgya chen po'i bde ba thob pa/ shes rab
248a3(phal chen): kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus par bsal ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i
248a4(phal chen): ye shes kyi tshul dang mthun pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon
248a5(phal chen): du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de grong khyer dga' ba'i 'breng ba gang na ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshel ba las/ grong khyer dga'
248a6(phal chen): ba'i 'phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab gcig na/ shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na/ khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis bskor te/ grong
248a7(phal chen): khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa
248b1(phal chen): thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhig pa dang / srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang /
248b2(phal chen): the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang / g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang ba dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyangs pa dang / sems
248b3(phal chen): kyi mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa skyed pa dang / byang chub sems
248b4(phal chen): dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang
248b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par bstan cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/
248b6(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad
248b7(phal chen): nas/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas/ chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'phags pa
249a1(phal chen): bdag ni nor bzangs nor bzangs shes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par
249a2(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba
249a3(phal chen): las mi 'phang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzungs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi
249a4(phal chen): tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo
249a5(phal chen): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
249a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ / de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di
