249a7(phal chen): skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la
249b1(phal chen): gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyong ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
249b2(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i
249b3(phal chen): lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'phral dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud
249b4(phal chen): kyi gnas thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod
249b5(phal chen): sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /
249b6(phal chen): grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang
249b7(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi 'am ci
250a1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten
250a2(phal chen): thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can
250a3(phal chen): gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to/ / chos ma yin pa ni zlog go// rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa ni rnam par zlog go// 'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do// g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par zlog
250a4(phal chen): go/ gshegs 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do// mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to// bcing ba thams cad ni yongs su gcod do// brtson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo// 'jigs pa ni rnam
250a5(phal chen): par zlog go/ / mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do// srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par zlog go// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du
250a6(phal chen): smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig bkyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba las ni sems can rnam par zlog go// mi bya ba thams cad ni byed
250a7(phal chen): du mi 'jug go/ / dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug go// sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu 'dzud de/ 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su
250b1(phal chen): smin par bya ba dang / zhags pa 'thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs
250b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to// rnam par 'god do// rab tu gsal bar byed do// brjod do// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i
250b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cad zil gyis mnan te chos ston to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig
250b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i
250b5(phal chen): chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can dmyal ba'ang ston to// sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems
250b6(phal chen): can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to/ / byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to// byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye
250b7(phal chen): gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to/ / gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig ce/
251a1(phal chen): yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to//
251a2(phal chen): mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to//
251a3(phal chen): 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten na nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'ang ston te/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par
251a4(phal chen): bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag
251a5(phal chen): par bstan pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu ba'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang ldog pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams
251a6(phal chen): cad kyi gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
251a7(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
251b1(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa/ zhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ kun tu
251b2(phal chen): lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob pa/ tshig gi lam dang sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab tu thob pa
251b3(phal chen): c hos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par bya ba la ma 'dres
251b4(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems
251b5(phal chen): dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du
251b6(phal chen): rjes su 'brangs pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song
251b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na/ grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song
252a1(phal chen): la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zangs
252a2(phal chen): kyis/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chong
252a3(phal chen): dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo / / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge
252a4(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang nas gang du song ba de dang der rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang
252a5(phal chen): lam gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo / / skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'di re/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling ka'i
252a6(phal chen): nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na sems can tshad med pa'i don du chos ston cing 'dug go zhes bstan to/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
252a7(phal chen): nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te bltas na/ bza' shing gi ra ba de na shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ 'od sna tshogs
252b1(phal chen): kyi kha dog can/ 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yong su lage dra ba zhes bya gdug kyi rnam pa dang / dbyis su 'dug pa'i 'dab mas
252b2(phal chen): kun nas khebs pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang / me tog gi shing me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs
252b3(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sum cu rtsa sum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang /
252b4(phal chen): thog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu shing thog phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam
252b5(phal chen): par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun
252b6(phal chen): sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phya
252b7(phal chen): bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang / rol mo'i shing dga' bskyed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang / spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba
253a1(phal chen): phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par/ rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong / mtshe 'u dang / lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu
253a2(phal chen): rin po che bdun gyi pa gus mtha' brtsigs pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba/
253a3(phal chen): bzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bain+dan sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'jam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi bye ma bdal ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu rtsa rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba/ na pa che'i
253a4(phal chen): dang / ut+pal dang / ku mo dang / me tog puN+Da ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas kun nas yog pa/ bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa sgra nyan pa
253a5(phal chen): 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng
253a6(phal chen): ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas rgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'brel bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang bdug spos
253a7(phal chen): kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par spangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dang 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa
253b1(phal chen): rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha rdzas rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri
253b2(phal chen): rin po che'i pad+mo snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo / / la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi
253b3(phal chen): pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / / la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par
253b4(phal chen): snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / / la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i
253b5(phal chen): rdo rje'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / / la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin
253b6(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / / bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i gling gis
253b7(phal chen): yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / / bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i dam pas sbas te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam yang gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe mtho dman med pa/ rdo rje rin po
254a1(phal chen): che'i mchog gi pad+mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/ ngang dur dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / ko ki la dang / 'ji ban 'dzi
254a2(phal chen): ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi
254a3(phal chen): pad+mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun du 'bab pa/ 'dres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs ma rgyan par bkod pa
254a4(phal chen): nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag pas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna
254a5(phal chen): tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba dang lda ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas kun
254a6(phal chen): nas dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul
254a7(phal chen): shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis klu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang
254b1(phal chen): mdog sna tshog su ldan pas bltan gtang mi bra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar bltan bzang ba/ rin po che
254b2(phal chen): sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa/ dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten lhar shin tu mdzes pa'i
254b3(phal chen): de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du bong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza'
254b4(phal chen): shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas
254b5(phal chen): su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong ngo // de nas tshongab dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis de ltar yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
254b6(phal chen): tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror byas
254b7(phal chen): pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams
255a1(phal chen): dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i stobs dang shugs dkyis byung ba/
255a2(phal chen): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/ byis pa so/
255a3(phal chen): so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la'ang / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi ba
255a4(phal chen): dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ shin tu dben pa/ dbang po thul ba/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas shing gsal la rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu
255a5(phal chen): ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/ pad+mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang skyi g.ya' ba med pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang
255a6(phal chen): po chen po ltar mi bskul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi
255a7(phal chen): bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po bltan bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ chu'i lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na don yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang
255b1(phal chen): sems kyi bag yangs pa bde ba skyed pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang pa dang bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chub dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog
255b2(phal chen): pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa/ zhing gshin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs
255b3(phal chen): 'khor par mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
255b4(phal chen): pas chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs
255b5(phal chen): pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'kho
255b6(phal chen): stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo byang chub sems
255b7(phal chen): dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i
256a1(phal chen): bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo chos thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang
256a2(phal chen): dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /
256a3(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi glong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la sogs pa lha'i
256a4(phal chen): bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal
256a5(phal chen): popo brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes
256a6(phal chen): bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs
256a7(phal chen): ldan dang / ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
256b1(phal chen): 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po nga la bso bo la sogs pa gnod sprin gyi dbang po gnod sprin gyi bu mo dang gnod
256b2(phal chen): sprin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mtheg
256b3(phal chen): ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po la sogs pa dri za mang po dri za'i bu mo dang dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos
256b4(phal chen): kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yid kyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang lha ma yin gyi
256b5(phal chen): byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
256b6(phal chen): mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang nam mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang
256b7(phal chen): bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi
257a1(phal chen): 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po mi'am ci'i bu mo dang mi 'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
257a2(phal chen): bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i
257a3(phal chen): bu mo dang lto 'phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
257a4(phal chen): mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba
257a5(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog sdong po'i rgyal po la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po srin po'i bu mo dang srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang
257a6(phal chen): bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi
257a7(phal chen): theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la
257b1(phal chen): la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par
257b2(phal chen): bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes sna ba'i sgo kun tu sgo zhes
257b3(phal chen): bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
257b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing /
257b5(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa
257b6(phal chen): gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyid pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni
257b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang
258a1(phal chen): dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
258a2(phal chen): pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams
258a3(phal chen): 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems
258a4(phal chen): dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sa kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la
258a5(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par bye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par
258a6(phal chen): bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis bsku
258a7(phal chen): bzhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
258b1(phal chen): sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lab na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
258b2(phal chen): pas chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / / de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can
258b3(phal chen): gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/ snod du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gi rab der 'ongs shing 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam patha
258b4(phal chen): dad pa/ / mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa/ dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ci nas kyang thams cad bla na
258b5(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rje bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyid pa de kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang /
258b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa la sogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams
258b7(phal chen): cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la
259a1(phal chen): sogs pa dang / sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snying po la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non
259a2(phal chen): pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong de//
259a3(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang / sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la shin tu bkod pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i
259a4(phal chen): bar du byas pa sha stag go/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / nags tshal phun
259a5(phal chen): sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
259a6(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul
259a7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas/ chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brlan la de'i yid la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs
259b1(phal chen): par byas kyis/ da ni g.yas phyog su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa bza' shing gi ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
259b2(phal chen): bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas skor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge
259b3(phal chen): rnam par bsgying pa 'dug pa mthong nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji
259b4(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab por bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes
259b5(phal chen): su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos nas 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du
259b6(phal chen): gsol/ / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags ma
259b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan
260a1(phal chen): sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no/ / smras pa/ 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tshe
260a2(phal chen): mo ni ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang yongs su sgrub pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs
260a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la'ang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
260a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i lus dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
260a5(phal chen): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i dbang po lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin
260a6(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang
260a7(phal chen): na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi
260b1(phal chen): sprini yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin
260b2(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprir yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o// dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i
260b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du/ yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs
260b4(phal chen): pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / chos kyi
260b5(phal chen): 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
260b6(phal chen): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa nas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
260b7(phal chen): bar de dag thams cad la'ang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o// sems can gang gis
261a1(phal chen): kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro//
261a2(phal chen): sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdam ngag dang rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems
261a3(phal chen): can thams cad la lta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed la rlom sems kyang mi byed do/ / 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho'ang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas
261a4(phal chen): rlom sems su byed pa med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
261a5(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang chos
261a6(phal chen): nyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ / rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par
261a7(phal chen): zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings
261b1(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dod pa/ lus la
261b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rdzu thams cad byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa spu'i nyag ma gcig gis sbams shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar
261b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas/
261b4(phal chen): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus
261b5(phal chen): re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug
261b6(phal chen): gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi
261b7(phal chen): bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ta/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar
262a1(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
262a2(phal chen): bzangs shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su lta/
262a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul
262a4(phal chen): de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar rton/ chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
262a5(phal chen): kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i
262a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub
262a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i las dang dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer
262b1(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der byin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la/ ye shes spyod yul
262b2(phal chen): gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul pa med cing / de ltar yid
262b3(phal chen): 'khrug pa med la/ de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing / de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang ldan te yin
262b4(phal chen): la brel pa med cing / bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho ltar dug cing / sems mi nyam mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod
262b5(phal chen): chags la dga' ba med de/ sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol yang mi srid do//
262b6(phal chen): 'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du
262b7(phal chen): bying yang mi srid do/ / 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo// gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi
263a1(phal chen): khyad par mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs
263a2(phal chen): su dri bar sems pa ni/ khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste legs so legs so// khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o// khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su
263a3(phal chen): bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o/ / khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o//
263a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'de re/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
263a5(phal chen): kyis tshig de thos nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin
263a6(phal chen): po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / me
263a7(phal chen): tog put+tA ri kas chu yongs su khebs pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i chu dri zhim pas gang ba/ rin po
263b1(phal chen): che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dkrigs
263b2(phal chen): shing ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam dang / seng ge'i shing thags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin
263b3(phal chen): po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dag ra bai DUR+Yas spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad
263b4(phal chen): nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/ a ka ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdugs pa/ spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis
263b5(phal chen): rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas kun nas bkab pa/ gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol
263b6(phal chen): ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan par 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgre
263b7(phal chen): bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po che byu ru'i sdong po dang / rdo rje dang / man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis
264a1(phal chen): shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de ni bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shing
264a2(phal chen): bzang la blta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/ sgra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam
264a3(phal chen): par grub pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/
264a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can/ rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo dang gtsug
264a5(phal chen): lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/ chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/ rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis
264a6(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub grangs med pas
264a7(phal chen): rab tu brgyan pas lus shin tu 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i 'phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che seng
264b1(phal chen): ge mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spad pa la skal ba mthun pa dang smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi byed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye
264b2(phal chen): shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag thams cad dang / rin po che'i gnas dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus
264b3(phal chen): las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim pa skyed pa/ sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
264b4(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med
264b5(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
264b6(phal chen): ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
264b7(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar
265a1(phal chen): byin pa zhes bya ba thong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar lo mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu 'a las kyang lhag pas pa dog gsol bas
265a2(phal chen): rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ / de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang //
265a3(phal chen): mi ma yin pa rnams la'ang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// sems can gang 'dod/
265a4(phal chen): chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na'ang / de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang
265a5(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang
265a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ / la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
265a7(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ / la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas
265b1(phal chen): kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ / la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
265b2(phal chen): 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ / la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'i rgyan
265b3(phal chen): ces bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ / la la ni glal ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'ang rab
265b4(phal chen): tu 'thob bo/ / la la ni mig btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo//
265b5(phal chen): la la ni pang du 'khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud cing mi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'ang rab tu
265b6(phal chen): thob bo/ / la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba'ang
265b7(phal chen): rab tu 'thob bo/ / de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa/ thams cad
266a1(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do/ / smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de
266a2(phal chen): khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ 'phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bsags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
266a3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas
266a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i sku don du/ rgyal po'i
266a5(phal chen): gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas yangs shing rgya che la/ rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su
266a6(phal chen): grub par gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung
266a7(phal chen): ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad med par rgya che bas khebs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe/ tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo cho 'phrul
266b1(phal chen): gyis yang dag par bskul nas khyim thabs dang lhan cig tu dong dong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dang ba rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos rin po che'i dril bu gcig pul
266b2(phal chen): lo/ / de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring na 'dug ste/ des kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par
266b3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems
266b4(phal chen): dpa' thabs dang ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod
266b5(phal chen): par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag nan khugs shes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
266b6(phal chen): rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
266b7(phal chen): du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen
267a1(phal chen): ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo // de nas
267a2(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim ga na ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
267a3(phal chen): mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
267a4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis
267a5(phal chen): thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol// des smras pa/
267a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang / sems can
267a7(phal chen): 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do//
267b1(phal chen): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten can dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgo 'byed pa
267b2(phal chen): ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems
267b3(phal chen): kyi skad cig skad cig tu mnyam par gzhog ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thob bo// smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/
267b4(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bsod skyabs la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
267b5(phal chen): pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang / log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang / rdzogs mdzad dang / grags mchog dang
267b6(phal chen): pad+mo'i bla la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du
267b7(phal chen): mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong
268a1(phal chen): yang mthong ngo / / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye brgya phrag stong dang / sangs
268a2(phal chen): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams thams dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrigs khrigs dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba
268a3(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo / / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo //
268a4(phal chen): de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po
268a5(phal chen): bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug go/ / thugs dang po bskyed pas thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go// smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par 'asgrub pa mngon par dag
268a6(phal chen): pa la'ang 'jug go/ / spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrub
268a7(phal chen): la'ang 'jug go/ / bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// mngon par rdzogs par
268b1(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la'ang 'jug go/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha
268b2(phal chen): da pa la'ang 'jug go/ / 'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi
268b3(phal chen): mthu phyung ba la/ 'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu rnam par
268b4(phal chen): gsal ba dang ma 'dres par dran te yang dag par 'dzin to/ / dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do// blos
268b5(phal chen): rtogs par byed do/ / shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig/
268b6(phal chen): gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
268b7(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin
269a1(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu gsal ba dang ma 'dres pa rjes su dran te yang dag par 'dzin to/ / dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu
269a2(phal chen): shes par byed do/ / blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi
269a3(phal chen): ma'i 'tha' rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
269a4(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i
269a5(phal chen): tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya ba dang /
269a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang / zhe non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams
269a7(phal chen): cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la ma zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par shes shing khong du chud par byed do// rnam
269b1(phal chen): par snang mdzad la sogs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems
269b2(phal chen): kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong zhing shes so/ / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
269b3(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du'ang mthong ste/ nam na de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe'ang de bzhin du mthong ste
269b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa mdzad pa dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang thos so// thos nas kyang 'dzin to// dran pas
269b5(phal chen): yongs su bcangs so/ / rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'o
269b6(phal chen): bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu shes
269b7(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gi rma shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spong pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
270a1(phal chen): khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang / sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spyod pa/ rang bzhin
270a2(phal chen): gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyis rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang mi 'gal bar rnam
270a3(phal chen): par spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes
270a4(phal chen): kyi yul can de dag gi spod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na ri gru 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
270a5(phal chen): gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig
270a6(phal chen): ces nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis smras so// song zhig nor bzang dpal gyi chu rgyal dpung zhig na// mkhas pa rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod// rin chen rgyus
270a7(phal chen): byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang / / bza' shing ra ba rdzing dang chu bran 'bab par ldan// ri mchog de la brtan pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam
270b1(phal chen): par spyod/ / de gan song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon po yi// yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis khyim
270b2(phal chen): bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ khyim
270b3(phal chen): bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo / / // bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams
270b4(phal chen): ngag rjes su sems shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul
270b5(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed/ rnas thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de
270b6(phal chen): dag gi ni rjes su 'brang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas
270b7(phal chen): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar
271a1(phal chen): gyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas ri bru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ nub
271a2(phal chen): phyogs logs kyi ri'i sman ljongs mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa/ be DUR+Ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i spang nags tshal chen po'i
271a3(phal chen): mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na/ rin po che rdo rje'i rdo stegs shig la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo stegs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med
271a4(phal chen): pas kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston
271a5(phal chen): cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas shing mi 'dzums pa'i mig gis thal mo sbar nas/ dge ba'i
271a6(phal chen): bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi 'khrugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i
271a7(phal chen): chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes
271b1(phal chen): gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dga' bar sems pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
271b2(phal chen): las ye shes snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
271b3(phal chen): ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i
271b4(phal chen): bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongs su skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang rna ba der phyin to//
271b5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas smras pa/ tshur shog/ dpe med pa'i
271b6(phal chen): theg pa chen po yangs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i
271b7(phal chen): bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs
272a1(phal chen): pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros can/ bltan kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang
272a2(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung bar mos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge bo'i
272a3(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du
272a4(phal chen): bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa// sangs
272a5(phal chen): rgyas mthong ba sa dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/ legs par spod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
272a6(phal chen): yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan yongs
272a7(phal chen): su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs
272b1(phal chen): pa legs so/ / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
272b2(phal chen): kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la sgri bas phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar
272b3(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
272b4(phal chen): bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang
272b5(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan
272b6(phal chen): ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/
272b7(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la
273a1(phal chen): gzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu nga ni
273a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la
273a3(phal chen): dbye ba med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba la zhugs pa/ / sgo kun nas thos shing rnam par rig par 'gyur pas/ sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
273a4(phal chen): de ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa'ang sta gon
273a5(phal chen): du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// ngag snyan pa dang / don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang sems can yongs su
273a6(phal chen): smin par byed do/ / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye bas kyang sems can rab tu sim par byed cing yongs su smin
273a7(phal chen): par byed do/ / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam
273b1(phal chen): pasna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bsags par bag mi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / rigs na/
273b2(phal chen): tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba 'thun pa'i gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdus shing yongs su smin par byed do//
273b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su spangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems
273b4(phal chen): can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems
273b5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yo byad kyis
273b6(phal chen): 'phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzla ba dang / sems can tham/
273b7(phal chen): cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /
274a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems
274a2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi skal ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jig pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang /
274a3(phal chen): 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems
274a4(phal chen): can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs
274a5(phal chen): pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlabs so/ / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi ming gi 'khor lo'ang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs
274a6(phal chen): par byaso/ / dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs bzhis
274a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byed do// rigs kyi
274b1(phal chen): blangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par
274b2(phal chen): dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/ dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la
274b3(phal chen): rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
274b4(phal chen): cad kyi glong yongs su 'khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yongs su 'phel ba'i
274b5(phal chen): rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan// de la 'di skad ces
274b6(phal chen): bya'o/ / g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas/ nor bzangs shin tu dul ba lho phyogs rgyud du song // spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam sprod pa// rin chen ri yi
274b7(phal chen): sul na gnas par des kyang mthong / / rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ro yi sman ljongs na// pad+mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brtan par 'dug/ b+ha dang lha min klu dang srin po mi 'om ci// rgyal
275a1(phal chen): pa'i sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston/ / mthong nas nor bzangs dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur// bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas// ci nas
275a2(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis 'thob 'gyur bar/ / 'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol// bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste// 'od sprin dra ba
275a3(phal chen): rgya chen bzang po rab rton pas/ / nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo
275a4(phal chen): shes/ / ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes sdug/ 'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung // kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu// 'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal
275a5(phal chen): kun las skyob/ / gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang // lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang // nga yi ming thos bcings shing bzir ba thar bar 'gyur// rgyal po dag la nyes
275a6(phal chen): pa'i g.yon byas gsad spangs pa/ / de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran 'gyur na// mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te// mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug rgal bar 'gyur// dbang
275a7(phal chen): po'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa/ / dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur// grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// nga yi ming dran de dag
275b1(phal chen): thub pa med par 'gyur/ / gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa// de dag rkun pos 'jigs dog dgras 'jigs nags phyin te// seng ge dom gzig gcan gzan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang /
275b2(phal chen): dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas na// sdang ba'i sems kyis ri chen ljongs su bor gyur tam// sol mdag lci me rab tu 'bar
275b3(phal chen): bar bor gyur kyang / / me rnams pad+mos gang ba'i chu yi ge ter du 'gyur// nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na// rgya mtsho'i chur bor de yi nang du 'chir mi 'gyur// chu bos mi khyer me yi
275b4(phal chen): dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur/ / don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// shing sgrog dbyig bcings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang // brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin brid cing
275b5(phal chen): bslas pa dang / / spros shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las// nga yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob// gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lha ji snyed dang // gang rnams rtag tu
275b6(phal chen): zhe sdang mi snyan rjod pa'i rnams/ / nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par rjod par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang skye// nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas na// gnod
275b7(phal chen): pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byad byed pa'i/ / dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur// ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so// la las gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na//
276a1(phal chen): klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang // grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang // mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong bdang
276a2(phal chen): zhi bar 'gyur/ / nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang // pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes mdza' ba kun dang yang // 'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min//
