276a3(phal chen): nor zad mi 'gyur ba phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro// nga yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na// 'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmya la mi 'gro ste// byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnas
276a4(phal chen): su min/ / sems can dag pa lha dang mi yi gnas su skye// nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na// dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te// 'theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra ba lta/
276a5(phal chen): sdug 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang po kun ldan 'gyur// la la gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na// sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten khams su
276a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur// 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis// 'gro ba sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang
276a7(phal chen): zad mi nus/ / sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgom te// yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba/
276b1(phal chen): shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams khong
276b2(phal chen): yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis por ma thag tu/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des
276b3(phal chen): nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
276b4(phal chen): gyi mgon po dang / me dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las pa kye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i
276b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu zhi'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'ang nyams su mi gnod par gyur to// mya ngan
276b6(phal chen): gyi zug rngu dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du'ang rin po che'i sprin gyi char phab ste/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa
276b7(phal chen): dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang
277a1(phal chen): na ba der song ngo / / de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas su snang ba ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ ri gru 'dzin
277a2(phal chen): de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du'ang phyin par snang ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
277a3(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi
277a4(phal chen): bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig
277a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan
277a6(phal chen): brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung naso song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems
277a7(phal chen): dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bltas pas kyang mngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa'
277b1(phal chen): gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas// mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis
277b2(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub
277b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
277b4(phal chen): 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi de
277b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba 'di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams
277b6(phal chen): de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/
277b7(phal chen): deni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa
278a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams
278a2(phal chen): kyis thos pa 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so// smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis/ dad pa dang mos par
278a3(phal chen): bgyi na 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi stsal tam/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang
278a4(phal chen): dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di
278a5(phal chen): thob bo/ / rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas ngasong nas ni/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'das te/
278a6(phal chen): sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bor ro// gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs
278a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na
278b1(phal chen): med pa yid kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongs su bskyed pas mchod pa byas so// 'jig rten gyi
278b2(phal chen): khams de dag na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'ang khong du chud do// de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'ang yongs su shes
278b3(phal chen): shing bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to/ / chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o// yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs
278b4(phal chen): pas kyang nye bar sdud do/ / rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro// shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa
278b5(phal chen): de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
278b6(phal chen): dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs
278b7(phal chen): kun tu mngon par gzhol ba/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du
279a1(phal chen): 'thun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba/ dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang
279a2(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba pa'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/
279a3(phal chen): gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par yang nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen
279a4(phal chen): po zhes bya ba'i lha 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi
279a5(phal chen): bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal to// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
279a6(phal chen): nas yang dang yang bstas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i
279a7(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can/ mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba/
279b1(phal chen): brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems pa'i yon tan
279b2(phal chen): gyi sa la ni nan tan du byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sa la ni rnam par spod/ gzungs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i sa la ni rjes
279b3(phal chen): su slob/ stobs kyi sa la ni yongs su sgrub cing mthar gyis grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po kun tu dris pa dang / de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu 'de re/ lha lha chen po
279b4(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mngon bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go/ de nas tsheng dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po'i
279b5(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar
279b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa
279b7(phal chen): mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol//
280a1(phal chen): lha lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te bdag gi gdong bkrus nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la
280a2(phal chen): gser gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu dka' ba ste/ thos par yang rab tu dka' bo// skyes bu mchog gi me tog put+ta ri ka ni 'jig
280a3(phal chen): rten gyi phul du bya ba yin pas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o// 'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o// sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o// lam rmongs pa rnams la lam
280a4(phal chen): bde ba ston pa'o/ / chos kyi tshul du gzud pa la mgon du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen por gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems
280a5(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing / lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams
280a6(phal chen): dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gnon par byed pa dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas lta ba dran pa 'dzem pa yin par bsams so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni
280a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob pa'o/ / smras pa/ 'gags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas lha lha
280b1(phal chen): bos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang / bai DUR+Ya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang / mu sa ra gal ba'i phung po dang / asma gar ba'i phung po dang /
280b2(phal chen): nor bu rin po che dang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi
280b3(phal chen): nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang / dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang / rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang / gdu bu'i phung po dang / ska rags kyi phung po dang / dang
280b4(phal chen): gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung
280b5(phal chen): po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang /
280b6(phal chen): gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya
280b7(phal chen): stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bsten nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig/ bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig/
281a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni mchod cig/ sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig/ 'jig
281a2(phal chen): rten ni sbyin pa la spobs shig/ gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba ni ston cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bstud pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i
281a3(phal chen): sems can chan med pa dag gis bsam pa'i rgyu kyang gtong bas yongs su slob byed do/ / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpapa dang / dge ba'i bshes sa/
281a4(phal chen): rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga' bas
281a5(phal chen): myong ba yul gyi longs spyod la yongs su chags pa rnams la yul de dag mi sdug par byin gyis rlob bo/ / khro bas non pa dang / nga rgyal can dang / rgyags shing dregs pa dang / rlom pa tshar
281a6(phal chen): gcad pas 'dul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug la 'jigs pa'i lus sha za khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan par bstan te/ rlom pa dang snyems pas 'khrugs pa de dag thams cad zhi bar
281a7(phal chen): byed do/ / le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams la ni me dang / chu dang / rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bstan cing skyo bar bya ste brtson 'grus
281b1(phal chen): com pa la 'god par byed de/ de ltar thabs de dang de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang mi mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
281b2(phal chen): sgrib pa'i ri'i g.yangs sa'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dge ba thams cad phun sum
281b3(phal chen): tshogs pa la yang dag par dgod par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu kho bo'i ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dbang po ltar nyon
281b4(phal chen): mongs pa'i lha ma yin rab tu 'jom pa/ chu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa/ me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i chu skems pa/ rlung ltar 'dzin
281b5(phal chen): pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba/ rdo rje ltar bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu snyil ba de dag gi spod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs
281b6(phal chen): kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub na sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
281b7(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
282a1(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du bltas te/ lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang
282a2(phal chen): chub tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma gang na ba der song ba dang / de 'gro ba'i tshe sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la gcig 'di skad ces 'dzer to// sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo //
282a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo // chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos
282a4(phal chen): kyi rgyal po'i go ba phang dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / / ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo
282a5(phal chen): zhes nas/ de'i modado la lha mo brtan ma la sogs pa sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/ babrug sgra zab mo lta bu'i rgya chen po grags par byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
282a6(phal chen): gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ lus rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan nas/ glog gi 'phreng ba'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag tu byas te/
282a7(phal chen): shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/ me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'bu bar byed/ chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 'bab par byed/ mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lum thams cad ni rgyas par byed/ spos chu'i char pa
282b1(phal chen): ni rab tu 'bab par byed/ me tog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu sgra sgrogs par byed/ lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang rgyan gyi tshogs mang po na
282b2(phal chen): rab tu 'khrol bar byed/ baglang dang / khyu mchog dang / glang po dang / stag dang / ri dgas kyi dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug
282b3(phal chen): sgra ba byin par byed/ ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/ gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong ni mngon 'byung bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas 'thon to// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan
282b4(phal chen): mas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so// sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa
282b5(phal chen): ba bskyed pa yin na/ de'i rnam par smin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam lta bar 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan
282b6(phal chen): ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma 'tshal lo// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan
282b7(phal chen): pas rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya
283a1(phal chen): stong 'di dag kyang khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ / khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// khyod kyis ci dgar spyad pa'o// khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o// khyod kyi bsod nams kyi
283a2(phal chen): stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o/ / 'di las long ste/ khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/
283a3(phal chen): de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing rtag tu srung ba la zhugs pa ste/ de tshun chad du rigs
283a4(phal chen): kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do/ / ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go// smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par
283a5(phal chen): dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do/ / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs so// byang chub sems
283a6(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang sgyur ba dang / zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnod pa dang / dus thams cad du mngon par
283a7(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang / chos snang ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i
283b1(phal chen): tshul dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed do// yang dag par 'dzin to//
283b2(phal chen): yang dag par nod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di 'ang bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha rol
283b3(phal chen): cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa' rnam
283b4(phal chen): par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su dpyod dpyod/ rnam par dpyod dpyod/ shin tu dpyod dpyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar byed de/ shin tu rgyas par byed byed pas// bskal
283b5(phal chen): pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo/ / de srid kyi bar gyis kho mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
283b6(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phral pa'ang mthong ste/ kho mo ni de bzhin
283b7(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o/ / rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na/
284a1(phal chen): kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
284a2(phal chen): 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang
284a3(phal chen): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur
284a4(phal chen): pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na mtshan mo'i
284a5(phal chen): lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshed
284a6(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ sa 'i
284a7(phal chen): lha mo brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo / / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub
284b1(phal chen): par dka' ba'i snying po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi chu la de'i rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems
284b2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba de la rnam par dpyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes
284b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yid ches par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu spang ba de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang /
284b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing / grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der byin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor
284b5(phal chen): nas shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus shig na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag 'thun par
284b6(phal chen): len pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig
284b7(phal chen): kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang / ye shes chen po snying por gyur pa'i 'du
285a1(phal chen): shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byam klas pas rgyas par
285a2(phal chen): 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mig gis phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba/ ye shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam pa rtse gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug
285a3(phal chen): 'dug pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/ rin po che'i seng ge'i
285a4(phal chen): khri chen po spos zhim po thams cad kyi pad+mo'i snying po can zhig la/ lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ sgra 'jam zhing mngal mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ gzugs bzang
285a5(phal chen): pashin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lus rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa/ tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis
285a6(phal chen): brgyan pa thogs pa/ lus la rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / skar chen dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug par mthong ngo // des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi
285a7(phal chen): khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba nas/ sems can ji snyed cig yongs su bkrol ba de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo // ji snyed cig mtho
285b1(phal chen): ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang / ji snyed cig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par
285b2(phal chen): mthong ngo / / lus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su
285b3(phal chen): chud par mthong ngo / / nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang / skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed cig gis yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sgo
285b4(phal chen): nas rjes su brjod pa thos so/ / dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems
285b5(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /
285b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings
285b7(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig gis des sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i ba smra'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo // des thabs sku/
286a1(phal chen): tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la
286a2(phal chen): lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te langs nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa lalan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du
286a3(phal chen): 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
286a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag tu bdag nyid bor ba lags na/ lha mo shul gang la brten na byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu'i sar
286a5(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces
286a6(phal chen): smras so/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis non te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa legs so
286a7(phal chen): legs so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pas/ gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho
286b1(phal chen): mo mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob paste/ bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa
286b2(phal chen): sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga'
286b3(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ / sems mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam par spang ba'i sems dang
286b4(phal chen): ldan pa'o/ / nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dbang po
286b5(phal chen): zhum pa rnams la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ / 'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// nyan
286b6(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan la/
286b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas/ sems can gang ji snyed cig mun nag smag tu gyur pa'i nam la
287a1(phal chen): mi ni nyal bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar gyur/ rkun chom mang pos ni rgyas par gyur/ sems can mi bsrun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su chu bar gyur/ sprin stug po nag pos ni kun nas
287a2(phal chen): khebs par gyur/ dud pa dang rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur/ rdzi char mi bzad pas ni rab tu btags par gyur/ zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/ mig gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i
287a3(phal chen): mun pa la/ sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la spyod dam/ thang la spyod dam/ ri la spyod dam/ nags tshal gzhan na spyod dam/ yul gzhan na spyod dam/ grong gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/
287a4(phal chen): phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod dam/ lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa'am/ thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa 'am/ ri la spyod spyod pa las g.yang
287a5(phal chen): sa chen por lhung bar gyur pa'am/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa 'am/ nags tshal thibs por spo'i zang zing la thogs pa 'am/ tshul ma yin pa'i nyam nyes
287a6(phal chen): shig tu gyur tam/ yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa 'am/ grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi bsrun pa'i tshul can gyis gtses pa 'am/ phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'brog rmis pa'am/
287a7(phal chen): phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa 'am/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nyi zhor gyur kyang rung // rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de lta bu dag la thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed
287b1(phal chen): pa ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod spyod pa rnams kyi rlung sprin nag po gtor ba dang / chub rnyog pa gdang ba dang / rlung mi bzad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / slong
287b2(phal chen): gi 'jigs pa las thar par bya ba dang / phyogs bstan pa dang / chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang / 'gram bstan pa dang / rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongs su ston te/ yongs su
287b3(phal chen): blud pa'i gzugs dang / ded dben gyi gzugs dang / rta'i rgyal po chen pa ngos chen gyi gzugs dang / glang ba'i rgyal pa'i gzugs dang / rus sbal gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'i gzus
287b4(phal chen): dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang / mnyan pa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su
287b5(phal chen): gyur par byed do/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang 'di ltar sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur par shog cig ces yongs su sngo'o// thang la spong
287b6(phal chen): pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnas pa'i nam la/ sa gzhi 'od ma dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gang ba/ sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba thag thug dang mi bde ba'i lam can
287b7(phal chen): rdul dang phyag dar shin tu 'thul ba/ rdzi char drag pos btags pa/ tsha ba dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa/ sbrul dang gcan gzan gyis bag tsha ba yod pa/ thong mi dang chom po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig la/ mgo 'khor bar gyur pa'i
288a1(phal chen): sems can rnams la nyi ma'i gzugs dang / zla ba'i gzugs dang / skya rengs 'char ba'i gzugs dang / skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang / glog gi 'breng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs
288a2(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang / rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang / lha'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
288a3(phal chen): kyis skyabs su gyur pa byed do/ / sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su shog cig par skyed do// ri'i g.yang sa la
288a4(phal chen): spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi srog dbyung ba dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang / sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang / longs spyod tshol ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis
288a5(phal chen): non pa dang / yo byad yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing brtson pa dang / bu dang chung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur pa dang / lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams
288a6(phal chen): pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la'ang thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ 'di ltar ri'i phug dang bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shing
288a7(phal chen): thog dang rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chu'i lam dang chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa dang / tsha ba dang grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang / ka la bing
288b1(phal chen): ka'i sgra skad bsgrags pa dang / rma bya'i rgyal po skad la byin pa'i dbyangs dang / sman la bar bas snang ba'i gzugs dang / ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / ri'i bug dang / su ba dang / stongs su drug ste/
288b2(phal chen): bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang / sa'i gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ sems can ji ltar bdag
288b3(phal chen): gis sems kyang ri la spod pa 'di dag yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du/ 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g.yang sa la gnas shing rga shi'i gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su'ang bdag gyur par shog cig par
288b4(phal chen): bskyed do/ / nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag gis chod de/ shing dang shing phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba dang / chu dang / rtsa dang / sdong po dang / 'khri
288b5(phal chen): shing gis lam chod pa dang / shing dang shing phan sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thibs po'i nang du phyin te/ stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying can/ don ma grub pas sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs
288b6(phal chen): ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi bde ba/ nags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/ kho mo ni bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston par byed de/ sems
288b7(phal chen): kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can lta ba thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams sdug
289a1(phal chen): bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grel par shog cig par skyed do/ / 'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na 'thom pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgo sna tshogs kyis
289a2(phal chen): bde ba yongs su bskyed cing lam bstan te/ de dag 'jigs pa med pa dang bde ba la rab tu bkod pa nas/ sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na 'thom pa/ ngan song thams
289a3(phal chen): cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol te/ shin tu phun sum tshogs pas bde ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya ba shog cig par bskyed do//
289a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la'ang / kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la
289a5(phal chen): mngon par chags pa de las gyen du skyed par byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa'i thams cad
289a6(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang gnas kyi bcing bas glags pa rnams mtshan mo mun pa nag pa shin tu gnag
289a7(phal chen): pas chod pa'i nang na/ khyim gyi don sna tshogs nyams su gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/ chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas/ chos
289b1(phal chen): kyi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ste/ tshim par byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud
289b2(phal chen): kyi spyod yul las gyen du bskyod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog cig par skyed do// rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/ shar phyogs la
289b3(phal chen): sogs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa/ sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / sgang bu la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/ phyogs kyi lam
289b4(phal chen): dngas tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang / kho mo ni thabs sna tshogs kyis snang bar byas te/ phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongs su ston to// rtal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni mu stegs yongs su ston to//
289b5(phal chen): rgyal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni gru yongs su ston to// khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongs su ston to// rnam par lta ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston to// sa'i gzhi mtho ba dang
289b6(phal chen): dma' ba yongs su ston to/ / sa'i gzhi phyogs mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to// lam gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang /
289b7(phal chen): khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang yongs su ston to// tsha ba dang skom pas mnar ba rnams la'ang mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang /
290a1(phal chen): bzab shing ki ra ba dang / kun dga' yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to// sdug pa dang bral zhing zad par 'dod pa rnams la pha dang / ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / mdza' bo dang /
290a2(phal chen): blon po dang / mnyen bshes dang / yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su ston te/ sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun gnag gis chod pa/ mig rab rib kyis
290a3(phal chen): nyams pa/ phyogs bslad pa/ lam 'khor ba rnams la gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba bskyed de/ 'od byas pa de bzhin du bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor
290a4(phal chen): ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa/ ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa/ ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/ 'dus shes dang / sems dang
290a5(phal chen): lta bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag
290a6(phal chen): dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/ mi dge ba'i
290a7(phal chen): las kyi lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa/ srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa/ 'dod pas log par g.yam pa/ brdzun du smra ba/ bra ma zer ba/ ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/ tshig bkyil ba smras
290b1(phal chen): chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa/ log par lta ba can/ par mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po mi shes pa/ skyes
290b2(phal chen): bu dam pa mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/ mi tshul ba'i 'dod pas zil gyis non pa/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa
290b3(phal chen): 'debs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba// byang chub kyi sems
290b4(phal chen): la mos pa spong bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du rjod pa/ snod ma skabs par snying ring ba/ gnod pa ma byas pa dgrar len pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ skyes
290b5(phal chen): bu dam pa ma yin pas spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khu ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa// mtshams med pa'i las byed pa/ g.yangs chen po la
290b6(phal chen): mngon par bltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas// theg
290b7(phal chen): ba chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sa'i lam yongs su ston par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
291a1(phal chen): ye shes tshul rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / stobs bcu yongs su zab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi
291a2(phal chen): stobs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mchog tu gyur pa yongs su ston par shog cig/ yongs su bstan nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog cig par
291a3(phal chen): bskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yun ring po nas na zhing nad kyis yongs su skyo ba/ lus nyam chung ba dang rga pa/ rga ba'i zil gyis non pa dang / mgon med pa dang / 'phongs
291a4(phal chen): shing dbul ba dang / log par lhung ba dang / yul gzhan du phyin pa dang / phyogs log par zhugs pa dang / btson ra na 'dug pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / nyes byung ste rgyal pos gsad
291a5(phal chen): pabar bkri ba rnams kyang srog dang bral gyis 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gnas so/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams
291a6(phal chen): cad kyis gso bar nan tan du byed do/ / rgas pa dang / rga ba'i zil gyis non pa rnams la ni bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro dang / yo byad kyis mi 'phongs par yongs su sdud byed do// mgon med
291a7(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do/ / 'phongs shing dbul ba rnams ni nor dang gser gyi phung pos yongs su sdud do// log par ltung ba rnams ni don 'thun pas yongs su sdud //
291b1(phal chen): yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul du phyin par byed do// phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud do// btson ra na 'dug pa rnams btson ra nas thar pa byed do//
291b2(phal chen): chad pas gcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do// nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsad par bkrib rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed de/ sems kyang bdag ji ltar
291b3(phal chen): sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob cing mgon byed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus
291b4(phal chen): tenyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
291b5(phal chen): dang / 'khrug pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o// ngan song dang log par lhung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzugs la rab tu dgod
291b6(phal chen): par bya'o/ / chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa la yang
291b7(phal chen): dag par bskul bar bya'o/ / rga shi yongs su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa/ lta ba'i
292a1(phal chen): rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ log par rtog pa'i spyod yul can lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las nyam nga bar 'gyur ba la yongs su spyod
292a2(phal chen): pa/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs la gnas pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa/ lus gdung ba dang
292a3(phal chen): yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa/ mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / rdzing bu dang / chu klung dang / ri'i gzar dang / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba la
292a4(phal chen): mos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la'ang thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar
292a5(phal chen): ltung ba'i lam las rnam par bzlog go/ / 'jig rten pa'i yang dag par lta ba la rab tu bkod cing / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la'ang yongs su 'god do// sems kyang ji ltar bdag
292a6(phal chen): gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang sdug bsngal las yongs su bkrol ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha
292a7(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la/ kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// sems
292b1(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad ma dul gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar skyed do/ / de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ de'i tshe byang chub
292b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di brnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
292b3(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gti mug ma rig mun nag bsal don du// sems can phan
292b4(phal chen): phyir kho mo chos ston te/ / dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas// 'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin// kho mos byams yangs shin tu sbyang ba byas// bskal pa mtha' yas sngon chad shin
292b5(phal chen): tu bsgoms/ / des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byed// nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis// kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med de// 'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung //
292b6(phal chen): des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed// nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis// 'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang // ma byas 'phags pa'i bde ba mngon bsgrub cing //
292b7(phal chen): des ni kho mo dga' mgur rangs par byed// rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing // nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang //
293a1(phal chen): 'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis// rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag/ des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang
293a2(phal chen): po mthong / / zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams// byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs par mthong // sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing // 'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de//
293a3(phal chen): ba spu kun nas 'od zer mang 'gyed pa'i// sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong // zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems can rnams// shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste// byis pa
293a4(phal chen): de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na/ / 'khor zhing rang rang las kyang myong bar byed// kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste// der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du// 'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad rgya mtsho dag/ kun
293a5(phal chen): kyang zos nas dran pas yongs su 'dzin/ / dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis// dpe zla med pa'i gsung ni rab brgyan te// des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu skor// de dag kho mos thos shing
293a6(phal chen): dran pas 'dzin/ / kho mo'i sna yi mthu yangs rnam dag ste// chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med// rnam thar gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i// tshul ni rgyal sras khyod kyis shes par
293a7(phal chen): gyis/ / kho mo'i lce ni rgya cher rab tu yangs// srab cing mdog dmar rin chen 'od du dag/ sems can bsam pa ji bzhin des shes byed// rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// kho
293b1(phal chen): mo'i chos lus shin tu rnam dag ste/ / dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas// gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te// de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong // kho mo'i sems
293b2(phal chen): ni chags med zag pa med/ / sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te// de yi khongs su mi mchog kun chud kyang // de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med// zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab/
293b3(phal chen): de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes// de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang // de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med// kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub// des ni bsam yas zhing
293b4(phal chen): yang rab tu spyod/ / lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te// des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul// kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag/ kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i
293b5(phal chen): mdzod/ / des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yin// kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag/ des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes// 'gro ba kun
293b6(phal chen): gyi the tsom yongs su gcod/ / rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// dus gsum kun la kho mo zhugs gyur pas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes// de dag smon lam la
293b7(phal chen): yang rab tu zhugs/ / tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa yin// rdul mang kun la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong // de dag dus gsum 'jug pa'ang de bzhin te// de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
294a1(phal chen): mthong / / 'di ni kun tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing // rdul sbubs kun gyi
294a2(phal chen): byang chub shing drung na/ / zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrog pa ltos// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
294a3(phal chen): lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/ de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod
294a4(phal chen): kyis brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i
294a5(phal chen): dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa'i yang pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen
294a6(phal chen): dngal 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi pa 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ rgyal po'i gnas
294a7(phal chen): der rgyal po chos rab mu stegs shes bya ba chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/ gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ des sa chen po de'ang ri dang rgya mtshor
294b1(phal chen): bcas pa'i mthas gzugs par chos kyis rgyal bar byas nas bde bar gnas par byas so/ / rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba bungs/ de srong la
294b2(phal chen): 'dod pas myong shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas dub nas nam gyi gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal lo/ / de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i
294b3(phal chen): dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i lhun can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du de bzhin
294b4(phal chen): gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che
294b5(phal chen): dpal 'byung ba thams cad 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar gyur to/ / rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba
294b6(phal chen): 'dug 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song na/ rgyan dkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas te 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par
294b7(phal chen): gyis shig/ nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
295a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas so/ / de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul dang / byang chub
295a2(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rgya cher bshad do// rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ bsam pa thag
295a3(phal chen): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la
295a4(phal chen): mchod pa dang rim gro cher byas so/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na
295a5(phal chen): ni de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
295a6(phal chen): la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tshun chad du nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ sems can dmyal bar ma yin no// byol song gi skye gnas su
295a7(phal chen): ma yin no/ / yi dgas su ma yin no// nam yang rigs dpa' bar ma skyes so// nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to// nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtag
295b1(phal chen): par lha'i nang du ni lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob/ mi'i nang du ni mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo//
295b2(phal chen): dus ngan par yang ma skyes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde
295b3(phal chen): zhing mnyam pa nas nye zho med par phyin kyang / de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur te/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni 'das/
295b4(phal chen): bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol gyi ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar/ bskal pa mya ngan med cing
295b5(phal chen): rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gyur te/ der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung
295b6(phal chen): ngo / / sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
295b7(phal chen): sbyar ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo'i yang tshong dpon snyan pa rnam par grakra
296a1(phal chen): pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo
296a2(phal chen): zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba de'ang smon lam gyi dbang gyis/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogs su mtshan mo'i lha mo mig
296a3(phal chen): rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang / khyim de'ang yongs su bskyod de/ 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gi gzus
296a4(phal chen): bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te/ snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstan to// de nas
296a5(phal chen): kho mo pha ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin to// de nas kho
296a6(phal chen): mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
296a7(phal chen): dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyi snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'ang thob par gyur to/ / de thob pas kyang 'o mo bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to//
296b1(phal chen): kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa
296b2(phal chen): rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di'ang thob par gyur to/ / de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas
296b3(phal chen): par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing / bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par
296b4(phal chen): shes so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ de dag gi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda'ang rab tu shes so// sems dang /
296b5(phal chen): bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos pa'ang rab tu shes so// sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su smin pa'ang rab tu shes so// de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
296b6(phal chen): tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yongs su ston to/ / kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de'ang sems kyi skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas
296b7(phal chen): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis
297a1(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs so/ / de'i 'og pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// de
297a2(phal chen): bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ / sangs
297a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa ji skad cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du na 'dug par shes so// sangs rgyas
297a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to/ / 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin te// nye bar 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dgag rdzun gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /
297a5(phal chen): lam rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub po//
297a6(phal chen): sems can ji skad cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag tu skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos
297a7(phal chen): ba'i bye brag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bye brag tu de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlob ste/ de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang // chos kyi
297b1(phal chen): dbyings 'byam klas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo/ / rigs kyi bu kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi
297b2(phal chen): snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyis byung ba//
297b3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byam klas pa 'dal ba la 'jug par dbang sgyur ba/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /
297b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sems kyi skad
297b5(phal chen): cig gcig gis yongs su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i ye
297b6(phal chen): shes la dbang sgyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi
297b7(phal chen): khams thams cad la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tsom dang / nem nur dang / yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi
298a1(phal chen): zla ba dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rdul
298a2(phal chen): gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa la dbang sgyur ba/ dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod
298a3(phal chen): yul la 'jug pa 'am/ rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
298a4(phal chen): byang chub tu sems skyed skyed pa/ yang dang yang skul skul ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
298a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs
298a6(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / khyod sku shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong // mtshan gyis rnam brgyan ri bo ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du// phun sum
298a7(phal chen): tshogs sku 'jam dpal bzhin du mdzes/ / khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste// dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog/ der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'dra ste// 'byung zhing rnam par 'jig
298b1(phal chen): kyang chags mi mnga'/ / lam rgyud 'jam klas thams cad kun tu yang // khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye// skar chen rdza skar rgyu skar tshogs bzhin du// spu rtse kun la'ang khyod na
298b2(phal chen): bdag gis mthong / / khyod kyi thugs yangs shin tu rnam dag ste// phyogs rnams kun gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas// der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du// khyod la ye shes mi rtog dam
298b3(phal chen): ba mnga'/ / zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin// khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon pa// rgyal mang sna tshogs char 'bebs shing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs//
298b4(phal chen): 'gro ba kun snyed lus rnams mtha' yas pa// khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon cing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can rnam par
298b5(phal chen): spyod/ / spu rtse kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams// sna tshogs rgyan ldan rnam pa tha dad mthong // lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa// ji snyed de dag bsam bzhin kun kyang byung // gang
298b6(phal chen): zhig khyod kyis mtshan thos dgar 'gyur ba/ / de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho// sems can gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong ba// byang chub lam la mngon du bsdus par 'gyur// de ltar
298b7(phal chen): thos nas rab tu sems dga' la/ / mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas// bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung // khyod kyi zhal blta'i don du mos par bgyi// zhing rnams
299a1(phal chen): song gi rdul skyed lus byas te/ / de srid bskal pa brgyad de khyod 'dra ba'o// lkug cig khyod kyi yon tan legs brjod kyang // legs pa'i mthar sbyin nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro//
299a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i
299a3(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyags 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen
299a4(phal chen): bkur bya bas mngoms bzhin du/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo // // bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
299a5(phal chen): nor bzangs mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa ni khong du chud par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po yang dag
299a6(phal chen): par byung ba la ni rjes su dpyod byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongs su 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongs su sbyong / byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil
299a7(phal chen): 'khor ni yongs su gnon/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgya cher byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rgya mtsho ni rjes su 'brang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya
299b1(phal chen): la ni rnam par lta/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la gzhol pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin ni rgya cher byed/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
299b2(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas mngon par bsgrub cing / mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od gang na ba
299b3(phal chen): der song ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar
299b4(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med
299b5(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang / ji ltar 'byung ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyid pa ma 'tshal to//
299b6(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyad pa dang / 'byung ba dang / yongs su 'grub
299b7(phal chen): baba'adri ba legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
300a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnam par ba
300a2(phal chen): ba'i mig rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
300a3(phal chen): tshad med pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rgya mtsho sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa dang / sems can sna tshogs kyi
300a4(phal chen): don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyis
300a5(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing / sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pas dus gsum du byung
300a6(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrogs pas/ mdo sde thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa dang
300a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang
300b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi
300b2(phal chen): bu kho mos ni de'i mthus dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la'ang 'jug go// 'khor
300b3(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang / sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / mtshan rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
300b4(phal chen): gi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe tshad sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de
300b5(phal chen): ngag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku la'ang 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
300b6(phal chen): cad du bzhud pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bzhud pa med pa'o// rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byon pa med pa'o// mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang
300b7(phal chen): mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma skyes pa'o// mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de ba'i na gshegs pa de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta
301a1(phal chen): bur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bden pa ma yin pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa
301a2(phal chen): de dag ni brdzun pa ma yin pa'o/ / shi 'pho dang skye ba las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i chos nyid yin/
301a3(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'jig pa med pa'o// ngag gi lam thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//
301a4(phal chen): chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong du chud par byed
301a5(phal chen): cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bas shin tu rgya che bar byed
301a6(phal chen): shin tu yangs par byed do/ / khong du chud par byed do// rtogs par byed do// mnyam par byed do// mngon par bsgrub bo// gzhi snyoms par byed do// rab tu 'jug go// rnam par
301a7(phal chen): 'phel bar byed do/ / nges par sems so// nye bar rtog go// dran par byed do// spyod yul du byed do// brtan par byed do// snang bar byed do// rab tu brjod do// rnam par spyod do//
301b1(phal chen): rnam par 'byed do// tshogs su byed do// yid ches par byed do// yongs su rtog pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'i snying rje chen po de la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la//
301b2(phal chen): yang dag par gnas par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang po sgom mo// yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / mthus
301b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gnyis pa sgom mo// 'khor bar log par zhugs pa la btang snyoms su byas te/
301b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gsum pa sgom mo// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/
301b5(phal chen): bsam gtan bzhi pa sgom mo// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba dang /
301b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes thams cad mngon par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub
301b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su sbyong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'
302a1(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di sgom mo/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing thabs kyis sems can yongs
302a2(phal chen): su smin par byed de/ 'di ltar nub mo zhi bar gyur pa'i tshe dga' ba la myos par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed do// mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / yongs su skyo ba'i 'du
302a3(phal chen): shes dang / bgegs su 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang / 'ching ba'i 'du shes dang / srin mo'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du
302a4(phal chen): shes dang / rje med pa'i 'du shes dang / gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang / 'dod pa'i yul dang / longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes skyed
302a5(phal chen): dede/ sems can de dag kyang sems de la yongs su sgom pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par
302a6(phal chen): rab tu 'byung ngo / / de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe'ang chos dang 'thun pa'i dad pa yongs su skyed de/ sgra chen po 'jigs pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do// mtshan mo zhi bar
302a7(phal chen): gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo'ang yang dag par ston to/ / spang ba dang 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar ston to// khyim gyi sgo'ang rnam par 'byed do// lam yang yongs su ston to// snang bas
302b1(phal chen): kyang mngon par byed do/ / mun pas chod pa'ang rnam par sel to// 'jigs pa'ang med par byed do// rab tu byung ba la'ang yang dag par bsngags par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang brjod
302b2(phal chen): do/ / chos kyi legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi legs pa'ang brjod do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang bsngags pa byed do// rigs
302b3(phal chen): kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing / sems can rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi yongs su rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do//
302b4(phal chen): tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pas non pa rnams dang / log par yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa de dag dang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do// sdig to mi dge ba'i
