302b5(phal chen): chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba dang / sdig to'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub bo// dge ba'i yongs su rtog pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa
302b6(phal chen): dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang / byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen
302b7(phal chen): pos rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su skyed pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su rtog pa skyed pa dang / skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen nye bar sgrub par byed pa
303a1(phal chen): nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar sgrub par byed de/ rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam
303a2(phal chen): papar gnon pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu
303a3(phal chen): thob pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
303a4(phal chen): yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zhing rgya mtsho thams cad
303a5(phal chen): du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems
303a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba/ 'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba skyed pa'i
303a7(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re san/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nyid nang dang yang rgyang mo ring ste/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol zhig na/ mtshan
303b1(phal chen): mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i las la brtson par bya ba dris shig
303b2(phal chen): de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i
303b3(phal chen): phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dus rnams kun tu byung ba'i bde gshegs rnams// mngon du bya bar mos pa'i sems ldan pa// de dag mig yangs rnam par dag
303b4(phal chen): par 'gyur/ / des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong // rgyal ba'i sku gsal dri ma med la ltos// mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan pas shin tu mdzes// rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams//
303b5(phal chen): skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la'ang ltos// byang chub shing drung sangs rgyas gdan rab la// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas// chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas pa khyab mdzad cing // 'gro ba'i
303b6(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo skor/ / rgyal ba'i chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba// gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chung nas// gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis// 'gro ba ma lus
303b7(phal chen): zhing ston pa mdzad/ / sangs rgyas sku ni rgya che bsam mi khyab// chos kyi dbyings kun yongs su rgyas bkang zhing // de ni kun tu mnyam par snang ba ste// rgyal ba thams cad kun tu ston pa mdzad// zhing
304a1(phal chen): rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba snyed/ / zod kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas su// kha dog bzang po gzhan dang gzhan snang bas// chos dbyings rgyas par skad cig re res 'phel
304a2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer sprin/ / rgyal che bsam yas mi zad mngon 'byung ba// de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs byed cing // srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel// sangs rgyas
304a3(phal chen): sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa/ / rgyal ba'i spu yi 'khor nas yongs bton cing // chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas par kun bkang ste// srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sel// sangs rgyas
304a4(phal chen): gsung snyan rab tu sgrog mdzad pa/ / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho sgra 'od can// chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad// srog chags byang chub bsam pa yongs su skyed// bskal pa rgya mtshor
304a5(phal chen): srung pa spyod pa'i tshe/ / 'dis ni sngan chad yongs su bzung mdzad pa// de dag kun gyis rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad// zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
304a6(phal chen): rten kun tu byung / / sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par zhugs// mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul gzhan dang gzhan// de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras dam pa thams cad ma lus
304a7(phal chen): bar/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gcig rtse las 'byung // rnam thar de la gang rnams bsam yas pa// de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus// kho mo'i 'dab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'dra/
304b1(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon la mngon 'gyur rab tu dga'// ming du snang ba 'od 'phro mig ces bya// de la byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra dros// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan
304b2(phal chen): mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
304b3(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen
304b4(phal chen): gyi gdams ngag gis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la nan tan du bya ba'i sems yang dag par skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sman pa la nad pa lta bu'i 'du shes kyis yongs
304b5(phal chen): su spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba yid la byed pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i glags
304b6(phal chen): rnyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i
304b7(phal chen): bshes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der song ngo /
305a1(phal chen): de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dge ba'i rtsa ba
305a2(phal chen): tshogs las byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba tshogs chen po las byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba rnam
305a3(phal chen): par gnon pa chen por byin gyis brlabs so/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las 'jug par dka' bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mo chung du 'tsha
305a4(phal chen): bsdad cing shin tu legs par byin gyis brlabs so/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes
305a5(phal chen): gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba yun ring por gnas pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba don mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par dmigs pa 'byung
305a6(phal chen): pabar byin gyis brlabs so/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lam gyi rgyan mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gnon par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
305a7(phal chen): gyi drung du 'gro ba sgo kun nas rnam par gnon pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yo ba med par 'ong bas rnam par gnon par byin gyis brlabs so//
305b1(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu brtson pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / smon las chen po rgya mtsho
305b2(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam par gnon pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / sems can gcig gi don du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par sdug bsngal nyams su blang ba'i
305b3(phal chen): zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgra sgrog cing / yun ring por gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson
305b4(phal chen): 'grus chen po'i go bgos pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / phyogs rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad du shugs kyis 'gro bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba
305b5(phal chen): dang / ba spu'i sbubs gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas
305b6(phal chen): nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gengs pa la gnas par bya bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
305b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan dang / lam yongs su gnon pa zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam
306a1(phal chen): yongs su gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la dmigs pa las ma g.yos par/ chos kyi dbyings kun
306a2(phal chen): tu rgyas par 'gengs pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba gang na ba der phyin pa dang / des mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu
306a3(phal chen): dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na seng ge'i khri me tog gi snying po can la 'dug cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bzang po'i dga'
306a4(phal chen): ba yangs shing dri med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la mnyam par bzhag mthong ngo / / de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa mngon par ston
306a5(phal chen): pa'i sprin sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na nyams su bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa
306a6(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang mthong ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing rtsod pa med par bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad la 'phangs par rtsi ba med par bya ba dang / sems can thams
306a7(phal chen): cad la sbyor ba mtshungs pas yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongs su gtang ba dang / nang
306b1(phal chen): dang phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / dka' ba chen po yongs su gtang bar bstan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su
306b2(phal chen): bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang 'thun pa'i sgras/ sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i sprin dang / dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub
306b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad
306b4(phal chen): kyis rnam par dmigs par gyur pa mthong ngo / / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'brul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas
306b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas
306b6(phal chen): nas/ mngon sum du brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yi dam las mi g.yo bar yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu
306b7(phal chen): ston pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang / yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad du gnas pa las phyir phyogs pa dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa chung
307a1(phal chen): pa'i sgor gzhol ba yongs su ston pa dang / mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rnam par zlog pa dang / mi rtag pa dang /
307a2(phal chen): g.yo ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing bdag med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa
307a3(phal chen): dang mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par skul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
307a4(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongs su ston par byed cing / sems can thams cad
307a5(phal chen): yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang
307a6(phal chen): nyams su bzod pa sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par mtho btsams kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad
307a7(phal chen): kyis tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis spro ba dang / brgyad pa dang / smad pa dang / bskyung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa nyams su bzod par byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams
307b1(phal chen): cad kyis mi bskul ba yongs su ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la nga rgyal
307b2(phal chen): med pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir/
307b3(phal chen): bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs
307b4(phal chen): pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus
307b5(phal chen): kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la
307b6(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi rdzogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
307b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang / mi lom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par lhung ba'i lam thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i brtson 'grus
308a1(phal chen): dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs
308a2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems
308a3(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
308a4(phal chen): brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas lus sna tshogs kha dog dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par
308a5(phal chen): sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang / ngotsha
308a6(phal chen): shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrogs pa dang / dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'jig rte/
308a7(phal chen): bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yong su ston pa dang / chos la mos
308b1(phal chen): shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams
308b2(phal chen): cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su rjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
308b3(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams
308b4(phal chen): bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba
308b5(phal chen): dang / lus kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams
308b6(phal chen): cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te/ zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skye ba
308b7(phal chen): med pa yongs su ston pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
309a1(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang yongs su gzung bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang
309a2(phal chen): dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi
309a3(phal chen): sgor yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'jom pa'i shes
309a4(phal chen): rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su
309a5(phal chen): ston pa byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs
309a6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna
309a7(phal chen): tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung
309b1(phal chen): ba thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang / lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzang ba thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par
309b2(phal chen): bstan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang rim
309b3(phal chen): gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo la gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig
309b4(phal chen): turgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su
309b5(phal chen): smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la
309b6(phal chen): mngon sum du gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang sngon lam yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su
309b7(phal chen): brjod pa dang / sems kyi sad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi
310a1(phal chen): 'chad pa yongs su brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
310a2(phal chen): thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing / thams
310a3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su brjod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad
310a4(phal chen): sa yang dag par brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi
310a5(phal chen): 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba
310a6(phal chen): spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi
310a7(phal chen): stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chud mi za ba'i chos can yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
310b1(phal chen): pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog la thug pa med pa dang / rgyun med pa dang bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa
310b2(phal chen): thams cad kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa
310b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
310b4(phal chen): rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas zhing thams cad yong
310b5(phal chen): su bskyod cing bskul bas/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshegs thams cad rab tu 'joms
310b6(phal chen): pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu rjod pa byed cing / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tsha smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
310b7(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho kha dog mtha' yas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi
311a1(phal chen): khams su rgyas par 'gangs pa 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongs
311a2(phal chen): su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang
311a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can
311a4(phal chen): thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang
311a5(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang 'jig
311a6(phal chen): paba'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang / dbyibs dang / rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
311a7(phal chen): cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te spyan sngar phyin nas mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa byed cing / de ltar ye shes kyi
311b1(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed pa dang / sems dang bar byed pa dang / rab tu dga' ba skyed pa dang / mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam
311b2(phal chen): par zlog pa dang / sems rnam par sbyong ba dang / sems skyon med pa skye bar byed pa dang / dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang / mos pa'i stobs yongs su skyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi
311b3(phal chen): ldog par byed pa mthong ngo / / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas 'jig rten du ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab
311b4(phal chen): tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan bkur ba'i thabs dang / de bzhin gshegs
311b5(phal chen): pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing mchod pa dang rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtang ba dang / tshul khrim
311b6(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i thabs dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang / longs spyod kyi dbang chen po yongs su gtang ste mngon par byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang /
311b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par
312a1(phal chen): blang ba'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid ma brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyes byas pa dang / ngan du smra ba dang /
312a2(phal chen): nyes par spyod pa thams cad bag la zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzod
312a3(phal chen): pa dang / chos thams cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed
312a4(phal chen): cig yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
312a5(phal chen): phyin pa'i tshogs dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
312a6(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam par 'phrul pa ji skad cig yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad
312a7(phal chen): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab chen po'i
312b1(phal chen): sprin yongs su 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi gter chen po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /
312b2(phal chen): thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon
312b3(phal chen): lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa
312b4(phal chen): dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu
312b5(phal chen): phyin pa'i rkyen du gyur pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha
312b6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang
312b7(phal chen): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa ji snyed cig yod pa
313a1(phal chen): dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rnam par dmigs par bya ba ji snyed cig yod
313a2(phal chen): pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyas par 'gengs pa ji skad cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu
313a3(phal chen): byin pa'i rgya chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su grub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad
313a4(phal chen): dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu phye ba la 'jug pa 'byung bar yongs su bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan
313a5(phal chen): pa'i chos rnams dang / chos yongs su bsdu ba dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / las kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / zhing gi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / bskal pa'i ye shes
313a6(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba dang / dus kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi
313a7(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
313b1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byung
313b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rgya mtsho'i tshul rgyas
313b3(phal chen): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyud kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
313b4(phal chen): chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i
313b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/ sems can
313b6(phal chen): gyi lus kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs can du mngon par mched cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / 'di lta ste/ 'og min dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / mi
313b7(phal chen): dros pa dang / mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang / bsod nams 'phel ba
314a1(phal chen): dang / sprin dang bral ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // dge rgyas dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge bachung
314a2(phal chen): ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / kun snang dang ba dang / tshad med snang ba dang / snang ba chung ngu'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon
314a3(phal chen): par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / tshangs chen dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs
314a4(phal chen): su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
314a5(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i
314a6(phal chen): tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lnga'i bu dang bcas pa lta
314a7(phal chen): bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon
314b1(phal chen): cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang / dri za'i bu dang / dri za'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smi/
314b2(phal chen): par byed pa mthong ngo // grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / grul bum gyi bu dang / grul bum gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par
314b3(phal chen): byed pa mthong ngo / / klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin /
314b4(phal chen): gyi rgyal po chen po ngal ba so bo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi 'am ci'i
314b5(phal chen): rgyal po sdong po dang / mi 'am ci'i bu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros
314b6(phal chen): bzang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
314b7(phal chen): shugs drag stobs chen dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lha ma yin
315a1(phal chen): gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // chos kyi
315a2(phal chen): rgyal po gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i bu dang / gshin rje'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi'i dbang po dang / skyes pa dang /
315a3(phal chen): bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can smin par byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems
315a4(phal chen): can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon
315a5(phal chen): par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / / rlung dang / chu dang / me'i phung po'i lnga lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
315a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog dang / sman dang / shing dang / sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin
315a7(phal chen): par byed pa mthong ngo / / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / grong khyer dang / snying po byang chub dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs dang / rkang gis 'gro ba dang / lus
315b1(phal chen): kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ba nas/ de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing phyogs
315b2(phal chen): bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'jam klas pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/ mtshan
315b3(phal chen): mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la sogs pa/ sngon gyi tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de
315b4(phal chen): rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
315b5(phal chen): cing 'dab chags pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing b.rab chags pa dang / dge ba'i
315b6(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi
315b7(phal chen): tshig dang yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang
316a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa
316a2(phal chen): dang / zhing mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags
316a3(phal chen): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags
316a4(phal chen): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can pha rol shi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i 'dab chags pa dang / lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa rtogs par
316a5(phal chen): byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing dbyangs la 'jug pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
316a6(phal chen): 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab
316a7(phal chen): chags pa dang / thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
316b1(phal chen): shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab
316b2(phal chen): chags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig
316b3(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyi mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang
316b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags
316b5(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
316b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes
316b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i baspu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te/ sems can rnams la chos
317a1(phal chen): 'chad pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yongs su ston pa dang / rjes su brjod pa dang / rab tu 'byed pa dang / shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang
317a2(phal chen): bgrang ba dang / nges par ston pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/ la la la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo //
317a3(phal chen): la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis la la la ni me'i lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sba skad kyis la la la ni sa yongs su g.yos pa'i
317a4(phal chen): sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni ri chen po phan tshun thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni lha'i grong khyer g.yos pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni gzhal med khang thug cing
317a5(phal chen): 'khrol ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo / / la la la ni lha'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la klu'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la
317a6(phal chen): ni dri za'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis la la la ni mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la
317a7(phal chen): ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni mi'i dbang po'i skad kyis la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha mo'i glu'i dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni lnga rdzas
317b1(phal chen): kyi rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad kyi sna tshogs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu
317b2(phal chen): dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul sems can rnams la rab tu rjod pa mthong ngo / / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad
317b3(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i
317b4(phal chen): mig 'gro bar rnam par thar pa'i yul thog ma sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa yongs su byung ste/ grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa/
317b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad la rnam par dmigs par byed pa mthong ngo // de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
317b6(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnams sbyong ba mthong ngo / / sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa mthong ngo // sems
317b7(phal chen): can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo / / sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du spyod pa mthong
318a1(phal chen): ngo / / sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang
318a2(phal chen): dbus med pa dag kyang stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / / thos so// rnam par dpyad do// zhugs so// khong du chud do// nges par rdzogs so//
318a3(phal chen): rjes su shes so// rjes su 'brangs so// rjes su zhugs so// mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
318a4(phal chen): par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba'i byin dang sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa dang / de bzhin
318a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro//
318a6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
318a7(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa des/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug sa thal mo sbyar nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la chu
318b1(phal chen): dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab// de la khyod kyis bsal pa tshad med bslabs// bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs rnams kyis/
318b2(phal chen): 'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim pas bstan// bdag med mgon med log pa yi// 'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas// rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis// lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul//
318b3(phal chen): shin tu rims bral rab tu zhi// chos sku gnyis med rnam par dag pa mnga'// 'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa// sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brag gis rnam par 'dul// phung po khams dang skye mched la//
318b4(phal chen): khyod ni nam yang mi gnas mi rten te// yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang // dbang phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul// phyi dang nang las rnam par grol// gnyis las byung ba'i mtsho las
318b5(phal chen): 'phags gyur kyang / / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i// gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud du rab tu ston// khyod la g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i spris mi mnga'// 'jig
318b6(phal chen): rten spros mos byis pa rnams/ / chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas// bskal pa mang por rtse gcig thub bzhugs kyang // phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs
318b7(phal chen): mchod don du/ / spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed// sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul// skad cig re re mtha' yas thugs su chud// sems can bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rnams//
319a1(phal chen): so so'i rkyen bzhin ko bar bgyi bas bstan// khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag/ las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing // chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te/
319a2(phal chen): sems can kun kyang rnam par sbyong ba mdzad// khyod sku mtshan bris rnam dag kyang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yis// sems can bsam pa'i dbang tshul du// khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs ston//
319a3(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de 'di skad ces
319a4(phal chen): smras so/ / lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/ lha mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med
319a5(phal chen): pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ji srid cig lags/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshogs su
319a6(phal chen): bcad de smras pa/ dran pa bskal pa mang 'das pa// zhing gi rdul snyed de yi snga rol na// zhing ni rin chen mdog bang byung // de yi bskal pa zhi ba'i dbyangs shes bya// gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrig ste// brgya
319a7(phal chen): stong phrag bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang / / tshad med rin chen ri bo 'dra// gling bzhi'i bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram// rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya// stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su tshang ba ste/
319b1(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang mdangs dga' ba// dbus na gnas pa'i spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od// der ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa yi bdag/ 'khor los sgyur ba mngon par gzugs b.rang byung // mtshan rab sum/
319b2(phal chen): cu gnyis dang ldan// de yi lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// pad+mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung // gser gyi mdog bzang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams cad du/
319b3(phal chen): mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengs so// de yi bu ni stong tshang ste// kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan// blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang // mdzangs shing yid gzhungs bye ba shin
319b4(phal chen): tu mang / / btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu tshang // lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas// de dag phan sems bde sems kyis// rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas// rgyal po de ni sa chen de// ri dang khor
319b5(phal chen): yug kun gyi mtha' klas pa'i/ / gling bzhi phun sum tshogs pa dag/ kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par byed// kho mo 'khor los sgyur ba yi// btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus//
319b6(phal chen): gser gyi mdog 'chang dri med 'od// dpag tshad stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs// nyi ma nub par gyur nas kyang // rgyal po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas// rol mo'i dbyangs kyang zhir
319b7(phal chen): gyur te/ / kho mo mal na bde bar nyal nyal na// nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la// sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur// de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste
320a1(phal chen): bstan pa mdzad/ / rgyal ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho des// zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig rten khyab par 'gyur// rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad
320a2(phal chen): ma lus rgyas par bkang / / sa rnams ri dang bcas par g.yos// rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yangs yongs su brjod// lha dang lha min mi dang klu// kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'// sangs
320a3(phal chen): rgyas ba spu'i sgo kun nas/ / sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung // des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas// 'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan// rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag
320a4(phal chen): kyang / / rgyal bas thams cad bdag gi rmi lam bstan// zab mo'i 'brug sgra thos gyur nas// khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur// mtshan mo'i lha mo stong snyed kyang // kho mo'i steng gi bar
320a5(phal chen): snang mkha' gnas shing / / rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas// kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod// lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs// khyod kyi rgyal ba'i khams su rgyal ba skyes// bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya
320a6(phal chen): dag tu/ / de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag dkon// kho mo dga' 'gyur sad par gyur// 'od gsal dri med rnam dag mthong // 'od bzang de ni ga las blta bltan// byang chub shing rgyal drung gi
320a7(phal chen): rgyal ba mthong / / mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan// ba spu kun nas 'od zer rgya mtsho bkye// ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags// rgyal ba g.yas g.yos kun tu'ang de bzhin no// mthong nas kho mo
320b1(phal chen): rab dga' ste/ / de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyed// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yangs mthong nas// kho mos smon lam shin tu rgya chen btab// kho mos rgyal po bzhengs su gsol// de yi 'khor dang
320b2(phal chen): bud med tshogs kyang bslang / / sangs rgyas 'od yangs mthong gyur nas// kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur// rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu// bzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis// yongs su bskor te dpung bcas pa/
320b3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong // lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang // kho mos rgyal ba de la mchod bkur byas// rin chen bdun yang yon du phul// rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol// mdo sde rgya mtsho
320b4(phal chen): tan sprin/ / smon lam mtshe las yongs su byung ba'i rgyan// kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung // bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan// mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig/ de tshe snying brtser kho mos phan
320b5(phal chen): bstan pa/ / de 'drar gyur te myos bsal zhes// kho mos mos pa yongs su skyes par gyur// kho mo'i smon lam de 'dra'i sems// thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i tshe// srid pa'i
320b6(phal chen): mtshos de ni zhig ma gyur/ / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rnams// kho mos dad pa bskyed de mchod pa byas// 'khor ba'i lha dang mi dbus su// yul gyi dga' dang bde la mngon par smon// rgyal ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho// de mi
320b7(phal chen): 'og ma yon tan sgron ma ste/ / rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal// sangs rgyas bzhi panam mkha'i shes rab bo// rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog/ rgyal ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i blo// rgyal ba 'od rgyal chos kyi zla/ brgyad pa
321a1(phal chen): ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o/ / rin chen 'od 'phro sbron te// rgyal ba dgu pa de tshe byung bar gyur// bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te// de dag kho mos dad pas mchod// bcu po de la
321a2(phal chen): sogs pa dag/ mi yi dbang po dam pa kun mchod de// tshul gyis rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i// mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur// de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyor ba// rin chen thams cad 'od ces
321a3(phal chen): bya ba byung / / bskal pa lha yi dpal zhes bya// sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur// thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung // gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes// snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas
321a4(phal chen): gsum/ / de yi 'og tu rin chen ri bo'o// me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron// me yi dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog/ snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi dpal// bcu pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po'o// bcu po
321a5(phal chen): de la sogs pa dag/ mi yi dbang po de dag kho mo yis// phung po'i gnas la dad dga' zhing // gnas med chos la gnas kyi blos mchod do// de 'og de yi mtshams sbyor ba// 'jig rten khams bzangs/
321a6(phal chen): byung bar gyur pa ni// pad+mo'i sgron ma sprin gyi dpal// de tshe'i bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya// de la rgyal ba tshad med de// de dag 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mchod// rgyal ba de dag thams cad las// rim gro chen
321a7(phal chen): pos kho mos chos kyang thos/ / rgyal ba'i dang po rin chen ri// de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste// rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal// chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o// chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi
321b1(phal chen): 'od/ / chos stobs 'od dang nam mkha'i blo gros te// chos 'od ri bo sngo mthon dang // de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sprin dpal lo// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi yi dam pa de dag kun mchod de// rgyal ba'i
321b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i/ / chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur// de yi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs// nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya// zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste// de la bskal pa zla ba'i dpal bya
321b3(phal chen): ngongo/ / de la stobs bcu byung ba ni// bye ba brgyad cu yongs su tshang ba ste// de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo// rgya che mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas// thog mar byung ba dri za'i rgyal// de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas shing
321b4(phal chen): rgyal te/ / rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri// de yi 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so// rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyan// chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyas gzi brjid dpal// 'jig rten dbang po 'od bzang
321b5(phal chen): dpal/ / kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs de dag thams cad mchod byas kyang // chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi// ye shes kho mos thob par ma gyur te// de yi
321b6(phal chen): 'og tu zhing dag pa/ / rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi phyed gzi brjid brtan// kun tu 'od sprin ming ldan byung // rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o// de la sems can dag pa mang // nyon mongs dri mas
321b7(phal chen): nyon mongs shin tu nyung / / bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od// sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan// rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug/ gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa// rgyal ba
322a1(phal chen): chos dbyings gzugs brnyan dang / / phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag/ rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od// rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o// bde gshags bzod
322a2(phal chen): 'khor sgron ma dang / / brgyad pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste// snang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa dang // de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi yi dam pa de kun kho mos mchod// chos nyid
322a3(phal chen): nam mkha' mnyam pa 'di/ / rang bzhin yongs su kun nas dag pa ste// de la gnas shing zhing gi rnams// 'byam klas kun tu spyod spun ma dag go// de yi 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'i// zhing ni spos sgron
322a4(phal chen): sprin gyi dpal zhes bya/ / kun nas nyon mongs yongs su dag/ de yi bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya// rgyal ba bye ba de tshe byung // de dag kun gyis de tshe bskal pa brgyan// mgon po de dag chos gsung ba//
322a5(phal chen): kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung // rgyal ba'i dang po grangs yas te// chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal gyi rgyal// chos dbang rgyal po yon tan sprin// chos kyi dpal dang lha yi cod pan no//
322a6(phal chen): ye shes 'od 'phro gzi brjid dpal// rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no// rgyal ba brgyad pa nam mkha'i dbyangs// dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgron ma ste// de dag tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni// mdzod spu'i
322a7(phal chen): dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te/ / rgyal ba mi mchog de dag la// mchod pa byas kyang chags med de ma sbyangs// de yi 'og ma rgyan rab can// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste// 'jig rten rnam
322b1(phal chen): par phye ba'i mtha'/ / rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog/ de tshe'i bskal pa'i snying po'i tshogs// de la sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste// rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing // rang byung de dag
322b2(phal chen): thams cad kho mos mchod/ / thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor// zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag/ mtshan rgya sprin sgra dbyangs shes bya ba
322b3(phal chen): dang / / chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag/ bsod nams ri rab zhi ba 'od kyi rgyal// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ rgyal ba de dag kun kyang lo mos mchod// rgyal ba'i lam ni ngar spungs te// de la
322b4(phal chen): rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol/ / 'on kyang nga dung rgyal ba yi// tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob bo// de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan pa// yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten khams byung ste// zhing dbyangs
322b5(phal chen): 'phreng ba'i blo gros can/ / sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no// bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste// de la sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung // mi mchog de kun kho mos mchod// rgyal ba
322b6(phal chen): mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs/ / rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs// rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog/ lha dbang gtsug pud rin chen gtso// gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs pa
322b7(phal chen): dang / / chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal// de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes blo// bcu po de la sogs pa dang // lha dang mi gtso de dag kho mos mchod// de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing 'byung ba// sprul pa bzang
323a1(phal chen): po'i rgyal mtshan sngon ma ste/ / bskal pa stong gi dpal zhes bya// de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug/ zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal// zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po'i dpal/
323a2(phal chen): snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang // rnam par sprin mched nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang // chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri// 'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha'i snying po'i dpal// de dag tha mar byung ba ni// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
323a3(phal chen): mkhas pa sgron ma'o/ / bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs zla ba de dag kho mos mchod// 'on kyang tshul mtsho 'dir 'jug pa'i// bzod pa kho mos thob par ma gyur to// de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing
323a4(phal chen): byung ba/ / kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba ste// bskal pa gnas med rnam par brgyan// de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug/ dang po yon tan kun tu smin// de yi 'og ma sangs rgyas nam mkha'i thugs//
323a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas legs byung rnam brgyan dang // rgya mtsho'i chos kyi sprin sgra sgrog pa'i dbyangs// rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang // sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang // sangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi
323a6(phal chen): brjid dang / / chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs byung sgra dbyangs dang // yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi ston// rgyal ba'i nyi ma dgu pa byung bar gyur// de dag kun gyi tha ma ste// rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal mchod do// rin
323a7(phal chen): chen dpal sngon yon tan dpal/ / nang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// kho mo lha mo bla bzhin te// mi yi dam pa byung tshe mchod pa byas// rgyal ba des ni kho mo la// mdo sde sngon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba
323b1(phal chen): brgyan/ / gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad// thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis gzung // kho mos mig yangs der thob ste// ting 'dzin zhi dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang thob// skad cig re rer zhing
323b2(phal chen): brgyud pa'i/ / rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po'ang kho mos mthong // byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin// byang chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa dang // sangs rgyas stobs kyi tshad
323b3(phal chen): du yangs par skyes/ / 'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te// rtag dang bde dang gtsang dang bdag zhen pa// gti mug mdongs gyur ma rig pasgribs// nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa// lta ba'i rnam
323b4(phal chen): pabastug la spyod/ / lam gyi 'gro rgyud nyam ngar sred dbang gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag tu// las kyi rnam par bris pas kun byung ba// 'gro rgyud kun gyi shi 'pho'i sgor// skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyer
323b5(phal chen): gyur cing / / skye dang rga shi gnod pa rnams// lus dang sems kyis nyams su myong gyur pa// mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad kyi// stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi//
323b6(phal chen): bla na med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed// de las smon lam sprin byung ba// 'gro ba kun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog/ tshogs rnams 'byung ba mtha' yas dang // lam tshul rgya mtsho rtogs pa'ang de nas
323b7(phal chen): byung / / 'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa// lam rgyud kun tu sgo gsal shugs ldan te// pha rol phyin gyi sprin yangs pa'ang // chos dbyings 'byam klas kun tu rnam par 'gyed// sa gnon shugs drag yangs
324a1(phal chen): ldan dang / / dus gsum rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis rnams la// chags pa med pa spyod par gyur// skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba kun drung 'gro// gzhan yang rgyal sras lo mos ni// spyod pa kun tu
324a2(phal chen): bzang po yongs su gnon/ / chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi// rgya mtsho'i tshul la'ang kho mo sa rtogs par 'jug/ rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'khor
324a3(phal chen): los sgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ rigs kyi bu de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni de'i
324a4(phal chen): tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyud mi gcad pa la zhugs pa'o/ / kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mo de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos
324a5(phal chen): sprul pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur pa'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni
324a6(phal chen): de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya bar gyur te/ kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo nges sad par byas nas/ sangs rgyas
324a7(phal chen): blta ba la yang dag par bskul to/ / rigs kyi bu kho mos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig nas bskyed de/ de ltar kho mo sems bskyed pa de'i mthus bskal pa
324b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bskyed du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ rtag tu rgyun ma chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten cing / thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba
324b2(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur to/ / tha mar kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi sgron ma yon tan rgyal mtshan mthong ba tsam gyis/
324b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/ de thob pas kho mo sems can yongs su smin par
324b4(phal chen): bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du rnam pa 'di lta bus sta gon du gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan
324b5(phal chen): 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya
324b6(phal chen): mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa/ 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la phyi
324b7(phal chen): ma'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ spyod pa re re la'ang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ lus re res
325a1(phal chen): kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam
325a2(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rnam par dmigs pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa/ zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug
325a3(phal chen): par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sngon
325a4(phal chen): gyi mtha'i bskal pa la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu yangs pa yang dag par
325a5(phal chen): blang ba dang yongs su gzung ba la mkhas pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par
325a6(phal chen): nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid na/ kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid
325a7(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig
325b1(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro bar rnam
325b2(phal chen): pabar snang ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i drung nas song ngo //
325b3(phal chen): 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po brgya tham pa// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par
325b4(phal chen): snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rtogs par
325b5(phal chen): bya ba dang / shes par bya ba dang / yid ches par bya ba dang / rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang / rgyas par dgang ba dang / rjes su shes par bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / rjes su gzhol bar bya ba dang /
325b6(phal chen): sgom par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang / gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa la bar chad med par bya ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar
325b7(phal chen): rnam par snang bas 'gro kar gtams pa rjes su dran pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i rjes su sems pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba thob par bya ba la
326a1(phal chen): yang dag par spyod pa phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar yid la bya ba rgyal thams cad bral pa dang / dge pan pa shes ban bsnyen bkur
326a2(phal chen): ba'i mthu tshogs chen po yongs su bsgrub par zhe non pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen pa dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad
326a3(phal chen): la bsam pa mi byed pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa yongs su 'phel bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongs su skyes pa/ bskal pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes
326a4(phal chen): gnyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung du song ngo // de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems
326a5(phal chen): can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su grub pa'i lus bstan te/
326a6(phal chen): mdzod spu nas 'od zer ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan
326a7(phal chen): par bkye'o/ / des 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor 'dug ste lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'od zer des reg par gyur ma
326b1(phal chen): zag tu de nyid kyi mod la ting nge 'dzin shin tu rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor thob par gyur to/ / de thob pas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba dang / mtshan mo'i yum
326b2(phal chen): sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi bar gyi lam na sa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa de la me'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ sa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rdo rje'i rdul
326b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba 'am/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dam pa sna tshogs kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ me tog dang / spos dang / phye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rgyan thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ dmigs pa thams
326b4(phal chen): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig yod pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad la rdul phra mo re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed chu'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang
326b5(phal chen): bcas/ rlung gi phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ rten dang bcas par dbyibs sna tshogs can/ sa gzhi rnam pa tha dad pa
326b6(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ ri'i 'khor sna tshogs can/ chu klung dang mtshe sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor ba/ lha rdzas kyis khyim sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs
326b7(phal chen): kyis yongs su gang ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rgyar sna tshogs can/ lha'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ klu'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan
327a1(phal chen): dang bcas pa/ dri za'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ nam mkha' lding gi zong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/
327a2(phal chen): mi 'am ci'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyar dang bcas pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi chen dang bcas pa/ mi'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad na
327a3(phal chen): rnam par gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi gnas dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi yul dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
327a4(phal chen): na gyi yul dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi shi 'pho dang skye ba'i yul dang bcas pa/ skye ba sna tshogs kyis ma 'dres pa'i rgyud mtha' yas pa'i bye brag la yongs su gzhol ba rnams 'du zhing
327a5(phal chen): 'jig par gyur pa mthong ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams la la ni kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo // la la ni yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la
327a6(phal chen): ni shin tu kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo / / la la ni lam gyi rgyud yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mong
327a7(phal chen): par mthong ngo / / la la ni shin tu yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni gzhi mnyam par mthong ngo // la la ni spyi'u tshugs su gnas par mthong ngo // la la ni spel zhing 'dug par mthong ngo //
327b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud dang / sems can gyi skye gnas thams cad na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal sems can so so nas 'dul
327b2(phal chen): ba'i rkyen bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par gnas par mthong ngo // sems can tshe'i tshad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan
327b3(phal chen): pa dang / mos pa'i spyod yul rnam pa sna tshogs can dang / lus rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / ngag rnam par phye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig gi 'du byed kyi tha snyad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / sbyor ba'i
327b4(phal chen): rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / dbang gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad la ma 'dres par mngon sum du gnas pa mthong ngo // de ya
327b5(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa'i
327b6(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug
327b7(phal chen): bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / klu'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'dod
328a1(phal chen): pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rlung du togs
328a2(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod pa'i mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra
328a3(phal chen): dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi grags pa ma yin pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'khor gyi 'jigs par lhung ba'i sems
328a4(phal chen): can rnams kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi ga yang sas
328a5(phal chen): 'jigs shing sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs
328a6(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byang chub kyi sems
328a7(phal chen): nyams kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag cha
328b1(phal chen): ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral gyis dogs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i
328b2(phal chen): bshes gnyen dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung gis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
328b3(phal chen): kyi sar lhung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs
328b4(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /
328b5(phal chen): dus mi bzad par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi dus mi bzad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi ri
328b6(phal chen): ngan par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig to'i las byas kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sdig to'i las byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / las dang nyon
328b7(phal chen): mongs pa'i sgrib pas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang 'ching bas 'jigs shi
329a1(phal chen): snang ba rnams kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad la so sor mngon du gyur par gnas pa mthong
329a2(phal chen): ngo / / 'di lta ste/ sgo nga las skyes pa'i sems can dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du
